atk-s0514a3:1470: “Sabbesu vippamuttesu, ye tattha samāgatā tadā āsuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1474: Nandiṃ pavesi nagaraṃ, bandhanā mokkho aghositthā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1475_0: Tattha rājaparisā cāti rājaparisāpi tīhi saṅkhehi abhisiñciṃsu. Rājakaññāyo cāti
atk-s0514a3:1475_1: khattiyadhītaropi naṃ abhisiñciṃsu. Devaparisā cāti sakko devarājā vijayuttarasaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1475_2: gahetvā devaparisāya saddhiṃ abhisiñci. Devakaññāyo cāti sujāpi devadhītarāhi saddhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1475_3: abhisiñci. Celukkhepamakarunti nānāvaṇṇehi vatthehi dhaje ussāpetvā uttarisāṭakāni
atk-s0514a3:1475_4: ākāse khipantā celukkhepaṃ kariṃsu. Rājaparisā ca itare tayo koṭṭhāsā cāti abhisekakārakā
atk-s0514a3:1475_5: cattāropi koṭṭhāsā kariṃsuyeva. Ānanditā ahunti āmoditā ahesuṃ. Nandiṃ pavesi nagaranti
atk-s0514a3:1475_6: candakumārassa chattaṃ ussāpetvā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakāle nagare ānandabheri cari. “Kiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1475_7: vatvā”ti? Yathā “amhākaṃ candakumāro bandhanā mutto, evameva sabbe bandhanā muccantū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1476_0: Bodhisatto pitu vattaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Antonagaraṃ pana pavisituṃ na labhati. Paribbayassa
atk-s0514a3:1476_1: khīṇakāle bodhisatto uyyānakīḷādīnaṃ atthāya gacchanto taṃ upasaṅkamitvā “patimhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1476_2: na vandati, añjaliṃ pana katvā “ciraṃ jīva sāmī”ti vadati. “Kenattho”ti vutte ārocesi.
atk-s0514a3:1476_3: Athassa paribbayaṃ dāpesi. So dhammena rajjaṃ kāretvā āyupariyosāne devalokaṃ pūrayamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0514a3:1477_0: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi devadatto maṃ
atk-s0514a3:1477_1: ekaṃ nissāya bahū māretuṃ vāyāmamakāsī”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānesi. Tadā khaṇḍahālo
atk-s0514a3:1477_2: devadatto ahosi, gotamīdevī mahāmāyā, candādevī rāhulamātā, vasulo rāhulo, selā uppalavaṇṇā,
atk-s0514a3:1477_3: sūro vāmagotto kassapo, bhaddaseno moggallāno, sūriyakumāro sāriputto, candarājā
atk-s0514a3:1481_0: Ahu rājā videhānanti idaṃ satthā laṭṭhivanuyyāne viharanto uruvelakassapadamanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1481_1: ārabbha kathesi. Yadā hi satthā pavattitavaradhammacakko uruvelakassapādayo jaṭile
atk-s0514a3:1481_2: dametvā magadharājassa paṭissavaṃ locetuṃ purāṇajaṭilasahassaparivuto laṭṭhivanuyyānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1481_3: agamāsi. Tadā dvādasanahutāya parisāya saddhiṃ āgantvā dasabalaṃ vanditvā nisinnassa
atk-s0514a3:1481_4: magadharañño parisantare brāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vitakko uppajji “kiṃ nu kho uruvelakassapo
atk-s0514a3:1481_5: mahāsamaṇe brahmacariyaṃ carati, udāhu mahāsamaṇo uruvelakassape”ti. Atha kho bhagavā
atk-s0514a3:1481_6: tesaṃ dvādasanahutānaṃ cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya “kassapassa mama santike pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1483: Pucchāmi taṃ kassapa etamatthaṃ, kathaṃ pahīnaṃ tava aggihutta”nti. ;
atk-s0514a3:1485: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;
atk-s0514a3:1486: Etaṃ malanti upadhīsu ñatvā, tasmā na yiṭṭhe na hute arañji”nti. ; –
atk-s0514a3:1487_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvaṃ pakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādapiṭṭhe sīsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1487_1: ṭhapetvā “satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī”ti vatvā ekatālaṃ dvitālaṃ titālanti
atk-s0514a3:1487_2: yāva sattatālappamāṇaṃ sattakkhattuṃ vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā oruyha tathāgataṃ vanditvā
atk-s0514a3:1487_3: ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Taṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā mahājano “aho mahānubhāvo buddho, evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko
atk-s0514a3:1487_4: nāma attānaṃ ‘arahā’ti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena
atk-s0514a3:1487_5: damito”ti satthu guṇakathaññeva kathesi. Taṃ sutvā satthā “anacchariyaṃ idāni sabbaññutappattena
atk-s0514a3:1487_6: mayā imassa damanaṃ, svāhaṃ pubbe sarāgakālepi nārado nāma brahmā hutvā imassa diṭṭhijālaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1487_7: bhinditvā imaṃ nibbisevanamakāsi”nti vatvā tāya parisāya yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a3:1488_0: Atīte videharaṭṭhe mithilāyaṃ aṅgati nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi dhammiko dhammarājā.
atk-s0514a3:1488_1: Tassa rucā nāma dhītā ahosi abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā kappasatasahassaṃ patthitapatthanā
atk-s0514a3:1488_2: mahāpuññā aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattā. Sesā panassa soḷasasahassā itthiyo vañjhā
atk-s0514a3:1488_3: ahesuṃ. Tassa sā dhītā piyā ahosi manāpā. So tassā nānāpupphapūre pañcavīsatipupphasamugge
atk-s0514a3:1488_4: anagghāni sukhumāni vatthāni ca “imehi attānaṃ alaṅkarotū”ti devasikaṃ pahiṇi. Khādanīyabhojanīyassa
atk-s0514a3:1488_5: pana pamāṇaṃ natthi. Anvaḍḍhamāsaṃ “dānaṃ detū”ti sahassaṃ sahassaṃ pesesi. Tassa
atk-s0514a3:1488_6: kho pana vijayo ca sunāmo ca alāto cāti tayo amaccā ahesuṃ. So komudiyā cātumāsiniyā
atk-s0514a3:1488_7: chaṇe pavattamāne devanagaraṃ viya nagare ca antepure ca alaṅkate sunhāto suvilitto
atk-s0514a3:1488_9: visuddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghamānaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ disvā “ramaṇīyā vata bho dosinā
atk-s0514a3:1488_10: ratti, kāya nu kho ajja ratiyā abhirameyyāmā”ti amacce pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1501: Kāyajja ratiyā rattiṃ, viharemu imaṃ utu”nti.
atk-s0514a3:1502_0: Tattha pahūtayoggoti bahukena hatthiyoggādinā samannāgato. Anantabalaporisoti anantabalakāyo.
atk-s0514a3:1502_1: Anāgateti pariyosānaṃ appatte, anatikkanteti attho. Cātumāsāti catunnaṃ vassikamāsānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1502_2: pacchimadivasabhūtāya rattiyā. Komudiyāti phullakumudāya. Mhitapubbeti paṭhamaṃ sitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1502_3: katvā pacchā kathanasīle. Tamanupucchīti taṃ tesu amaccesu ekekaṃ amaccaṃ anupucchi.
atk-s0514a3:1502_4: Paccekaṃ brūtha saṃ rucinti sabbepi tumhe attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ruciṃ paccekaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1502_5: mayhaṃ kathetha. Komudajjāti komudī ajja. Juṇhanti juṇhāya nissayabhūtaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1502_6: abbhuggacchati. Byapahataṃ tamanti tena sabbaṃ andhakāraṃ vihataṃ. Utunti ajja rattiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1503: Iti rājā amacce pucchi. Tena te pucchitā attano attano ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ kathaṃ kathayiṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1509: Ye te vasaṃ na āyanti, vasaṃ upanayāmase;
atk-s0514a3:1510: Esā mayhaṃ sakā diṭṭhi, ajitaṃ ojināmase’.
atk-s0514a3:1516: Uttamo ussavo ajja, na yuddhaṃ mama ruccati.
atk-s0514a3:1524: ‘Na hete dullabhā deva, tava kāmehi modituṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1525: Sadāpi kāmā sulabhā, netaṃ cittamataṃ mama.
atk-s0514a3:1528: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’.
atk-s0514a3:1530: Vijayassa vaco sutvā, rājā aṅgati mabravi;
atk-s0514a3:1534: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise.
atk-s0514a3:1536: ‘Sabbeva santā karotha matiṃ, kaṃ upāsemu paṇḍitaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1537: Yo najja vinaye kaṅkhaṃ, atthadhammavidū ise’.
atk-s0514a3:1543: Taṃ deva payirupāsemu, so no kaṅkhaṃ vinessati’.
atk-s0514a3:1546: Migadāyaṃ gamissāma, yuttaṃ yānaṃ idhā nayā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1547_0: Tattha haṭṭhanti tuṭṭhapahaṭṭhaṃ. Ojināmaseti yaṃ no ajitaṃ, taṃ jināma. Eso mama
atk-s0514a3:1547_1: ajjhāsayoti. Rājā tassa kathaṃ neva paṭikkosi, nābhinandi. Etadabravīti rājānaṃ alātassa
atk-s0514a3:1547_2: vacanaṃ anabhinandantaṃ appaṭikkosantaṃ disvā “nāyaṃ yuddhajjhāsayo, ahamassa cittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1547_3: gaṇhanto kāmaguṇābhiratiṃ vaṇṇayissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “sabbe tuyha”ntiādivacanaṃ abravi.
atk-s0514a3:1548_0: Vijayo etadabravīti rājā sunāmassapi vacanaṃ nābhinandi, na paṭikkosi. Tato vijayo
atk-s0514a3:1548_1: “ayaṃ rājā imesaṃ dvinnampi vacanaṃ sutvā tuṇhīyeva ṭhito, paṇḍitā nāma dhammassavanasoṇḍā
atk-s0514a3:1548_2: honti, dhammassavanamassa vaṇṇayissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “sabbe kāmā”tiādivacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1548_3: abravi. Tattha tava mupaṭṭhitāti tava upaṭṭhitā. Moditunti tava kāmehi modituṃ abhiramituṃ
atk-s0514a3:1548_4: icchāya sati na hi ete kāmā dullabhā. Netaṃ cittamataṃ mamāti etaṃ tava kāmehi abhiramaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1548_5: mama cittamataṃ na hoti, na me ettha cittaṃ pakkhandati. Yo najjāti yo no ajja. Atthadhammavidūti
atk-s0514a3:1548_6: pāḷiatthañceva pāḷidhammañca jānanto. Iseti isi esitaguṇo.
atk-s0514a3:1549_0: Aṅgati mabravīti aṅgati abravi. Mayhampetaṃva ruccatīti mayhampi etaññeva ruccati.
atk-s0514a3:1549_1: Sabbeva santāti sabbeva tumhe idha vijjamānā matiṃ karotha cintetha. Alāto etadabravīti
atk-s0514a3:1549_2: rañño kathaṃ sutvā alāto “ayaṃ mama kulūpako guṇo nāma ājīvako rājuyyāne vasati,
atk-s0514a3:1549_3: taṃ pasaṃsitvā rājakulūpakaṃ karissāmī”ti cintetvā etaṃ “atthāya”ntiādivacanaṃ abravi.
atk-s0514a3:1549_4: Tattha dhīrasammatoti paṇḍitoti sammato. Kassapagottāyanti kassapagotto ayaṃ. Sutoti
atk-s0514a3:1550: Rañño taṃ kathaṃ sutvā sārathino tathā kariṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1568: Na te apanayī rājā, akataṃ bhūmimāgate”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1569_0: Tattha tassa yānanti tassa rañño rathaṃ yojayiṃsu. Dantanti dantamayaṃ. Rūpiyapakkharanti
atk-s0514a3:1569_2: vigatadosāya rattiyā mukhaṃ viya, candasadisanti attho. Tatrāsunti tatra ahesuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1569_3: Kumudāti kumudavaṇṇā. Sindhavāti sindhavajātikā. Anilūpamasamuppātāti vātasadisavegā.
atk-s0514a3:1569_4: Setacchattanti tasmiṃ rathe samussāpitaṃ chattampi setaṃ ahosi. Setarathoti sopi
atk-s0514a3:1569_5: ratho setoyeva. Setassāti assāpi setā. Setabījanīti bījanīpi setā. Niyyanti tena
atk-s0514a3:1569_6: rathena niggacchanto amaccagaṇaparivuto vedeharājā cando viya sobhati.
atk-s0514a3:1570_0: Naravarādhipanti naravarānaṃ adhipatiṃ rājādhirājānaṃ. So muhuttaṃva yāyitvāti so
atk-s0514a3:1570_1: rājā muhutteneva uyyānaṃ gantvā. Pattī guṇamupāgamīti pattikova guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:1570_2: Yepi tattha tadā āsunti yepi tasmiṃ uyyāne tadā puretaraṃ gantvā taṃ ājīvakaṃ payirupāsamānā
atk-s0514a3:1570_3: nisinnā ahesuṃ. Na te apanayīti amhākameva doso, ye mayaṃ pacchā agamimhā, tumhe
atk-s0514a3:1570_4: mā cintayitthāti te brāhmaṇe ca ibbhe ca raññoyeva atthāya akataṃ akatokāsaṃ bhūmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1571: Tāya pana omissakaparisāya parivutova ekamantaṃ nisīditvā paṭisanthāramakāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1580: Appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyati’.
atk-s0514a3:1582: Taṃ guṇo paṭisammodi, vedehaṃ vinaye rataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1586: Kacci arogaṃ yoggaṃ te, kacci vahati vāhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1593: Kathaṃ care ācariye, puttadāre kathaṃ care.
atk-s0514a3:1600_0: Tattha mudukā bhisiyāti mudukāya sukhasamphassāya bhisiyā. Muducittakasanthateti
atk-s0514a3:1600_1: sukhasamphasse cittattharaṇe. Mudupaccatthateti mudunā paccattharaṇena paccatthate.
atk-s0514a3:1600_2: Sammodīti ājīvakena saddhiṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Tatoti tato nisajjanato
atk-s0514a3:1600_3: anantarameva sāraṇīyaṃ kathaṃ kathesīti attho. Tattha kacci yāpaniyanti kacci te,
atk-s0514a3:1600_4: bhante, sarīraṃ paccayehi yāpetuṃ sakkā. Vātānamaviyaggatāti kacci te sarīre dhātuyo
atk-s0514a3:1600_5: samappavattā, vātānaṃ byaggatā natthi, tattha tattha vaggavaggā hutvā vātā na bādhayantīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:1601_0: Akasirāti niddukkhā. Vuttīti jīvitavutti. Appābādhoti iriyāpathabhañjakenābādhena
atk-s0514a3:1601_1: virahito. Cakkhunti kacci te cakkhuādīni indriyāni na parihāyantīti pucchati. Paṭisammodīti
atk-s0514a3:1601_2: sammodanīyakathāya paṭikathesi. Tattha sabbametanti yaṃ tayā vuttaṃ vātānamaviyaggatādi,
atk-s0514a3:1601_3: taṃ sabbaṃ tatheva. Tadubhayanti yampi tayā “appābādho casi kacci, cakkhuṃ na parihāyatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1602_0: Na balīyareti nābhibhavanti na kuppanti. Anantarāti paṭisanthārato anantarā pañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1602_1: pucchi. Tattha atthaṃ dhammañca ñāyañcāti pāḷiatthañca pāḷiñca kāraṇayuttiñca. So
atk-s0514a3:1602_2: hi “kathaṃ dhammaṃ care”ti pucchanto mātāpituādīsu paṭipattidīpakaṃ pāḷiñca pāḷiatthañca
atk-s0514a3:1602_3: kāraṇayuttiñca me kathethāti imaṃ atthañca dhammañca ñāyañca pucchati. Tattha kathañceke
atk-s0514a3:1602_4: adhammaṭṭhāti ekacce adhamme ṭhitā kathaṃ nirayañceva atho sesaapāye ca patantīti
atk-s0514a3:1602_6: pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ pucchitabbakaṃ mahesakkhapañhaṃ rājā kiñci ajānantaṃ naggabhoggaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1603_0: Sopi evaṃ pucchito pucchānurūpaṃ byākaraṇaṃ adisvā carantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto
atk-s0514a3:1603_1: viya bhattapātiyaṃ kacavaraṃ khipanto viya ca “suṇa, mahārājā”ti okāsaṃ kāretvā attano
atk-s0514a3:1603_2: micchāvādaṃ paṭṭhapesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1609: Natthi deva paro loko, ko tato hi idhāgato.
atk-s0514a3:1611: ‘Natthi deva pitaro vā, kuto mātā kuto pitā;
atk-s0514a3:1612: Natthi ācariyo nāma, adantaṃ ko damessati.
atk-s0514a3:1615: Natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1616: Niyatāni hi bhūtāni, yathā goṭaviso tathā.
atk-s0514a3:1623_0: Tattha idhāgatoti tato paralokato idhāgato nāma natthi. Natthi deva pitaro vāti deva,
atk-s0514a3:1623_1: ayyakapeyyakādayo vā natthi, tesu asantesu kuto mātā kuto pitā. Yathā goṭaviso tathāti
atk-s0514a3:1623_2: goṭaviso vuccati pacchābandho, yathā nāvāya pacchābandho nāvameva anugacchati, tathā
atk-s0514a3:1623_3: ime sattā niyatameva anugacchantīti vadati. Avaso devavīriyoti evaṃ dānaphale asati
atk-s0514a3:1623_4: yo koci bālo dānaṃ deti, so avaso avīriyo na attano vasena balena deti, dānaphalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1623_5: pana atthīti saññāya aññesaṃ andhabālānaṃ saddahitvā detīti dīpeti. Bālehi dānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1623_6: paññattanti “dānaṃ dātabba”nti andhabālehi paññattaṃ anuññātaṃ, taṃ dānaṃ bālāyeva
atk-s0514a3:1624: Evaṃ dānassa nipphalataṃ vaṇṇetvā idāni pāpassa nipphalabhāvaṃ vaṇṇetuṃ āha –
atk-s0514a3:1627: Tejo pathavī āpo ca, vāyo sukhaṃ dukhañcime;
atk-s0514a3:1628: Jīve ca sattime kāyā, yesaṃ chettā na vijjati.
atk-s0514a3:1630: “Natthi hantā va chettā vā, haññe yevāpi koci naṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1634: Na so chindati te kāye, tattha pāpaphalaṃ kuto.
atk-s0514a3:1637: Anāgate tamhi kāle, saññatopi na sujjhati.
atk-s0514a3:1640: Pāpañcepi bahuṃ katvā, taṃ khaṇaṃ nātivattare.
atk-s0514a3:1644_0: Tattha kāyāti samūhā. Avikopinoti vikopetuṃ na sakkā. Jīveti jīvo. “Jīvo”tipi pāṭho,
atk-s0514a3:1644_1: ayameva attho. Sattime kāyāti ime satta kāyā. Haññe yevāpi koci nanti yo haññeyya,
atk-s0514a3:1644_2: sopi nattheva. Vītivattareti imesaṃ sattannaṃ kāyānaṃ antareyeva caranti, chindituṃ
atk-s0514a3:1644_3: na sakkonti. Siramādāyāti paresaṃ sīsaṃ gahetvā. Nisitāsināti nisitena asinā chindati,
atk-s0514a3:1644_4: na so chindatīti sopi te kāye na chindati, pathavī pathavimeva upeti, āpādayo āpādike,
atk-s0514a3:1645_0: Saṃsaranti mahārāja, ime sattā imaṃ pathaviṃ ekamaṃsakhalaṃ katvāpi ettake kappe
atk-s0514a3:1645_1: saṃsarantā sujjhanti. Aññatra hi saṃsārā satte sodhetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, sabbe
atk-s0514a3:1645_2: saṃsāreneva sujjhanti. Anāgate tamhi kāleti yathāvutte pana etasmiṃ kāle anāgate
atk-s0514a3:1645_3: appatte antarā saññatopi parisuddhasīlopi na sujjhati. Taṃ khaṇanti taṃ vuttappakāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:1645_4: kālaṃ. Anupubbena no suddhīti amhākaṃ vāde anupubbena suddhi, sabbesaṃ amhākaṃ anupubbena
atk-s0514a3:1645_5: suddhi bhavissatīti attho. Iti so ucchedavādo attano thāmena sakavādaṃ nippadesato kathesīti.
atk-s0514a3:1651: Piṅgalo nāmahaṃ āsiṃ, luddo goghātako pure.
atk-s0514a3:1654: Bahū mayā hatā pāṇā, mahiṃsā sūkarā ajā.
atk-s0514a3:1657: Natthi nūna phalaṃ pāpaṃ, yohaṃ na nirayaṃ gato”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:1658_0: Tattha alāto etadabravīti so kira kassapadasabalassa cetiye anojapupphadāmena pūjaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1658_1: katvā maraṇasamaye aññena kammena yathānubhāvaṃ khitto saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa
atk-s0514a3:1658_2: pāpakammassa nissandena goghātakakule nibbattitvā bahuṃ pāpamakāsi. Athassa maraṇakāle
atk-s0514a3:1658_3: bhasmapaṭicchanno viya aggi ettakaṃ kālaṃ ṭhitaṃ taṃ puññakammaṃ okāsamakāsi. So
atk-s0514a3:1658_4: tassānubhāvena idha nibbattitvā taṃ vibhūtiṃ patto, jātiṃ saranto pana atītānantarato
atk-s0514a3:1658_5: paraṃ parisarituṃ asakkonto “goghātakakammaṃ katvā idha nibbattosmī”ti saññāya tassa
atk-s0514a3:1658_6: vādaṃ upatthambhento idaṃ “yathā bhadanto bhaṇatī”tiādivacanaṃ abravi. Tattha sare
atk-s0514a3:1658_7: saṃsaritattanoti attano saṃsaritaṃ sarāmi. Senāpatīkuleti senāpatikulamhi.
atk-s0514a3:1664: Passasanto muhuṃ uṇhaṃ, rudaṃ assūni vattayī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1665: Tattha athetthāti atha ettha etissaṃ mithilāyaṃ. Paṭaccarīti daliddo kapaṇo ahosi. Guṇasantikupāgamīti guṇassa santikaṃ kiñcideva kāraṇaṃ sossāmīti upagatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0514a3:1668: Kiṃ te sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedana”’nti.
atk-s0514a3:1669: Tattha kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedananti kiṃ nāma tvaṃ kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā vedanaṃ pattoyaṃ, evaṃ rodanto maṃ vedesi jānāpesi, uttānameva naṃ katvā mayhaṃ ācikkhāhīti.
atk-s0514a3:1672: ‘Natthi me vedanā dukkhā, mahārāja suṇohi me.
atk-s0514a3:1675: Sāketāhaṃ pure āsiṃ, bhāvaseṭṭhi guṇe rato.
atk-s0514a3:1678: Na cāpi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, sarāmi katamattano.
atk-s0514a3:1684: Upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ bhattassa, dadāmi yo me icchati.
atk-s0514a3:1687: Na cāpi bhūte hiṃsāmi, theyyaṃ cāpi vivajjayiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1690: Niratthaṃ maññidaṃ sīlaṃ, alāto bhāsatī yathā.
atk-s0514a3:1697_0: Tattha bhāvaseṭṭhīti evaṃnāmako asītikoṭivibhavo seṭṭhi. Guṇe ratoti guṇamhi rato.
atk-s0514a3:1697_1: Sammatoti sambhāvito saṃvaṇṇito. Sucīti sucikammo. Idha jāto duritthiyāti imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1697_2: mithilanagare daliddiyā kapaṇāya kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi jātosmīti. So kira pubbe
atk-s0514a3:1697_3: kassapabuddhakāle araññe naṭṭhaṃ balibaddaṃ gavesamāno ekena maggamūḷhena bhikkhunā
atk-s0514a3:1697_4: maggaṃ puṭṭho tuṇhī hutvā puna tena pucchito kujjhitvā “samaṇa, dāsā nāma mukharā
atk-s0514a3:1697_5: honti, dāsena tayā bhavitabbaṃ, atimukharosī”ti āha. Taṃ kammaṃ tadā vipākaṃ adatvā
atk-s0514a3:1697_6: bhasmacchanno viya pāvako ṭhitaṃ. Maraṇasamaye aññaṃ kammaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So yathākammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1697_7: saṃsāre saṃsaranto ekassa kusalakammassa balena sākete vuttappakāro seṭṭhi hutvā
atk-s0514a3:1697_8: dānādīni puññāni akāsi. Taṃ panassa kammaṃ pathaviyaṃ nihitanidhi viya ṭhitaṃ okāsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1697_9: labhitvā vipākaṃ dassati. Yaṃ pana tena taṃ bhikkhuṃ akkosantena kataṃ pāpakammaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:1697_10: tamassa tasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ adāsi. So ajānanto “itarassa kalyāṇakammassa balena
atk-s0514a3:1697_11: kumbhadāsiyā kucchimhi nibbattosmī”ti saññāya evamāha. Yato jāto suduggatoti sohaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1698_0: Samacariyamadhiṭṭhitoti samacariyāyameva patiṭṭhitomhi. Nūnetanti ekaṃsena etaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1698_1: Maññidaṃ sīlanti deva, idaṃ sīlaṃ nāma niratthakaṃ maññe. Alātoti yathā ayaṃ alātasenāpati
atk-s0514a3:1698_2: “mayā purimabhave bahuṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ katvā senāpatiṭṭhānaṃ laddha”nti bhāsati,
atk-s0514a3:1698_3: tena kāraṇenāhaṃ niratthakaṃ sīlanti maññāmi. Kalimevāti yathā asippo asikkhito akkhadhutto
atk-s0514a3:1698_4: parājayaggāhaṃ gaṇhāti, tathā nūna gaṇhāmi, purimabhave attano sāpateyyaṃ nāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:1698_5: idāni dukkhaṃ anubhavāmi. Kassapabhāsitanti kassapagottassa acelakassa bhāsitaṃ sutvāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:1703: ‘Sukhaṃ vā yadi vā dukkhaṃ, niyatiyā kira labbhati;
atk-s0514a3:1708_0: Tattha aṅgati mabravīti paṭhamameva itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ, pacchā bījakassāti tiṇṇaṃ vacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1708_1: sutvā daḷhaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā etaṃ “natthi dvāra”ntiādivacanamabravi. Niyatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1708_2: kaṅkhāti samma bījaka, niyatimeva olokehi. Cullāsītimahākappappamāṇo kāloyeva hi
atk-s0514a3:1708_3: satte sodheti, tvaṃ atituritoti adhippāyenevamāha. Anāgateti tasmiṃ kāle asampatte
atk-s0514a3:1708_4: antarāva devalokaṃ gacchāmīti mā turittho. Byāvaṭoti brāhmaṇesu ca gahapatikesu ca
atk-s0514a3:1708_5: tesaṃyeva kāyaveyyāvaccadānādikammakaraṇena byāvaṭo ahosiṃ. Vohāranti vinicchayaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:1708_6: nisīditvā rājakiccaṃ vohāraṃ anusāsantova. Ratihīno tadantarāti ettakaṃ kālaṃ kāmaguṇaratiyā parihīnoti.
atk-s0514a3:1709_0: Evañca pana vatvā “bhante kassapa, mayaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ pamajjimhā, idāni pana amhehi
atk-s0514a3:1709_1: ācariyo laddho, ito paṭṭhāya kāmaratimeva anubhavissāma, tumhākaṃ santike ito uttari
atk-s0514a3:1709_2: dhammassavanampi no papañco bhavissati, tiṭṭhatha tumhe, mayaṃ gamissāmā”ti āpucchanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:1712: Tattha saṅgati ceti ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ce no samāgamo bhavissati,no ce, asati puññaphale kiṃ tayā diṭṭhenāti.
atk-s0514a3:1714: Tattha sanivesananti bhikkhave, idaṃ vacanaṃ vedeharājā vatvā rathaṃ abhiruyha attano nivesanaṃ candakapāsādatalameva paṭigato.
atk-s0514a3:1715_0: Rājā paṭhamaṃ guṇasantikaṃ gantvā taṃ vanditvā pañhaṃ pucchi. Āgacchanto pana avanditvāva
atk-s0514a3:1715_1: āgato. Guṇo attano aguṇatāya vandanampi nālattha, piṇḍādikaṃ sakkāraṃ kimeva lacchati.
atk-s0514a3:1715_2: Rājāpi taṃ rattiṃ vītināmetvā punadivase amacce sannipātetvā “kāmaguṇe me upaṭṭhāpetha,
atk-s0514a3:1715_3: ahaṃ ito paṭṭhāya kāmaguṇasukhameva anubhavissāmi, na me aññāni kiccāni ārocetabbāni,
atk-s0514a3:1715_4: vinicchayakiccaṃ asuko ca asuko ca karotū”ti vatvā kāmaratimatto ahosi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1720: ‘Candake me vimānasmiṃ, sadā kāme vidhentu me;
atk-s0514a3:1727: Na cāpi brāhmaṇibbhesu, atthe kismiñci byāvaṭo”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1728_0: Tattha upaṭṭhānamhīti attano upaṭṭhānaṭṭhāne. Candake meti mama santake candakapāsāde.
atk-s0514a3:1728_1: Vidhentu meti niccaṃ mayhaṃ kāme saṃvidahantu upaṭṭhapentu. Guyhappakāsiyesūti guyhesupi
atk-s0514a3:1728_2: pakāsiyesupi atthesu uppannesu maṃ keci mā upagacchuṃ. Attheti atthakaraṇe vinicchayaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0514a3:1728_3: Nisīdantūti mayā kattabbakiccassa karaṇatthaṃ sesaamaccehi saddhiṃ nisīdantūti.
atk-s0514a3:1741_0: Tattha tatoti tato rañño kāmapaṅke laggitadivasato paṭṭhāya. Dvesattarattassāti cuddasame
atk-s0514a3:1741_1: divase. Dhātimātaramabravīti pitu santikaṃ gantukāmā hutvā dhātimātaramāha. Sā kira
atk-s0514a3:1741_2: cātuddase cātuddase pañcasatakumārikāhi parivutā dhātigaṇaṃ ādāya mahantena sirivilāsena
atk-s0514a3:1741_3: attano sattabhūmikā rativaḍḍhanapāsādā oruyha pitu dassanatthaṃ candakapāsādaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:1741_4: Atha naṃ pitā disvā tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā mahāsakkāraṃ kāretvā uyyojento “amma, dānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1741_5: dehī”ti sahassaṃ datvā uyyojeti. Sā attano nivesanaṃ āgantvā punadivase uposathikā
atk-s0514a3:1741_6: hutvā kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakānaṃ mahādānaṃ deti. Raññā kirassā eko janapadopi
atk-s0514a3:1741_7: dinno. Tato āyena sabbakiccāni karoti. Tadā pana “raññā kira guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ nissāya
atk-s0514a3:1741_8: micchādassanaṃ gahita”nti sakalanagare ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. Taṃ pavattiṃ rucāya dhātiyo
atk-s0514a3:1741_9: sutvā rājadhītāya ārocayiṃsu “ayye, pitarā kira te ājīvakassa kathaṃ sutvā micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1741_10: gahitaṃ, so kira catūsu nagaradvāresu dānasālāyo viddhaṃsāpetvā parapariggahitā itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:1741_11: ca kumārikāyo ca pasayhakārena gaṇhituṃ āṇāpeti, rajjaṃ na vicāreti, kāmamattoyeva
atk-s0514a3:1741_12: kira jāto”ti. Sā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā anattamanā hutvā “kathañhi nāma me tāto apagatasukkadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1741_13: nillajjaṃ naggabhoggaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissati, nanu dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe
atk-s0514a3:1741_14: kammavādino upasaṅkamitvā pucchitabbo siyā, ṭhapetvā kho pana maṃ añño mayhaṃ pitaraṃ
atk-s0514a3:1741_15: micchādassanā apanetvā sammādassane patiṭṭhāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthi. Ahañhi atītā

atk-s0514a3:1741_18: pana ajjeva gamissāmi, atha maṃ pitā ‘amma, tvaṃ pubbe aḍḍhamāse āgacchasi, ajja
atk-s0514a3:1741_19: kasmā evaṃ lahu āgatāsī’ti vakkhati. Tatra sace ahaṃ ‘tumhehi kira micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1741_20: gahita’nti sutvā ‘āgatamhī’ti vakkhāmi, na me vacanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissati, tasmā
atk-s0514a3:1741_21: ajja agantvā ito cuddasame divase kāḷapakkheyeva kiñci ajānantī viya pubbe gamanākārenteva
atk-s0514a3:1741_22: gantvā āgamanakāle dānavattatthāya sahassaṃ yācissāmi, tadā me pitā diṭṭhiyā gahitabhāvaṃ

atk-s0514a3:1742_0: Tattha sakhiyo cāti sahāyikāyopi me pañcasatā kumārikāyo ekāyekaṃ asadisaṃ katvā
atk-s0514a3:1742_1: nānālaṅkārehi nānāvaṇṇehi pupphagandhavilepanehi alaṅkarontūti. Dibyoti dibbasadiso,

atk-s0514a3:1742_4: abhihariṃsu. Parikiriyāti parivāretvā. Asobhiṃsūti sujaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā devakaññā
atk-s0514a3:1749: Tattha upāvisīti pitu vasanaṭṭhānaṃ candakapāsādaṃ pāvisi. Suvaṇṇakhaciteti sattaratanakhacite suvaṇṇamaye pīṭhe.
atk-s0514a3:1755: Kacci bahuvidhaṃ khajjaṃ, sadā abhiharanti te.
atk-s0514a3:1760: ‘Kena vā vikalaṃ tuyhaṃ, kiṃ khippaṃ āharanti te;
atk-s0514a3:1762_0: Tattha saṅgamanti accharānaṃ saṅgamaṃ viya samāgamaṃ disvā. Pāsādeti amma mayā tuyhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1762_1: vejayantasadiso rativaḍḍhanapāsādo kārito, kacci tattha ramasi. Antopokkharaṇiṃ patīti
atk-s0514a3:1762_2: antovatthusmiññeva te mayā nandāpokkharaṇīpaṭibhāgāpokkharaṇī kāritā, kacci taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ
atk-s0514a3:1762_3: paṭicca udakakīḷaṃ kīḷantī ramasi. Mālyanti amma, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ devasikaṃ pañcavīsati
atk-s0514a3:1762_4: pupphasamugge pahiṇāmi, kacci tumhe sabbāpi kumārikāyo taṃ mālyaṃ ocinitvā ganthitvā
atk-s0514a3:1762_5: abhiṇhaṃ khiḍḍāratiratā hutvā paccekaṃ gharake karotha, “idaṃ sundaraṃ, idaṃ sundaratara”nti
atk-s0514a3:1762_6: pāṭiyekkaṃ sārambhena vāyapupphagharakāni pupphagabbhe ca pupphāsanapupphasayanāni
atk-s0514a3:1763_0: Vikalanti vekallaṃ. Mano karassūti cittaṃ uppādehi. Kuḍḍamukhīti sāsapakakkehi pasāditamukhatāya
atk-s0514a3:1763_1: taṃ evamāha. Itthiyo hi mukhavaṇṇaṃ pasādentiyo duṭṭhalohitamukhadūsitapīḷakāharaṇatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1763_2: paṭhamaṃ sāsapakakkena mukhaṃ vilimpanti, tato lohitassa samakaraṇatthaṃ mattikākakkena,
atk-s0514a3:1763_3: tato chavipasādanatthaṃ tilakakkena. Candasamamhipīti candato dullabhataro nāma natthi,
atk-s0514a3:1763_4: tādisepi ruciṃ katvā mamācikkha, sampādessāmi teti.
atk-s0514a3:1777_0: Tattha aṅgati mabravīti bhikkhave, so aṅgatirājā pubbe ayācitopi “amma, dānaṃ dehī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1777_1: sahassaṃ datvā taṃ divasaṃ yācitopi micchādassanassa gahitattā adatvā idaṃ “bahuṃ
atk-s0514a3:1777_2: vināsita”ntiādivacanaṃ abravi. Niyatetaṃ abhuttabbanti etaṃ niyativasena tayā abhuñjitabbaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1777_3: bhavissati, bhuñjantānampi abhuñjantānampi puññaṃ natthi. Sabbe hi cullāsītimahākappe
atk-s0514a3:1783: Natthi bhadde paro loko, kiṃ niratthaṃ vihaññasī”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:1784_0: Tattha bījakopīti bījakopi pubbe kalyāṇakammaṃ katvā tassa nissandena dāsikucchiyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1784_1: nibbattoti bījakavatthumpissā udāharaṇatthaṃ āhari. Natthi bhaddeti bhadde, guṇācariyo
atk-s0514a3:1784_2: evamāha “natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā, natthi sattā
atk-s0514a3:1784_3: opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā”ti. Paraloke hi sati
atk-s0514a3:1784_4: idhalokopi nāma bhaveyya, soyeva ca natthi. Mātāpitūsu santesu puttadhītaro nāma
atk-s0514a3:1784_5: bhaveyyūuṃ, teyeva ca natthi. Dhamme sati dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā bhaveyyūṃ, teyeva
atk-s0514a3:1784_6: ca natthi. Kiṃ dānaṃ dentī sīlaṃ rakkhantī niratthaṃ vihaññasīti.
atk-s0514a3:1794_0: Tattha pubbāparaṃ dhammanti bhikkhave, pitu vacanaṃ sutvā rucā rājadhītā atīte sattajātivasena
atk-s0514a3:1794_1: pubbadhammaṃ, anāgate sattajātivasena anāgatadhammañca jānantī pitaraṃ micchādiṭṭhito
atk-s0514a3:1794_2: mocetukāmā etaṃ “sutamevā”tiādimāha. Tattha samapajjathāti yo puggalo bālūpasevī
atk-s0514a3:1794_3: hoti, so bālova samapajjatīti etaṃ mayā pubbe sutameva, ajja pana paccakkhato diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1794_4: Mūḷhoti maggamūḷhaṃ āgamma maggamūḷho viya diṭṭhimūḷhaṃ āgamma diṭṭhimūḷhopi uttari
atk-s0514a3:1794_5: mohaṃ nigacchati, mūḷhataro hoti. Alātenāti deva, tumhehi jātigottakulapadesaissariyapuññapaññāhīnena
atk-s0514a3:1794_6: alātasenāpatinā accantahīnena duppaññena bījakadāsena ca gāmadārakasadisaṃ ahirikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1794_7: bālaṃ guṇaṃ ājīvakaṃ āgamma muyhituṃ patirūpaṃ anucchavikaṃ. Kiṃ te na muyhissantīti?
atk-s0514a3:1795: Evaṃ te ubhopi garahitvā diṭṭhito mocetukāmatāya pitaraṃ vaṇṇentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1801: Kīṭova aggiṃ jalitaṃ apāpataṃ, upapajjati mohamūḷho naggabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1803: “Saṃsārasuddhīti pure niviṭṭhā, kammaṃ vidūsenti bahū ajānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1804: Pubbe kalī duggahitovanatthā, dummocayā balisā ambujovā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1805_1: paññāya sappañño, teneva kāraṇena dhīro, dhīratāya atthānatthassa kāraṇākāraṇassa
atk-s0514a3:1805_2: kovido. Bālebhi sadisanti yathā te bālā upagatā, tathā kathaṃ tvaṃ hīnadiṭṭhiṃ upagato.
atk-s0514a3:1805_3: Apāpatanti api āpataṃ, patantoti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – tāta, saṃsārena suddhīti
atk-s0514a3:1805_4: laddhiyā sati yathā paṭaṅgakīṭo rattibhāge jalitaṃ aggiṃ disvā tappaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1805_5: ajānitvā mohena tattha patanto mahādukkhaṃ āpajjati, tathā guṇopi pañca kāmaguṇe
atk-s0514a3:1806_0: Pure niviṭṭhāti tāta, saṃsārena suddhīti kassaci vacanaṃ asutvā paṭhamameva niviṭṭho
atk-s0514a3:1806_1: natthi, sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalanti gahitattā bahū janā ajānantā kammaṃ vidūsentā
atk-s0514a3:1806_2: kammaphalampi vidūsentiyeva, evaṃ tesaṃ pubbe gahito kali parājayagāho duggahitova
atk-s0514a3:1806_3: hotīti attho. Dummocayā balisā ambujovāti te pana evaṃ ajānantā micchādassanena anatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1806_4: gahetvā ṭhitā bālā yathā nāma balisaṃ gilitvā ṭhito maccho balisā dummocayo hoti,
atk-s0514a3:1819: Ācināti ca taṃ pāpaṃ, yena gacchati duggatiṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1822: Tasseva deva nissando, yañceso labhate sukhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1824: “Khīyate cassa taṃ puññaṃ, tathā hi aguṇe rato;
atk-s0514a3:1832_0: Tattha nirayeti aṭṭhavidhe mahāniraye, soḷasavidhe ussadaniraye, lokantaraniraye
atk-s0514a3:1832_1: ca. Bhāroti tāta, na tāva alātassa akusalabhāro pūrati. Tassevāti tassa pubbe katassa
atk-s0514a3:1832_2: puññasseva nissando, yaṃ so alātasenāpati ajja sukhaṃ labhati. Na hi tāta, etaṃ goghātakakammassa
atk-s0514a3:1832_3: phalaṃ. Pāpakammassa hi nāma vipāko iṭṭho kanto bhavissatīti aṭṭhānametaṃ. Aguṇe
atk-s0514a3:1832_4: ratoti tathāhesa idāni akusalakamme rato. Ujumagganti dasakusalakammapathamaggaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1833_0: Ohite tulamaṇḍaleti bhaṇḍapaṭicchanatthāya tulamaṇḍale laggetvā ṭhapite. Unnametīti
atk-s0514a3:1833_1: uddhaṃ ukkhipati. Ācinanti thokaṃ thokampi puññaṃ ācinanto pāpabhāraṃ otāretvā naro
atk-s0514a3:1833_2: kalyāṇakammassa sīsaṃ ukkhipitvā devalokaṃ gacchati. Saggātimānoti sagge atimāno
atk-s0514a3:1833_3: saggasampāpake sātaphale kalyāṇakamme abhirato. “Saggādhimāno”tipi pāṭho, saggaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1833_4: adhikāraṃ katvā ṭhitacittoti attho. Sātave ratoti esa bījakadāso sātave madhuravipāke
atk-s0514a3:1833_5: kusaladhammeyeva rato. So imassa pāpakammassa khīṇakāle, kalyāṇakammassa phalena
atk-s0514a3:1834: Yañcesa idāni dāsattaṃ upagato, na taṃ kalyāṇakammassa phalena. Dāsattasaṃvattanikañhissa pubbe kataṃ pāpaṃ bhavissatīti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti imamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1839: “Khīyate cassa taṃ pāpaṃ, tathā hi vinaye rato;
atk-s0514a3:1841: Tattha mā hevuppathamāgamāti tāta, tvaṃ imaṃ naggaṃ kassapājīvakaṃ upagantvā mā heva nirayagāmiṃ uppathaṃ agamā, mā pāpamakāsīti pitaraṃ ovadati.
atk-s0514a3:1842: Idānissa pāpūpasevanāya dosaṃ kalyāṇamittūpasevanāya ca guṇaṃ dassentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1844: “Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1845: Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:1848: Sopi tādisako hoti, sahavāso hi tādiso.
atk-s0514a3:1862: Asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggati”nti.
atk-s0514a3:1863_0: Tattha santaṃ vāti sappurisaṃ vā. Yadi vā asanti asappurisaṃ vā. Saro diddho kalāpaṃvāti
atk-s0514a3:1863_1: mahārāja, yathā nāma halāhalavisalitto saro sarakalāpe khitto sabbaṃ taṃ visena alittampi
atk-s0514a3:1863_2: sarakalāpaṃ limpati, visadiddhameva karoti, evameva pāpamitto pāpaṃ sevamāno attānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1863_3: sevamānaṃ paraṃ, tena samphuṭṭho taṃ samphusaṃ alittaṃ pāpena purisaṃ attanā ekajjhāsayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1863_4: karonto upalimpati. Pūti vāyantīti tassa te kusāpi duggandhā vāyanti. Tagarañcāti
atk-s0514a3:1863_5: tagarañca aññañca gandhasampannaṃ gandhajātaṃ. Evanti evarūpā dhīrūpasevanā. Dhīro
atk-s0514a3:1864_0: Tasmā pattapuṭassevāti yasmā tagarādipaliveṭhamānāni paṇṇānipi sugandhāni honti,
atk-s0514a3:1864_1: tasmā palāsapattapuṭasseva paṇḍitūpasevanena ahampi paṇḍito bhavissāmīti evaṃ. Ñatvā
atk-s0514a3:1864_2: sampākamattanoti attano paripākaṃ paṇḍitabhāvaṃ parimāṇaṃ ñatvā asante pahāya paṇḍite
atk-s0514a3:1864_3: sante seveyya. “Nirayaṃ nentī”ti ettha devadattādīhi nirayaṃ, “pāpenti suggati”nti
atk-s0514a3:1864_4: ettha sāriputtattherādīhi sugatiṃ nītānaṃ vasena udāharaṇāni āharitabbāni.
atk-s0514a3:1865: Evaṃ rājadhītā chahi gāthāhi pitu dhammaṃ kathetvā idāni atīte attanā anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ dassentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1868: Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā.
atk-s0514a3:1870: “Yā me sā sattamī jāti, ahu pubbe janādhipa;
atk-s0514a3:1883: Paṇḍitaṃ sutasampannaṃ, so maṃ atthe nivesayi.
atk-s0514a3:1886: Taṃ kammaṃ nihitaṃ aṭṭhā, nidhīva udakantike.
atk-s0514a3:1889: Phalaṃ pariyāga maṃ pacchā, bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā.
atk-s0514a3:1892: Sakammunā apaccissaṃ, taṃ saraṃ na sukhaṃ labhe.
atk-s0514a3:1896_0: Tattha sattāti mahārāja, idhalokaparalokā nāma sukatadukkaṭānañca phalaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0514a3:1896_1: Na hi saṃsāro satte sodhetuṃ sakkoti, sakammunā eva sattā sujjhanti. Alātasenāpati
atk-s0514a3:1896_2: ca bījakadāso ca ekameva jātiṃ anussaranti. Na kevalaṃ eteva jātiṃ saranti, ahampi
atk-s0514a3:1896_3: atīte satta jātiyo attano saṃsaritaṃ sarāmi, anāgatepi ito gantabbā satteva jānāmi.
atk-s0514a3:1896_4: Yā me sāti yā sā mama atīte sattamī jāti āsi. Kammāraputtoti tāya jātiyā ahaṃ magadhesu
atk-s0514a3:1897_0: Paradārassa heṭhentoti paradāraṃ heṭhentā paresaṃ rakkhitagopite varabhaṇḍe aparajjhantā.
atk-s0514a3:1897_1: Aṭṭhāti taṃ tadā mayā kataṃ pāpakammaṃ okāsaṃ alabhitvā okāse sati vipākadāyakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1897_2: hutvā bhasmapaṭicchanno aggi viya nihitaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Vaṃsabhūmiyanti vaṃsaraṭṭhe. Ekaputtoti
atk-s0514a3:1897_3: asītikoṭivibhave seṭṭhikule ahaṃ ekaputtakova ahosiṃ. Sātave ratanti kalyāṇakamme
atk-s0514a3:1897_4: abhirataṃ. So manti so sahāyako maṃ atthe kusalakamme patiṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:1898_0: Taṃ kammanti tampi me kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ tadā okāsaṃ alabhitvā okāse sati vipākadāyakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1898_1: hutvā udakantike nidhi viya nihitaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Yametanti atha mama santakesu pāpakammesu
atk-s0514a3:1898_2: yaṃ etaṃ mayā magadhesu paradārikakammaṃ kataṃ, tassa phalaṃ pacchā maṃ pariyāgaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1898_3: upagatanti attho. Yathā kiṃ? Bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā, yathā savisaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0514a3:1898_4: ṭhitassa taṃ duṭṭhaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ halāhalaṃ visaṃ kuppati, tathā maṃ pariyāgatanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:1898_5: Tatoti tato kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikulato. Taṃ saranti taṃ tasmiṃ niraye anubhūtadukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1898_6: sarantī cittasukhaṃ nāma na labhāmi, bhayameva me uppajjati. Bhinnāgateti bhinnāgate
atk-s0514a3:1899: So pana chagalako balasampanno ahosi. Piṭṭhiyaṃ abhiruyhapi naṃ vāhayiṃsu, yānakepi yojayiṃsu. Imamatthaṃ pakāsentī āha –
atk-s0514a3:1901: “Sātaputtā mayā vūḷhā, piṭṭhiyā ca rathena ca;
atk-s0514a3:1903_0: Tattha sātaputtāti amaccaputtā. Tassa kammassāti deva, roruve mahāniraye paccanañca
atk-s0514a3:1903_1: chagalakakāle bījuppāṭanañca piṭṭhivāhanayānakayojanāni ca sabbopesa tassa nissando
atk-s0514a3:1904_0: Tato pana cavitvā araññe kapiyoniyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Atha naṃ jātadivase yūthapatino
atk-s0514a3:1904_1: dassesuṃ. So “ānetha me, putta”nti daḷhaṃ gahetvā tassa viravantassa dantehi phalāni
atk-s0514a3:1909: Tattha niluñcitaphaloyevāti tatrapāhaṃ pagabbhena yūthapatinā luñcitvā uppāṭitaphaloyeva ahosinti attho.
atk-s0514a3:1913: Niluñcito javo bhadro, yoggaṃ vūḷhaṃ ciraṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a3:1917: Nevitthī na pumā āsiṃ, manussatte sudullabhe;
atk-s0514a3:1927: Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā.
atk-s0514a3:1929: “Pariyāgataṃ taṃ kusalaṃ, yaṃ me kosambiyaṃ kataṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1930: Deve ceva manusse ca, sandhāvissaṃ ito cutā.
atk-s0514a3:1933: Thībhāvāpi na muccissaṃ, chaṭṭhā nigatiyo imā.
atk-s0514a3:1939: Devaputto javo nāma, yo me mālaṃ paṭicchati.
atk-s0514a3:1941: “Muhutto viya so dibyo, idha vassāni soḷasa;
atk-s0514a3:1942: Rattindivo ca so dibyo, mānusiṃ saradosataṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1945: Kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1946_0: Tattha dassanesūti dassanaraṭṭhesu. Pasūti goṇo ahosiṃ. Niluñcitoti vacchakāleyeva
atk-s0514a3:1946_1: maṃ evaṃ manāpo bhavissatīti nibbījakamakaṃsu. Sohaṃ niluñcito uddhatabījo javo bhadro
atk-s0514a3:1946_2: ahosiṃ. Vajjīsu kulamāgamāti goyonito cavitvā vajjiraṭṭhe ekasmiṃ mahābhogakule nibbattinti
atk-s0514a3:1946_3: dasseti. Nevitthī na pumāti napuṃsakattaṃ sandhāya āha. Bhavane tāvatiṃsāhanti tāvatiṃsabhavane ahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1947_0: Tattha ṭhitāhaṃ, vedeha, sarāmi jātiyo imāti sā kira tasmiṃ devaloke ṭhitā “ahaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1947_1: evarūpaṃ devalokaṃ āgacchantī kuto nu kho āgatā”ti olokentī vajjiraṭṭhe mahābhogakule
atk-s0514a3:1947_2: napuṃsakattabhāvato cavitvā tattha nibbattabhāvaṃ passi. Tato “kena nu kho kammena
atk-s0514a3:1947_3: evarūpe ramaṇīye ṭhāne nibbattāmhī”ti olokentī kosambiyaṃ seṭṭhikule nibbattitvā
atk-s0514a3:1947_4: kataṃ dānādikusalaṃ disvā “etassa phalena nibbattāmhī”ti ñatvā “anantarātīte napuṃsakattabhāve
atk-s0514a3:1947_5: nibbattamānā kuto āgatāmhī”ti olokentī dassanaraṭṭhesu goyoniyaṃ mahādukkhassa anubhūtabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1947_6: aññāsi. Tato anantaraṃ jātiṃ anussaramānā vānarayoniyaṃ uddhataphalabhāvaṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a3:1947_7: Tato anantaraṃ anussarantī bhinnāgate chagalakayoniyaṃ uddhatabījabhāvaṃ anussari.
atk-s0514a3:1947_8: Tato paraṃ anussaramānā roruve nibbattabhāvaṃ anussari.
atk-s0514a3:1948_0: Athassā niraye tiracchānayoniyañca anubhūtaṃ dukkhaṃ anussarantiyā bhayaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0514a3:1948_1: Tato “kena nu kho kammena evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhūtaṃ mayā”ti chaṭṭhaṃ jātiṃ olokentī
atk-s0514a3:1948_2: tāya jātiyā kosambinagare kataṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ disvā sattamaṃ olokentī magadharaṭṭhe
atk-s0514a3:1948_3: pāpasahāyaṃ nissāya kataṃ paradārikakammaṃ disvā “etassa phalena me taṃ mahādukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1948_4: anubhūta”nti aññāsi. Atha “ito cavitvā anāgate kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī”ti olokentī “yāvatāyukaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1948_5: ṭhatvā puna sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmī”ti aññāsi. Evaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1948_6: olokayamānā “tatiyepi attabhāve sakkasseva paricārikā hutvā nibbattissāmi, tathā
atk-s0514a3:1948_7: catutthe, pañcame pana tasmiṃyeva devaloke javanadevaputtassa aggamahesī hutvā nibbattissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1948_8: ñatvā tato anantaraṃ olokentī “chaṭṭhe attabhāve ito tāvatiṃsabhavanato cavitvā aṅgatirañño
atk-s0514a3:1948_9: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbattissāmi, ‘rucā’ti me nāmaṃ bhavissatī”ti ñatvā “tato
atk-s0514a3:1948_10: anantarā kuhiṃ nibbattissāmī”ti olokentī “sattamāya jātiyā tato cavitvā tāvatiṃsabhavane
atk-s0514a3:1948_11: mahiddhiko devaputto hutvā nibbattissāmi, itthibhāvato muccissāmī”ti aññāsi. Tasmā –
atk-s0514a3:1950: Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0514a3:1951_0: Tattha pariyāgatanti pariyāyena attano vārena āgataṃ. Satta jaccoti vajjiraṭṭhe napuṃsakajātiyā
atk-s0514a3:1951_1: saddhiṃ devaloke pañca, ayañca chaṭṭhāti satta jātiyoti vuccanti. Etā satta jātiyo
atk-s0514a3:1951_2: niccaṃ sakkatapūjitā ahosinti dasseti. Chaṭṭhā nigatiyoti devaloke pana pañca, ayañca
atk-s0514a3:1951_3: ekāti imā cha gatiyo itthibhāvāna muccissanti vadati. Sattamī cāti ito cavitvā anantaraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:1951_4: Santānamayanti ekatovaṇṭakādivasena katasantānaṃ. Ganthentīti yathā santānamayā honti,
atk-s0514a3:1951_5: evaṃ ajjapi mama paricārikā nandanavane mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. Yo me mālaṃ paṭicchatīti
atk-s0514a3:1951_6: mahārāja, anantarajātiyaṃ mama sāmiko javo nāma devaputto yo rukkhato patitapatitaṃ mālaṃ paṭicchati.
atk-s0514a3:1952_0: Soḷasāti mahārāja, mama jātiyā imāni soḷasa vassāni, ettako pana kālo devānaṃ eko
atk-s0514a3:1952_1: muhutto, tena tā mama cutabhāvampi ajānantā mamatthāya mālaṃ ganthentiyeva. Mānusinti
atk-s0514a3:1952_2: manussānaṃ vassagaṇanaṃ āgamma esa saradosataṃ vassasataṃ hoti, evaṃ dīghāyukā devā.
atk-s0514a3:1952_3: Iminā pana kāraṇena paralokassa ca kalyāṇapāpakānañca kammānaṃ atthitaṃ jānāhi, devāti.
atk-s0514a3:1953_0: Anventīti yathā maṃ anubandhiṃsu, evaṃ anubandhanti. Na hi kammaṃ vinassatīti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1953_1: tasmiṃyeva attabhāve, upapajjavedanīyaṃ anantarabhave vipākaṃ deti, aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1953_2: pana vipākaṃ adatvā na nassati. Taṃ sandhāya “na hi kammaṃ vinassatī”ti vatvā “deva,
atk-s0514a3:1953_3: ahaṃ paradārikakammassa nissandena niraye ca tiracchānayoniyañca mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1953_4: anubhaviṃ. Sace pana tumhepi idāni guṇassa kathaṃ gahetvā evaṃ karissatha, mayā anubhūtasadisameva
atk-s0514a3:1953_5: dukkhaṃ anubhavissatha, tasmā evaṃ mā karitthā”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:1956: “Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1959: “Yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:1966: Attano hoti atthāya, itthī vā yadi vā pumā.
atk-s0514a3:1969: Asaṃsayaṃ tehi pure suciṇṇaṃ, kammassakāse puthu sabbasattā.
atk-s0514a3:1971: “Iṅghānucintesi sayampi deva, kutonidānā te imā janinda;
atk-s0514a3:1972: Yā te imā accharāsannikāsā, alaṅkatā kañcanajālachannā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:1973_0: Tattha hotunti bhavituṃ. Sabbasamantabhogāti paripuṇṇasabbabhogā. Suciṇṇanti suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a3:1973_1: ciṇṇaṃ kalyāṇakammaṃ kataṃ. Kammassakāseti kammassakā attanā katakammasseva vipākapaṭisaṃvedino.
atk-s0514a3:1973_2: Na hi mātāpitūhi kataṃ kammaṃ puttadhītānaṃ vipākaṃ deti, na tāhi puttadhītāhi kataṃ
atk-s0514a3:1973_3: kammaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ vipākaṃ deti. Sesehi kataṃ sesānaṃ kimeva dassati? Iṅghāti codanatthe
atk-s0514a3:1973_4: nipāto. Anucintesīti punappunaṃ cinteyyāsi. Yā te imāti yā imā soḷasasahassā itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:1973_5: taṃ upaṭṭhahanti, imā te kutonidānā, kiṃ nipajjitvā niddāyantena laddhā, udāhu panthadūsanasandhicchedādīni
atk-s0514a3:1973_6: pāpāni katvā, adu kalyāṇakammaṃ nissāya laddhāti idaṃ tāva attanāpi cinteyyāsi, devāti.
atk-s0514a3:1974: Evaṃ sā pitaraṃ anusāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1978_0: Tattha iccevanti bhikkhave, iti imehi evarūpehi madhurehi vacanehi rucākaññā pitaraṃ
atk-s0514a3:1978_1: tosesi, mūḷhassa maggaṃ viya tassa sugatimaggaṃ ācikkhi, nānānayehi sucaritadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1978_2: akkhāsi. Dhammaṃ kathentīyeva sā subbatā sundaravatā attano atītajātiyopi kathesi.
atk-s0514a3:1979_0: Evaṃ pubbaṇhato paṭṭhāya sabbarattiṃ pitu dhammaṃ desetvā “mā, deva, naggassa micchādiṭṭhikassa
atk-s0514a3:1979_1: vacanaṃ gaṇhi, ‘atthi ayaṃ loko, atthi paraloko, atthi sukaṭadukkaṭakammānaṃ phala’nti
atk-s0514a3:1979_2: vadantassa mādisassa kalyāṇamittassa vacanaṃ gaṇha, mā atitthena pakkhandī”ti āha.
atk-s0514a3:1979_3: Evaṃ santepi pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetuṃ nāsakkhi. So hi kevalaṃ tassā madhuravacanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1979_4: sutvā tussi. Mātāpitaro hi piyaputtānaṃ vacanaṃ piyāyanti, na pana taṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1979_5: vissajjesi. Nagarepi “rucā kira rājadhītā pitu dhammaṃ desetvā micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpesī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1979_6: ekakolāhalaṃ ahosi. “Paṇḍitā rājadhītā ajja pitaraṃ micchādassanā mocetvā nagaravāsīnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1979_7: sotthibhāvaṃ karissatī”ti mahājano tussi. Sā pitaraṃ bodhetuṃ asakkontī vīriyaṃ avissajjetvāva
atk-s0514a3:1979_8: “yena kenaci upāyena pitu sotthibhāvaṃ karissāmī”ti sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ patiṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a3:1979_9: dasadisā namassitvā “imasmiṃ loke lokasandhārakā dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇā nāma lokapāladevatā
atk-s0514a3:1979_10: nāma mahābrahmāno nāma atthi, te idhāgantvā attano balena mama pitaraṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1979_11: vissajjāpentu, etassa guṇe asatipi mama guṇena mama sīlena mama saccena idhāgantvā
atk-s0514a3:1979_12: imaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpetvā sakalalokassa sotthiṃ karontū”ti adhiṭṭhahitvā namassi.
atk-s0514a3:1980_0: Tadā bodhisatto nārado nāma mahābrahmā ahosi. Bodhisattā ca nāma attano mettābhāvanāya
atk-s0514a3:1980_1: anuddayāya mahantabhāvena suppaṭipannaduppaṭipanne satte dassanatthaṃ kālānukālaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_2: lokaṃ olokenti. So taṃ divasaṃ lokaṃ olokento taṃ rājadhītaraṃ pitu micchādiṭṭhimocanatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_3: lokasandhārakadevatāyo namassamānaṃ disvā, “ṭhapetvā maṃ añño etaṃ rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_4: vissajjāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthi, ajja mayā rājadhītu saṅgahaṃ, rañño ca saparijanassa
atk-s0514a3:1980_5: sotthibhāvaṃ katvā āgantuṃ vaṭṭati, kena nu kho vesena gamissāmī”ti cintetvā “manussānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_6: pabbajitā piyā ceva garuno ca ādeyyavacanā ca, tasmā pabbajitavesena gamissāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1980_7: sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā pāsādikaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ manussattabhāvaṃ māpetvā manuññaṃ jaṭāmaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_8: bandhitvā jaṭantare kañcanasūciṃ odahitvā anto rattapaṭaṃ upari rattavākacīraṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:1980_9: pārupitvā suvaṇṇatārākhacitaṃ rajatamayaṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃse katvā muttāsikkāya pakkhittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1980_10: suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhikkhābhājanaṃ ādāya tīsu ṭhānesu onataṃ suvaṇṇakājaṃ khandhe katvā
atk-s0514a3:1980_11: muttāsikkāya eva pavāḷakamaṇḍaluṃ ādāya iminā isivesena gaganatale cando viya virocamāno
atk-s0514a3:1980_12: ākāsena āgantvā alaṅkatacandakapāsādamahātalaṃ pavisitvā rañño purato ākāse aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0514a3:1987_0: Tattha addāti brahmaloke ṭhitova jambudīpaṃ avekkhanto guṇājīvakassa santike gahitamicchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:1987_1: rājānaṃ aṅgatiṃ addasa, tasmā āgatoti attho. Tato patiṭṭhāti tato so brahmā tassa
atk-s0514a3:1987_2: rañño amaccagaṇaparivutassa nisinnassa purato tasmiṃ pāsāde apade padaṃ dassento
atk-s0514a3:1987_3: ākāse patiṭṭhahi. Anuppattanti āgataṃ. Isinti isivesena āgatattā satthā “isi”nti
atk-s0514a3:1987_4: āha. Avandathāti “mamānuggahena mama pitari kāruññaṃ katvā eko devarājā āgato bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:1987_5: haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā vātābhihaṭā suvaṇṇakadalī viya onamitvā nāradabrahmānaṃ avandi.
atk-s0514a3:1988: Rājāpi taṃ disvāva brahmatejena tajjito attano āsane saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto āsanā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvā āgataṭṭhānañca nāmagottañca pucchi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:1993: ‘Kuto nu āgacchasi devavaṇṇi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva;
atk-s0514a3:1994: Akkhāhi me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, kathaṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:1995: Tattha byathitamānasoti bhītacitto. Kuto nūti kacci nu kho vijjādharo bhaveyyāti maññamāno avanditvāva evaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0514a3:1996: Atha so “ayaṃ rājā ‘paraloko natthī’ti maññati, paralokamevassa tāva ācikkhissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:1998: “Ahañhi devato idāni emi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā candimāva;
atk-s0514a3:1999: Akkhāmi te pucchito nāmagottaṃ, jānanti maṃ nārado kassapo cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2000: Tattha devatoti devalokato. Nārado kassapo cāti maṃ nāmena nārado, gottena kassapoti jānanti.
atk-s0514a3:2001: Atha rājā “imaṃ pacchāpi paralokaṃ pucchissāmi, iddhiyā laddhakāraṇaṃ tāva pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2003: “Accherarūpaṃ tava yādisañca, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca;
atk-s0514a3:2004: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, atha kena vaṇṇena tavāyamiddhī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2005: Tattha yādisañcāti yādisañca tava saṇṭhānaṃ, yañca tvaṃ ākāse gacchasi tiṭṭhasi ca, idaṃ acchariyajātaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2008: “Saccañca dhammo ca damo ca cāgo, guṇā mamete pakatā purāṇā;
atk-s0514a3:2009: Teheva dhammehi susevitehi, manojalo yena kāmaṃ gatosmī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2010_0: Tattha saccanti musāvādavirahitaṃ vacīsaccaṃ. Dhammoti tividhasucaritadhammo ceva
atk-s0514a3:2010_1: kasiṇaparikammajhānadhammo ca. Damoti indriyadamanaṃ. Cāgoti kilesapariccāgo ca deyyadhammapariccāgo
atk-s0514a3:2010_2: ca. Mamete guṇāti mama ete guṇasampayuttā guṇasahagatā. Pakatā purāṇāti mayā purimabhave
atk-s0514a3:2010_3: katāti dasseti. “Teheva dhammehi susevitehī”ti te sabbe guṇe susevite paricārite
atk-s0514a3:2010_4: dasseti. Manojavoti iddhiyā kāraṇena paṭiladdho. Yena kāmaṃ gatosmīti yena devaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2010_5: ca manussaṭṭhāne ca gantuṃ icchanaṃ, tena gatosmīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2011: Rājā evaṃ tasmiṃ kathentepi micchādassanassa gahitattā paralokaṃ asaddahanto “atthi nu kho puññavipāko”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2013: “Accheramācikkhasi puññasiddhiṃ, sace hi etehi yathā vadesi;
atk-s0514a3:2014: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me sādhu viyākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2015: Tattha puññasiddhinti puññānaṃ siddhiṃ phaladāyakattaṃ ācikkhanto acchariyaṃ ācikkhasi.
atk-s0514a3:2018: “Pucchassu maṃ rāja tavesa attho, yaṃ saṃsayaṃ kuruse bhūmipāla;
atk-s0514a3:2019: Ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayataṃ gamemi, nayehi ñāyehi ca hetubhī cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2020_0: Tattha tavesa atthoti pucchitabbako nāma tava esa attho. Yaṃ saṃsayanti yaṃ kismiñcideva
atk-s0514a3:2020_1: atthe saṃsayaṃ karosi, taṃ maṃ puccha. Nissaṃsayatanti ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayabhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2020_2: gamemi. Nayehīti kāraṇavacanehi. Ñāyehīti ñāṇehi. Hetubhīti paccayehi, paṭiññāmatteneva
atk-s0514a3:2020_3: avatvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā kāraṇavacanena ca tesaṃ dhammānaṃ samuṭṭhāpakapaccayehi
atk-s0514a3:2023: “Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi;
atk-s0514a3:2024: Atthi nu devā pitaro nu atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2025: Tattha jano yamāhūti yaṃ jano evamāha – “atthi devā, atthi pitaro, atthi paro loko”ti, taṃ sabbaṃ atthi nu khoti pucchati.
atk-s0514a3:2028: “Attheva devā pitaro ca atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhu;
atk-s0514a3:2029: Kāmesu giddhā ca narā pamūḷhā, lokaṃ paraṃ na vidū mohayuttā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2030: Tattha attheva devāti mahārāja, devā ca pitaro ca atthi, yampi jano paralokamāha, sopi attheva. Na vidūti kāmagiddhā pana mohamūḷhā janā paralokaṃ na vidanti na jānantīti.
atk-s0514a3:2031: Taṃ sutvā rājā parihāsaṃ karonto evamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2033: “Atthīti ce nārada saddahāsi, nivesanaṃ paraloke matānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2034: Idheva me pañca satāni dehi, dassāmi te paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2035: Tattha nivesananti nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ. Pañca satānīti pañca kahāpaṇasatāni.
atk-s0514a3:2036: Atha naṃ mahāsatto parisamajjheyeva garahanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:2038: “Dajjemu kho pañca satāni bhoto, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2039: Luddaṃ taṃ bhontaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2041: “Idheva yo hoti adhammasīlo, pāpācāro alaso luddakammo;
atk-s0514a3:2042: Na paṇḍitā tasmiṃ iṇaṃ dadanti, na hi āgamo hoti tathāvidhamhā.
atk-s0514a3:2044: “Dakkhañca posaṃ manujā viditvā, uṭṭhānakaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2045: Sayameva bhogehi nimantayanti, kammaṃ karitvā puna māharesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2046_0: Tattha jaññāmu ceti yadi mayaṃ bhavantaṃ “sīlavā esa vadaññū, dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2046_1: imasmiṃ kāle iminā nāmatthoti jānitvā tassa tassa kiccassa kārako vadaññū”ti jāneyyāma.
atk-s0514a3:2046_2: Atha te vaḍḍhiyā pañca satāni dadeyyāma, tvaṃ pana luddo sāhasiko micchādassanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2046_3: gahetvā dānasālaṃ viddhaṃsetvā paradāresu aparajjhasi, ito cuto niraye uppajjissasi,
atk-s0514a3:2046_4: evaṃ luddaṃ taṃ niraye vasantaṃ bhontaṃ tattha gantvā ko “sahassaṃ me dehī”ti codessati.
atk-s0514a3:2046_5: Tathāvidhamhāti tādisā purisā dinnassa iṇassa puna āgamo nāma na hoti. Dakkhanti
atk-s0514a3:2046_6: dhanuppādanakusalaṃ. Puna māharesīti attano kammaṃ karitvā dhanaṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0514a3:2046_7: amhākaṃ santakaṃ āhareyyāsi, mā nikkammo vasīti sayameva bhogehi nimantayantīti.
atk-s0514a3:2047_0: Iti rājā tena niggayhamāno appaṭibhāno ahosi. Mahājano haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā “mahiddhiko
atk-s0514a3:2047_1: devopi ajja rājānaṃ micchādassanaṃ vissajjāpessatī”ti sakalanagaraṃ ekakolāhalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2047_2: ahosi. Mahāsattassānubhāvena tadā sattayojanikāya mithilāya tassa dhammadesanaṃ assuṇanto
atk-s0514a3:2047_3: nāma nāhosi. Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ rājā ativiya daḷhaṃ micchādassanaṃ gaṇhi, nirayabhayena
atk-s0514a3:2047_4: naṃ santajjetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ vissajjāpetvā puna devalokena assāsessāmī”ti cintetvā
atk-s0514a3:2047_5: “mahārāja, sace diṭṭhiṃ na vissajjessasi, evaṃ anantadukkhaṃ nirayaṃ gamissasī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2049: “Ito cuto dakkhasi tattha rāja, kākolasaṅghehi vikassamānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2050: Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, kākehi gijjhehi ca senakehi;
atk-s0514a3:2051: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2052: Tattha kākolasaṅghehīti lohatuṇḍehi kākasaṅghehi. Vikassamānanti attānaṃ ākaḍḍhiyamānaṃ tattha niraye passissasi. Tanti taṃ bhavantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2053: Taṃ pana kākolanirayaṃ vaṇṇetvā “sacepi ettha na nibbattissasi, lokantaraniraye nibbattissasī”ti vatvā taṃ nirayaṃ dassetuṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2055: “Andhaṃtamaṃ tattha na candasūriyā, nirayo sadā tumulo ghorarūpo;
atk-s0514a3:2056: Sā neva rattī na divā paññāyati, tathāvidhe ko vicare dhanatthiko”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2057_0: Tattha andhaṃ tamanti mahārāja, yamhi lokantaraniraye micchādiṭṭhikā nibbattanti,
atk-s0514a3:2057_1: tattha cakkhuviññāṇassa uppattinivāraṇaṃ andhatamaṃ. Sadā tumuloti so nirayo niccaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2057_2: bahalandhakāro. Ghorarūpoti bhīsanakajātiko. Sā neva rattīti yā idha ratti divā ca,
atk-s0514a3:2057_3: sā neva tattha paññāyati. Ko vicareti ko uddhāraṃ sodhento vicarissati.
atk-s0514a3:2058: Tampissa lokantaranirayaṃ vitthārena vaṇṇetvā “mahārāja, micchādiṭṭhiṃ avissajjento na kevalaṃ etadeva, aññampi dukkhaṃ anubhavissasī”ti dassento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2060: “Sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā, pavaddhakāyā balino mahantā;
atk-s0514a3:2061: Khādanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito paṇunnaṃ paralokapatta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2062_0: Tattha ito paṇunnanti imamhā manussalokā cutaṃ. Parato nirayesupi eseva nayo. Tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2062_1: sabbāni tāni nirayaṭṭhānāni nirayapālānaṃ upakkamehi saddhiṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0514a3:2062_2: vitthāretvā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ gāthānaṃ anuttānāni padāni vaṇṇetabbāni.
atk-s0514a3:2064: “Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, luddehi vāḷehi aghammigehi ca;
atk-s0514a3:2065: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2066: Tattha luddehīti dāruṇehi. Vāḷehīti duṭṭhehi. Aghammigehīti aghāvahehi migehi, dukkhāvahehi sunakhehīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2068: “Usūhi sattīhi ca sunisitāhi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittā;
atk-s0514a3:2069: Kāḷūpakāḷā nirayamhi ghore, pubbe naraṃ dukkaṭakammakāri”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2070_0: Tattha hananti vijjhanti cāti jalitāya ayapathaviyaṃ pātetvā sakalasarīraṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2070_1: karontā paharanti ceva vijjhanti ca. Kāḷūpakāḷāti evaṃnāmakā nirayapālā. Nirayamhīti
atk-s0514a3:2070_2: tasmiṃ tesaññeva vasena kāḷūpakāḷasaṅkhāte niraye. Dukkaṭakammakārinti micchādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0514a3:2072: “Taṃ haññamānaṃ niraye vajantaṃ, kucchismiṃ passasmiṃ vipphālitūdaraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2073: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2074: Tattha tanti taṃ bhavantaṃ tattha niraye tathā haññamānaṃ. Vajantanti ito cito ca dhāvantaṃ. Kucchisminti kucchiyañca passe ca haññamānaṃ vijjhiyamānanti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2076: “Sattī usū tomarabhiṇḍivālā, vividhāvudhā vassanti tattha devā;
atk-s0514a3:2078_0: Tattha aṅgāramivaccimantoti jalitaaṅgārā viya accimantā āvudhavisesā patanti. Silāsanīti
atk-s0514a3:2078_1: jalitasilāsani. Vassati luddakammeti yathā nāma deve vassante asani patati, evameva
atk-s0514a3:2078_2: ākāse samuṭṭhāya cicciṭāyamānaṃ jalitasilāvassaṃ tesaṃ luddakammānaṃ upari patati.
atk-s0514a3:2080: “Uṇho ca vāto nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukhaṃ labbhati ittarampi;
atk-s0514a3:2081: Taṃ taṃ vidhāvantamalenamāturaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2082: Tattha ittarampīti parittakampi. Vidhāvantanti vividhā dhāvantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2085: Patodalaṭṭhīhi sucodayantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2086: Tattha rathesu yuttanti vārena vāraṃ tesu jalitaloharathesu yuttaṃ. Kamantanti akkamamānaṃ. Sucodayantanti suṭṭhu codayantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2089: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2090: Tattha tamāruhantanti taṃ bhavantaṃ jalitāvudhapahāre asahitvā jalitakhurehi sañcitaṃ jalitalohapabbataṃ āruhantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2093: Sudaḍḍhagattaṃ kapaṇaṃ rudantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2098: Tattha kaṇṭakanicitāti jalitakaṇṭakehi citā. “Ayomayehī”ti idaṃ yehi kaṇṭakehi ācitā, te dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2102: Tattha tamāruhantīti taṃ evarūpaṃ simbalirukkhaṃ āruhanti. Yamaniddesakāribhīti yamassa vacanakarehi, nirayapālehīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2108: Dumagge vitacaṃ gattaṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2109: Tattha vidaḍḍhakāyanti vihiṃsitakāyaṃ. Vitacanti cammamaṃsānaṃ chiddāvachiddaṃ chinnatāya koviḷārapupphaṃ viya kiṃsukapupphaṃ viya ca.
atk-s0514a3:2116: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2117: Tattha tamāruhantanti taṃ bhavantaṃ nirayapālānaṃ āvudhapahāre asahitvā āruhantaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2120: Sampatitaṃ vetaraṇiṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2125: Tattha kharāti pharusā. Ayopokkharasañchannāti ayomayehi tikhiṇapariyantehi pokkharapattehi sañchannā. Pattehīti tehi pattehi sā nadī tikkhā hutvā sandati.
atk-s0514a3:2128: Vetaraññe anālambe, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhana”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2130: Imaṃ pana mahāsattassa nirayakathaṃ sutvā rājā saṃviggahadayo mahāsattaññeva tāṇagavesī hutvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2132: “Vedhāmi rukkho viya chijjamāno, disaṃ na jānāmi pamūḷhasañño;
atk-s0514a3:2133: Bhayānutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā, sutvāna kathā tava bhāsitā ise.
atk-s0514a3:2136: Andhakāreva pajjoto, tvaṃ nosi saraṇaṃ ise.
atk-s0514a3:2138: “Atthañca dhammaṃ anusāsa maṃ ise, atītamaddhā aparādhitaṃ mayā;
atk-s0514a3:2139: Ācikkha me nārada suddhimaggaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2140_0: Tattha bhayānutappāmīti attanā katassa pāpassa bhayena anutappāmi. Mahā ca me bhayāti
atk-s0514a3:2140_1: mahantañca me nirayabhayaṃ uppannaṃ. Dipaṃvogheti dīpaṃva oghe. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0514a3:2140_2: – āditte kāle vārimajjhaṃ viya bhinnanāvānaṃ oghe aṇṇave patiṭṭhaṃ alabhamānānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2140_3: dīpaṃ viya andhakāragatānaṃ pajjoto viya ca tvaṃ no ise saraṇaṃ bhava. Atītamaddhā
atk-s0514a3:2140_4: aparādhitaṃ mayāti ekaṃsena mayā atītaṃ kammaṃ aparādhitaṃ virādhitaṃ, kusalaṃ atikkamitvā
atk-s0514a3:2141: Athassa mahāsatto visuddhimaggaṃ ācikkhituṃ sammāpaṭipanne porāṇakarājāno udāharaṇavasena dassento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2144: Usindaro cāpi sivī ca rājā, paricārakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2146: “Ete caññe ca rājāno, ye saggavisayaṃ gatā;
atk-s0514a3:2149: “Annahatthā ca te byamhe, ghosayantu pure tava;
atk-s0514a3:2150: ‘Ko chāto ko ca tasito, ko mālaṃ ko vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2153: ‘Ko panthe chattamāneti, pādukā ca mudū subhā’;
atk-s0514a3:2154: Iti sāyañca pāto ca, ghosayantu pure tava.
atk-s0514a3:2156: “Jiṇṇaṃ posaṃ gavāssañca, māssu yuñja yathā pure;
atk-s0514a3:2158_0: Tattha ete cāti yathā ete ca dhataraṭṭho vessāmitto aṭṭhako yāmataggi usindaro sivīti
atk-s0514a3:2158_1: cha rājāno aññe ca dhammaṃ caritvā saggavisayaṃ gatā, evaṃ tvampi adhammaṃ parivajjetvā
atk-s0514a3:2158_2: dhammaṃ cara. Ko chātoti mahārāja, tava byamhe pure rājanivesane ceva nagare ca annahatthā
atk-s0514a3:2158_3: purisā “ko chāto, ko tasito”ti tesaṃ dātukāmatāya ghosentu. Ko mālanti ko mālaṃ icchati,
atk-s0514a3:2158_4: ko vilepanaṃ icchati, nānārattānaṃ vatthānaṃ yaṃ yaṃ icchati, taṃ taṃ ko naggo paridahissatīti
atk-s0514a3:2158_5: ghosentu. Ko panthe chattamānetīti ko panthe chattaṃ dhārayissati. Pādukā cāti upāhanā
atk-s0514a3:2159_0: Jiṇṇaṃ posanti yo te upaṭṭhākesu amacco vā añño vā pubbe katūpakāro jarājiṇṇakāle
atk-s0514a3:2159_1: yathā porāṇakāle kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, yepi te gavāssādayo jiṇṇatāya kammaṃ kātuṃ
atk-s0514a3:2159_2: na sakkonti, tesu ekampi pubbe viya kammesu mā yojayi. Jiṇṇakālasmiñhi te tāni kammāni
atk-s0514a3:2159_3: kātuṃ na sakkonti. Parihārañcāti idha parivāro “parihāro”ti vutto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti
atk-s0514a3:2159_4: – yo ca te balī hutvā adhikārakato pubbe katūpakāro hoti, tassa jarājiṇṇakāle yathāporāṇaparivāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2159_5: dadeyyāsi. Asappurisā hi attano upakārakānaṃ upakāraṃ kātuṃ samatthakāleyeva sammānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2159_6: karonti, samatthakāle pana na olokenti. Sappurisā pana asamatthakālepi tesaṃ tatheva
atk-s0514a3:2159_7: sakkāraṃ karonti, tasmā tuvampi evaṃ kareyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a3:2160_0: Iti mahāsatto rañño dānakathañca sīlakathañca kathetvā idāni yasmā ayaṃ rājā attano
atk-s0514a3:2160_1: attabhāve rathena upametvā vaṇṇiyamāne tussissati, tasmāssa sabbakāmaduharathopamāya
atk-s0514a3:2181: Satipatodo dhīrassa, dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2184: Icchā lobho ca kummaggo, ujumaggo ca saṃyamo.
atk-s0514a3:2187: Paññā ākoṭanī rāja, tattha attāva sārathi.
atk-s0514a3:2190: Sabbakāmaduho rāja, na jātu nirayaṃ vaje”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2191_0: Tattha rathasaññātoti mahārāja, tava kāyo rathoti saññāto hotu. Manosārathikoti manasaṅkhātena
atk-s0514a3:2191_1: kusalacittena sārathinā samannāgato. Lahūti vigatathinamiddhatāya sallahuko. Avihiṃsāsāritakkhoti
atk-s0514a3:2191_2: avihiṃsāmayena sāritena suṭṭhu pariniṭṭhitena akkhena samannāgato. Saṃvibhāgapaṭicchadoti
atk-s0514a3:2191_4: nemiyā samannāgato. Hatthasaññamapakkharoti hatthasaṃyamamayena pakkharena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2191_6: “Abbhañjitabbo nābhi hotū”tipi pāṭho. Vācāsaññamakūjanoti vācāsaṃyamena akūjano.
atk-s0514a3:2192_1: apesuññena suṭṭhu saññato samussito. Girāsakhilanelaṅgoti sakhilāya saṇhavācāya niddosaṅgo
atk-s0514a3:2192_2: maṭṭharathaṅgo. Mitabhāṇisilesito mitabhāṇasaṅkhātena silesena suṭṭhu sambandho.
atk-s0514a3:2192_3: Saddhālobhasusaṅkhāroti kammaphalasaddahanasaddhāmayena ca alobhamayena ca sundarena
atk-s0514a3:2192_4: alaṅkārena samannāgato. Nivātañjalikubbaroti sīlavantānaṃ nivātamayena ceva añjalikammamayena
atk-s0514a3:2192_5: ca kubbarena samannāgato. Athaddhatānatīsākoti sakhilasammodabhāvasaṅkhātāya athaddhatāya
atk-s0514a3:2193_2: apālambena samannāgato. Ṭhitacittamupādhiyoti lokadhammehi avikampanabhāvena suṭṭhu
atk-s0514a3:2193_3: ṭhitaekaggabhāvappattacittasaṅkhātena upādhinā uttarattharaṇena vā rājāsanena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2193_4: Kālaññutācittasāroti “ayaṃ dānassa dinnakālo, ayaṃ sīlassa rakkhanakālo”ti evaṃ kālaññutāsaṅkhātena
atk-s0514a3:2193_5: kālaṃ jānitvā katena cittena kusalasārena samannāgato. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā,
atk-s0514a3:2193_6: mahārāja, rathassa nāma āṇiṃ ādiṃ katvā dabbasambhārajātaṃ parisuddhaṃ sāramayañca
atk-s0514a3:2193_7: icchitabbaṃ, evañhi so ratho addhānakkhamo hoti, evaṃ tavapi kāyaratho kālaṃ jānitvā
atk-s0514a3:2193_8: katena cittena parisuddhena dānādikusalasārena samannāgato hotūti. Vesārajjatidaṇḍakoti
atk-s0514a3:2193_9: parisamajjhe kathentassapi visāradabhāvasaṅkhātena tidaṇḍena samannāgato. Nivātavuttiyottakoti
atk-s0514a3:2193_10: ovāde pavattanasaṅkhātena mudunā dhurayottena samannāgato. Mudunā hi dhurayottena
atk-s0514a3:2193_11: baddharathaṃ sindhavā sukhaṃ vahanti, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paṇḍitānaṃ ovādappavattitāya
atk-s0514a3:2193_12: ābaddho sukhaṃ yātūti attho. Anatimānayugo lahūti anatimānasaṅkhātena lahukena yugena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2194_0: Alīnacittasanthāroti yathā ratho nāma dantamayena uḷārena santhārena sobhati, evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2194_1: tava kāyarathopi dānādinā alīnaasaṅkuṭitacittasanthāro hotu. Vuddhisevī rajohatoti
atk-s0514a3:2194_2: yathā ratho nāma visamena rajuṭṭhānamaggena gacchanto rajokiṇṇo na sobhati, samena
atk-s0514a3:2194_3: virajena maggena gacchanto sobhati, evaṃ tava kāyarathopi paññāvuddhisevitāya samatalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2194_4: ujumaggaṃ paṭipajjitvā hatarajo hotu. Satipatodo dhīrassāti paṇḍitassa tava tasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2194_5: kāyarathe supatiṭṭhitasatipatodo hotu. Dhiti yogo ca rasmiyoti abbocchinnavīriyasaṅkhātā
atk-s0514a3:2194_6: dhiti ca hitappaṭipattiyaṃ yuñjanabhāvasaṅkhāto yogo ca tava tasmiṃ kāyarathe vaṭṭitā
atk-s0514a3:2194_7: thirā rasmiyo hontu. Mano dantaṃ pathaṃ neti, samadantehi vāhibhīti yathā ratho nāma
atk-s0514a3:2194_8: visamadantehi sindhavehi uppathaṃ yāti, samadantehi samasikkhitehi yutto ujupathameva
atk-s0514a3:2194_9: anveti, evaṃ manopi dantaṃ nibbisevanaṃ kummaggaṃ pahāya ujumaggaṃ gaṇhāti. Tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2194_10: sudantaṃ ācārasampannaṃ cittaṃ tava kāyarathassa sindhavakiccaṃ sādhetu. Icchālobho
atk-s0514a3:2194_11: cāti appattesu vatthūsu icchā, pattesu lobhoti ayaṃ icchā ca lobho ca kummaggo nāma.
atk-s0514a3:2194_12: Kuṭilo anujumaggo apāyameva neti. Dasakusalakammapathavasena pana aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasena
atk-s0514a3:2194_13: vā pavatto sīlasaṃyamo ujumaggo nāma. So tava kāyarathassa maggo hotu.
atk-s0514a3:2195_0: Rūpeti etesu manāpiyesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu nimittaṃ gahetvā dhāvantassa tava kāyarathassa
atk-s0514a3:2195_1: uppathaṃ paṭipannassa rājarathassa sindhave ākoṭetvā nivāraṇapatodayaṭṭhi viya paññā
atk-s0514a3:2195_2: ākoṭanī hotu. Sā hi taṃ uppathagamanato nivāretvā ujuṃ sucaritamaggaṃ āropessati.
atk-s0514a3:2195_3: Tattha attāva sārathīti tasmiṃ pana te kāyarathe añño sārathi nāma natthi, tava attāva
atk-s0514a3:2195_4: sārathi hotu. Sace etena yānenāti mahārāja, yassetaṃ evarūpaṃ yānaṃ sace atthi, etena
atk-s0514a3:2195_5: yānena. Samacariyā daḷhā dhitīti yassa samacariyā ca dhiti ca daḷhā hoti thirā, so
atk-s0514a3:2195_6: etena yānena yasmā esa ratho sabbakāmaduho rāja, yathādhippete sabbakāme deti, tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2195_7: na jātu nirayaṃ vaje, ekaṃsenetaṃ dhārehi, evarūpena yānena nirayaṃ na gacchasīti
atk-s0514a3:2195_8: attho. Iti kho, mahārāja, yaṃ maṃ avaca “ācikkha me, nārada, suddhimaggaṃ, yathā
atk-s0514a3:2195_9: ahaṃ no niraye pateyya”nti, ayaṃ te so mayā anekapariyāyena akkhātoti.
atk-s0514a3:2196_0: Evamassa dhammaṃ desetvā micchādiṭṭhiṃ jahāpetvā sīle patiṭṭhāpetvā “ito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0514a3:2196_1: pāpamitte pahāya kalyāṇamitte upasaṅkama, niccaṃ appamatto hohī”ti ovādaṃ datvā rājadhītu
atk-s0514a3:2196_2: guṇaṃ vaṇṇetvā rājaparisāya ca rājorodhānañca ovādaṃ datvā mahantenānubhāvena tesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2197: Satthā imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ āharitvā “na, bhikkhave, idāneva, pubbepi mayā diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā uruvelakassapo damitoyevā”ti vatvā jātakaṃ samodhānento imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:2203: Ānando sā rucā āsi, yā rājānaṃ pasādayi.
atk-s0514a3:2211_0: Paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalāti idaṃ satthā jetavane viharanto attano paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha
atk-s0514a3:2211_1: kathesi. Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū dhammasabhāyaṃ kathaṃ samuṭṭhāpesuṃ “āvuso, satthā
atk-s0514a3:2211_2: mahāpañño puthupañño gambhīrapañño javanapañño hāsapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño
atk-s0514a3:2211_3: parappavādamaddano, attano paññānubhāvena khattiyapaṇḍitādīhi abhisaṅkhate sukhumapañhe
atk-s0514a3:2211_4: bhinditvā te dametvā nibbisevane katvā tīsu saraṇesu ceva sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:2211_5: amatagāmimaggaṃ paṭipādesī”ti. Satthā āgantvā “kāya nuttha, bhikkhave, etarahi kathāya
atk-s0514a3:2211_6: sannisinnā”ti pucchitvā “imāya nāmā”ti vutte “anacchariyaṃ, bhikkhave, yaṃ tathāgato
atk-s0514a3:2211_7: paramābhisambodhippatto parappavādaṃ bhinditvā khattiyādayo dameyya. Purimabhavasmiñhi
atk-s0514a3:2211_8: bodhiñāṇaṃ pariyesantopi tathāgato paññavā parappavādamaddanoyeva. Tathā hi ahaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2211_9: vidhurakāle saṭṭhiyojanubbedhe kāḷapabbatamuddhani puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhasenāpatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2211_10: attano ñāṇabaleneva dametvā nibbisevanaṃ katvā pañcasīlesu patiṭṭhāpento attano jīvitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2211_11: dāpesi”nti vatvā tehi yācito atītaṃ āhari.
atk-s0514a3:2212_0: Atīte kururaṭṭhe indapatthanagare dhanañcayakorabyo nāma rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Vidhurapaṇḍito
atk-s0514a3:2212_1: nāma amacco tassa atthadhammānusāsako ahosi. So madhurakatho mahādhammakathiko sakalajambudīpe
atk-s0514a3:2212_2: rājāno hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhahatthino viya attano madhuradhammadesanāya palobhetvā
atk-s0514a3:2212_3: tesaṃ sakasakarajjāni gantuṃ adadamāno buddhalīlāya mahājanassa dhammaṃ desento mahantena
atk-s0514a3:2213_0: Tadā hi bārāṇasiyampi gihisahāyakā cattāro brāhmaṇamahāsālā mahallakakāle kāmesu
atk-s0514a3:2213_1: ādīnavaṃ disvā himavantaṃ pavisitvā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā abhiññā ca samāpattiyo
atk-s0514a3:2213_2: ca nibbattetvā vanamūlaphalāhārā tattheva ciraṃ vasitvā loṇambilasevanatthāya cārikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2213_3: caramānā aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagaraṃ patvā rājuyyāne vasitvā punadivase bhikkhāya
atk-s0514a3:2213_4: nagaraṃ pavisiṃsu. Tattha cattāro sahāyakā kuṭumbikā tesaṃ iriyāpathesu pasīditvā
atk-s0514a3:2213_5: vanditvā bhikkhābhājanaṃ gahetvā ekekaṃ attano nivesane nisīdāpetvā paṇītena āhārena
atk-s0514a3:2213_6: parivisitvā paṭiññaṃ gāhāpetvā uyyāneyeva vāsāpesuṃ. Te cattāro tāpasā catunnaṃ kuṭumbikānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2213_7: gehesu nibaddhaṃ bhuñjitvā divāvihāratthāya eko tāpaso tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0514a3:2213_8: eko nāgabhavanaṃ, eko supaṇṇabhavanaṃ, eko korabyarañño migājinauyyānaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2213_9: Tesu yo devalokaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so sakkassa yasaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa
atk-s0514a3:2213_10: tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so nāgarājassa sampattiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2213_11: oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo supaṇṇabhavanaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2213_12: karoti, so supaṇṇarājassa vibhūtiṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti. Yo
atk-s0514a3:2213_13: dhanañcayakorabyarājassa uyyānaṃ gantvā divāvihāraṃ karoti, so dhanañcayakorabyarañño
atk-s0514a3:2213_14: sirisobhaggaṃ oloketvā attano upaṭṭhākassa tameva vaṇṇeti.
atk-s0514a3:2214_0: Te cattāropi janā taṃ tadeva ṭhānaṃ patthetvā dānādīni puññāni katvā āyupariyosāne
atk-s0514a3:2214_1: eko sakko hutvā nibbatti, eko saputtadāro nāgabhavane nāgarājā hutvā nibbatti, eko
atk-s0514a3:2214_2: supaṇṇabhavane simbalivimāne supaṇṇarājā hutvā nibbatti. Eko dhanañcayakorabyarañño
atk-s0514a3:2214_3: aggamahesiyā kucchimhi nibbatti. Tepi tāpasā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke
atk-s0514a3:2214_4: nibbattiṃsu. Korabyakumāro vuḍḍhimanvāya pitu accayena rajje patiṭṭhahitvā dhammena
atk-s0514a3:2214_5: samena rajjaṃ kāresi. So pana jūtavittako ahosi. So vidhurapaṇḍitassa ovāde ṭhatvā
atk-s0514a3:2214_6: dānaṃ deti, sīlaṃ rakkhati, uposathaṃ upavasati.
atk-s0514a3:2215_0: So ekadivasaṃ samādinnuposatho “vivekamanubrūhissāmī”ti uyyānaṃ gantvā manuññaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2215_1: nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Sakkopi samādinnuposatho “devaloke palibodho hotī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2215_2: manussaloke tameva uyyānaṃ āgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2215_3: akāsi. Varuṇanāgarājāpi samādinnuposatho “nāgabhavane palibodho hotī”ti tatthevāgantvā
atk-s0514a3:2215_4: ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Supaṇṇarājāpi samādinnuposatho
atk-s0514a3:2215_5: “supaṇṇabhavane palibodho hotī”ti tatthevāgantvā ekasmiṃ manuññaṭṭhāne nisīditvā
atk-s0514a3:2215_6: samaṇadhammaṃ akāsi. Tepi cattāro janā sāyanhasamaye sakaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā maṅgalapokkharaṇitīre
atk-s0514a3:2215_7: samāgantvā aññamaññaṃ oloketvā pubbasinehavasena samaggā sammodamānā hutvā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2215_8: mettacittaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ kariṃsu. Tesu sakko maṅgalasilāpaṭṭe
atk-s0514a3:2215_9: nisīdi, itarepi attano attano yuttāsanaṃ ñatvā nisīdiṃsu. Atha ne sakko āha “mayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2215_10: cattāropi rājānova, amhesu pana kassa sīlaṃ mahanta”nti? Atha naṃ varuṇanāgarājā
atk-s0514a3:2215_11: āha “tumhākaṃ tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ sīlato mayhaṃ sīlaṃ mahanta”nti. “Kimettha kāraṇa”nti?
atk-s0514a3:2215_12: “Ayaṃ supaṇṇarājā amhākaṃ jātānampi ajātānampi paccāmittova, ahaṃ evarūpaṃ amhākaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2215_13: jīvitakkhayakaraṃ paccāmittaṃ disvāpi kodhaṃ na karomi, iminā kāraṇena mama sīlaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2215_14: mahanta”nti vatvā idaṃ dasakanipāte catuposathajātake paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2216: “Yo kopaneyye na karoti kopaṃ, na kujjhati sappuriso kadāci;
atk-s0514a3:2217: Kuddhopi so nāvikaroti kopaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2218_0: Tattha yoti khattiyādīsu yo koci. Kopaneyyeti kujjhitabbayuttake puggale khantīvādītāpaso
atk-s0514a3:2218_1: viya kopaṃ na karoti. Kadācīti yo kismiñci kāle na kujjhateva. Kuddhopīti sace pana
atk-s0514a3:2218_2: so sappuriso kujjhati, atha kuddhopi taṃ kopaṃ nāvikaroti cūḷabodhitāpaso viya. Taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2218_3: ve naranti mahārājāno taṃ ve purisaṃ samitapāpatāya loke paṇḍitā “samaṇa”nti kathenti.
atk-s0514a3:2218_4: Ime pana guṇā mayi santi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.
atk-s0514a3:2219_0: Taṃ sutvā supaṇṇarājā “ayaṃ nāgo mama aggabhakkho, yasmā panāhaṃ evarūpaṃ aggabhakkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2219_1: disvāpi khudaṃ adhivāsetvā āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti
atk-s0514a3:2220: “Ūnūdaro yo sahate jighacchaṃ, danto tapassī mitapānabhojano;
atk-s0514a3:2221: Āhārahetu na karoti pāpaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2222_0: Tattha dantoti indriyadamanena samannāgato. Tapassīti tapanissitako. Āhārahetūti
atk-s0514a3:2222_1: atijighacchapiḷitopi yo pāpaṃ lāmakakammaṃ na karoti dhammasenāpatisāriputtatthero
atk-s0514a3:2222_2: viya. Ahaṃ panajja āhārahetu pāpaṃ na karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahantanti.
atk-s0514a3:2223: Tato sakko devarājā “ahaṃ nānappakāraṃ sukhapadaṭṭhānaṃ devalokasampattiṃ pahāya sīlarakkhaṇatthāya manussalokaṃ āgato, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2224: “Khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ vippajahitvāna sabbaṃ, na cālikaṃ bhāsati kiñci loke;
atk-s0514a3:2225: Vibhūsaṭṭhānā virato methunasmā, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2226_0: Tattha khiḍḍanti kāyikavācasikakhiḍḍaṃ. Ratinti dibbakāmaguṇaratiṃ. Kiñcīti appamattakampi.
atk-s0514a3:2226_1: Vibhūsaṭṭhānāti maṃsavibhūsā chavivibhūsāti dve vibhūsā. Tattha ajjhoharaṇīyāhāro
atk-s0514a3:2226_2: maṃsavibhūsā nāma, mālāgandhādīni chavivibhūsā nāma, yena akusalacittena dhārīyati,
atk-s0514a3:2226_3: taṃ tassa ṭhānaṃ, tato virato methunasevanato ca yo paṭivirato. Taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu
atk-s0514a3:2226_4: loketi ahaṃ ajja devaccharāyo pahāya idhāgantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva
atk-s0514a3:2226_5: sīlaṃ mahantanti. Evaṃ sakkopi attano sīlameva vaṇṇeti.
atk-s0514a3:2227_0: Taṃ sutvā dhanañcayarājā “ahaṃ ajja mahantaṃ pariggahaṃ soḷasasahassanāṭakitthiparipuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2227_1: antepuraṃ cajitvā uyyāne samaṇadhammaṃ karomi, tasmā mameva sīlaṃ mahanta”nti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2228: “Pariggahaṃ lobhadhammañca sabbaṃ, yo ve pariññāya pariccajeti;
atk-s0514a3:2229: Dantaṃ ṭhitattaṃ amamaṃ nirāsaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2230_0: Tattha pariggahanti nānappakāraṃ vatthukāmaṃ. Lobhadhammanti tasmiṃ uppajjanataṇhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2230_1: Pariññāyāti ñātapariññā, tīraṇapariññā, pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi parijānitvā.
atk-s0514a3:2230_2: Tattha khandhādīnaṃ dukkhādisabhāvajānanaṃ ñātapariññā, tesu aguṇaṃ upadhāretvā tīraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2230_3: tīraṇapariññā, tesu dosaṃ disvā chandarāgassāpakaḍḍhanaṃ pahānapariññā. Yo imāhi
atk-s0514a3:2230_4: tīhi pariññāhi jānitvā vatthukāmakilesakāme pariccajati, chaḍḍetvā gacchati. Dantanti
atk-s0514a3:2230_5: nibbisevanaṃ. Ṭhitattanti micchāvitakkābhāvena ṭhitasabhāvaṃ. Amamanti ahanti mamāyanataṇhārahitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2230_6: Nirāsanti puttadārādīsu nicchandarāgaṃ. Taṃ ve naranti taṃ evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ “samaṇa”nti vadanti.
atk-s0514a3:2231_0: Iti te sabbepi attano attano sīlameva mahantanti vaṇṇetvā sakkādayo dhanañcayaṃ pucchiṃsu
atk-s0514a3:2231_1: “atthi pana, mahārāja, koci tumhākaṃ santike paṇḍito, yo no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodeyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2231_2: “Āma, mahārājāno mama atthadhammānusāsako mahāpañño asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito nāma
atk-s0514a3:2231_3: atthi, so no imaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vinodessati, tassa santikaṃ gacchāmā”ti. Atha te sabbe
atk-s0514a3:2231_4: “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchiṃsu. Atha sabbepi uyyānā nikkhamitvā dhammasabhaṃ gantvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2231_5: alaṅkārāpetvā bodhisattaṃ pallaṅkavaramajjhe nisīdāpetvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2231_6: nisinnā “paṇḍita, amhākaṃ kaṅkhā uppannā, taṃ no vinodehī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2232: “Pucchāma kattāramanomapaññaṃ, kathāsu no viggaho atthi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2233: Chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, tadajja kaṅkhaṃ vitaremu sabbe”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2234_0: Tattha kattāranti kattabbayuttakakārakaṃ. Viggaho atthi jātoti eko sīlaviggaho sīlavivādo
atk-s0514a3:2234_1: uppanno atthi. Chindajjāti amhākaṃ taṃ kaṅkhaṃ tāni ca vicikicchitāni vajirena sineruṃ
atk-s0514a3:2234_2: paharanto viya ajja chinda. Vitaremūti vitareyyāma.
atk-s0514a3:2235: Paṇḍito tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “mahārājāno tumhākaṃ sīlaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ vivādakathaṃ sukathitadukkathitaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2236: “Ye paṇḍitā atthadasā bhavanti, bhāsanti te yoniso tattha kāle;
atk-s0514a3:2237: Kathaṃ nu kathānaṃ abhāsitānaṃ, atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalā janindā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2238_0: Tattha atthadasāti atthadassanasamatthā. Tattha kāleti tasmiṃ viggahe ārocite yuttappayuttakāle
atk-s0514a3:2238_1: te paṇḍitā tamatthaṃ ācikkhantā yoniso bhāsanti. Atthaṃ nayeyyuṃ kusalāti kusalā
atk-s0514a3:2238_2: chekāpi samānā abhāsitānaṃ kathānaṃ kathaṃ nu atthaṃ ñāṇena nayeyyuṃ upaparikkheyyuṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2238_3: Janindāti rājāno ālapati. Tasmā idaṃ tāva me vadetha.
atk-s0514a3:2239: “Kathaṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, garuḷo pana venateyyo kimāha;
atk-s0514a3:2240: Gandhabbarājā pana kiṃ vadeti, kathaṃ pana kurūnaṃ rājaseṭṭho”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2243: “Khantiṃ have bhāsati nāgarājā, appāhāraṃ garuḷo venateyyo;
atk-s0514a3:2245_0: Tassattho – paṇḍita, nāgarājā tāva kopaneyyepi puggale akuppanasaṅkhātaṃ adhivāsanakhantiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2245_1: vaṇṇeti, garuḷo appāhāratāsaṅkhātaṃ āhārahetu pāpassa akaraṇaṃ, sakko pañcakāmaguṇaratīnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2246: Atha tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2247: “Sabbāni etāni subhāsitāni, na hettha dubbhāsitamatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:2248: Yasmiñca etāni patiṭṭhitāni, arāva nābhyā susamohitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2249: Catubbhi dhammehi samaṅgibhūtaṃ, taṃ ve naraṃ samaṇamāhu loke”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2250_0: Tattha etānīti etāni cattāripi guṇajātāni yasmiṃ puggale sakaṭanābhiyaṃ suṭṭhu samohitāni
atk-s0514a3:2250_1: arā viya patiṭṭhitāni, catūhipetehi dhammehi samannāgataṃ puggalaṃ paṇḍitā “samaṇa”nti āhu loketi.
atk-s0514a3:2251: Evaṃ mahāsatto catunnampi sīlaṃ ekasamameva akāsi. Taṃ sutvā cattāropi rājāno tassa tuṭṭhā thutiṃ karontā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:2252: “Tuvañhi seṭṭho tvamanuttarosi, tvaṃ dhammagū dhammavidū sumedho;
atk-s0514a3:2253: Paññāya pañhaṃ samadhiggahetvā, acchecchi dhīro vicikicchitāni;
atk-s0514a3:2254: Acchecchi kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni, cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenā”ti..
atk-s0514a3:2255_0: Tattha tvamanuttarosīti tvaṃ anuttaro asi, natthi tayā uttaritaro nāma. Dhammagūti
atk-s0514a3:2255_1: dhammassa gopako ceva dhammaññū ca. Dhammavidūti pākaṭadhammo. Sumedhoti sundarapañño
atk-s0514a3:2255_2: paññāyāti attano paññāya amhākaṃ pañhaṃ suṭṭhu adhigaṇhitvā “idamettha kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0514a3:2255_3: yathābhūtaṃ ñatvā. Acchecchīti tvaṃ dhīro amhākaṃ vicikicchitāni chindi, evaṃ chindanto
atk-s0514a3:2255_4: ca “chindajja kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitānī”ti idaṃ amhākaṃ āyācanaṃ sampādento acchecchi
atk-s0514a3:2255_5: kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchitāni. Cundo yathā nāgadantaṃ kharenāti yathā dantakāro kakacena
atk-s0514a3:2256_0: Evaṃ te cattāropi rājāno tassa pañhabyākaraṇena tuṭṭhamānasā ahesuṃ. Atha naṃ sakko
atk-s0514a3:2256_1: dibbadukūlena pūjesi, garuḷo suvaṇṇamālāya, varuṇo nāgarājā maṇinā, dhanañcayarājā
atk-s0514a3:2258: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2260: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2261: “Maṇiṃ anagghaṃ ruciraṃ pabhassaraṃ, kaṇṭhāvasattaṃ maṇibhūsitaṃ me;
atk-s0514a3:2262: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te dhammapūjāya dhīra.
atk-s0514a3:2263: “Gavaṃ sahassaṃ usabhañca nāgaṃ, ājaññayutte ca rathe dasa ime;
atk-s0514a3:2264: Pañhassa veyyākaraṇena tuṭṭho, dadāmi te gāmavarāni soḷasā”ti. ;
atk-s0514a3:2265: Evaṃ sakkādayo mahāsattaṃ pūjetvā sakaṭṭhānameva agamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2268_0: Tesu nāgarājassa bhariyā vimalādevī nāma. Sā tassa gīvāya piḷandhanamaṇiṃ apassantī
atk-s0514a3:2268_1: pucchi “deva, kahaṃ pana te maṇī”ti? “Bhadde, candabrāhmaṇaputtassa vidhurapaṇḍitassa
atk-s0514a3:2268_2: dhammakathaṃ sutvā pasannacitto ahaṃ tena maṇinā taṃ pūjesiṃ. Na kevalañca ahameva,
atk-s0514a3:2268_3: sakkopi taṃ dibbadukūlena pūjesi, supaṇṇarājā suvaṇṇamālāya, dhanañcayarājā gavassasahassādīhi
atk-s0514a3:2268_4: pūjesī”ti. “Dhammakathiko so, devā”ti. “Bhadde, kiṃ vadesi, jambudīpatale buddhuppādo
atk-s0514a3:2268_5: viya pavattati, sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tassa madhuradhammakathāya bajjhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2268_6: hatthikantavīṇāsarena paluddhamattavāraṇā viya attano attano rajjāni gantuṃ na icchanti,
atk-s0514a3:2268_7: evarūpo so madhuradhammakathiko”ti tassa guṇaṃ vaṇṇesi. Sā vidhurapaṇḍitassa guṇakathaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2268_8: sutvā tassa dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā hutvā cintesi “sacāhaṃ vakkhāmi ‘deva, tassa dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2268_9: sotukāmā, idha naṃ ānehī’ti, na metaṃ ānessati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ‘tassa me hadaye dohaḷo
atk-s0514a3:2268_10: uppanno’ti gilānālayaṃ kareyya”nti. Sā tathā katvā siragabbhaṃ pavisitvā attano paricārikānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2268_11: saññaṃ datvā sirisayane nipajji. Nāgarājā upaṭṭhānavelāya taṃ apassanto “kahaṃ vimalā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2268_12: paricārikāyo pucchitvā “gilānā, devā”ti vutte uṭṭhāyāsanā tassā santikaṃ gantvā sayanapasse
