atk-s0514a3:2270: “Paṇḍu kisiyāsi dubbalā, vaṇṇarūpaṃ na tavedisaṃ pure;
atk-s0514a3:2271: Vimale akkhāhi pucchitā, kīdisī tuyhaṃ sarīravedanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2272_0: Tattha paṇḍūti paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇā. Kisiyāti kisā. Dubbalāti appathāmā. Vaṇṇarūpaṃ na
atk-s0514a3:2272_1: tavedisaṃ pureti tava vaṇṇasaṅkhātaṃ rūpaṃ pure edisaṃ na hoti, niddosaṃ anavajjaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2272_2: taṃ idāni parivattitvā amanuññasabhāvaṃ jātaṃ. Vimaleti taṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2275: “Dhammo manujesu mātīnaṃ, dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccati;
atk-s0514a3:2277_0: Tattha dhammoti sabhāvo. Mātīnanti itthīnaṃ. Janindāti nāgajanassa inda. Dhammāhaṭaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2277_1: nāgakuñjara, vidhurassa hadayābhipatthayeti nāgaseṭṭha, ahaṃ dhammena samena asāhasikakammena
atk-s0514a3:2277_2: āhaṭaṃ vidhurassa hadayaṃ abhipatthayāmi, taṃ me labhamānāya jīvitaṃ atthi, alabhamānāya
atk-s0514a3:2280: “Candaṃ kho tvaṃ dohaḷāyasi, sūriyaṃ vā atha vāpi mālutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2281: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2282_0: Tattha dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassananti asamadhurassa vidhurassa dassanameva dullabhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2282_1: Tassa hi sakalajambudīpe rājāno dhammikaṃ rakkhāvaraṇaguttiṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vicaranti,
atk-s0514a3:2282_2: passitumpi naṃ koci na labhati, taṃ ko idha ānayissatīti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:2283_0: Sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “alabhamānāya me idheva maraṇa”nti parivattitvā piṭṭhiṃ datvā
atk-s0514a3:2283_1: sāḷakakaṇṇena mukhaṃ pidahitvā nipajji. Nāgarājā anattamano sirigabbhaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a3:2283_2: sayanapiṭṭhe nisinno “vimalā vidhurapaṇḍitassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharāpetī”ti saññī hutvā
atk-s0514a3:2283_3: “paṇḍitassa hadayaṃ alabhantiyā vimalāya jīvitaṃ natthi, kathaṃ nu kho tassa hadayamaṃsaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2283_4: labhissāmī”ti cintesi. Athassa dhītā irandhatī nāma nāgakaññā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā
atk-s0514a3:2283_5: mahantena sirivilāsena pitu upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā pitaraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā,
atk-s0514a3:2283_6: sā tassa indriyavikāraṃ disvā “tāta, ativiya domanassappattosi, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti
atk-s0514a3:2285: “Kiṃ nu tāta tuvaṃ pajjhāyasi, padumaṃ hatthagataṃva te mukhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2286: Kiṃ nu dummanarūposi issara, mā tvaṃ soci amittatāpanā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2287: Tattha pajjhāyasīti punappunaṃ cintesi. Hatthagatanti hatthena parimadditaṃ padumaṃ viya te mukhaṃ jātaṃ. Issarāti pañcayojanasatikassa mandiranāgabhavanassa, sāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:2288: Dhītu vacanaṃ sutvā nāgarājā tamatthaṃ ārocento āha –
atk-s0514a3:2290: “Mātā hi tava irandhati, vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati;
atk-s0514a3:2291: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2293: Atha naṃ nāgarājā “amma, mama santike vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samattho natthi, tvaṃ mātu jīvitaṃ dehi, vidhuraṃ ānetuṃ samatthaṃ bhattāraṃ pariyesāhī”ti uyyojento upaḍḍhagāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2297: Iti so kilesābhiratabhāvena dhītu ananucchavikaṃ kathaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2298: “Pituno ca sā sutvāna vākyaṃ, rattiṃ nikkhamma avassutiṃ carī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2299_0: Tattha avassutinti bhikkhave, sā nāgamāṇavikā pitu vacanaṃ sutvā pitaraṃ assāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:2299_1: mātu santikaṃ gantvā tampi assāsetvā attano sirigabbhaṃ gantvā sabbālaṅkārehi attānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2299_2: alaṅkaritvā ekaṃ kusumbharattavatthaṃ nivāsetvā ekaṃ ekaṃse katvā tameva rattiṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2299_3: dvidhā katvā nāgabhavanato nikkhamma himavantappadese samuddatīre ṭhitaṃ saṭṭhiyojanubbedhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2299_4: ekagghanaṃ kāḷapabbataṃ nāma añjanagiriṃ gantvā avassutiṃ cari kilesaavassutiṃ bhattupariyesanaṃ carīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2300_0: Carantī ca yāni himavante vaṇṇagandhasampannāni pupphāni, tāni āharitvā sakalapabbataṃ
atk-s0514a3:2300_1: maṇiagghiyaṃ viya alaṅkaritvā uparitale pupphasanthāraṃ katvā manoramenākārena naccitvā
atk-s0514a3:2302: “Ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse;
atk-s0514a3:2303: Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadade, dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2304_0: Tattha ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāgeti ko gandhabbo vā rakkhaso vā nāgo vā. Ke paṇḍite
atk-s0514a3:2304_1: sabbakāmadadeti ko etesu gandhabbādīsu paṇḍito sabbakāmaṃ dātuṃ samattho, so vidhurassa
atk-s0514a3:2304_2: hadayamaṃsadohaḷiniyā mama mātu manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā mayhaṃ dīgharattaṃ bhattā bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2305_0: Tasmiṃ khaṇe vessavaṇamahārājassa bhāgineyyo puṇṇako nāma yakkhasenāpati tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2305_1: manomayasindhavaṃ abhiruyha kāḷapabbatamatthakena yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchanto taṃ tāya
atk-s0514a3:2305_2: gītasaddaṃ assosi. Anantare attabhāve anubhūtapubbāya itthiyā gītasaddo tassa chaviādīni
atk-s0514a3:2305_3: chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. So tāya paṭibaddhacitto hutvā nivattitvā sindhavapiṭṭhe
atk-s0514a3:2305_4: nisinnova “bhadde, ahaṃ mama paññāya dhammena samena vidhurassa hadayaṃ ānetuṃ samatthomhi,
atk-s0514a3:2305_5: tvaṃ mā cintayī”ti taṃ assāsento aṭṭhamaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2307: “Assāsa hessāmi te pati, bhattā te hessāmi anindalocane;
atk-s0514a3:2308: Paññā hi mamaṃ tathāvidhā, assāsa hessasi bhariyā mamā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2309: Tattha anindalocaneti aninditabbalocane. Tathāvidhāti vidhurassa hadayamaṃsaṃ āharaṇasamatthā.
atk-s0514a3:2310: Atha naṃ irandhatī “tena hi ehi, gacchāma me pitu santika”nti ānesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2313: Ehi gacchāma pitu mamantike, esova te etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2314_0: Tattha pubbapathānugatenāti anantare attabhāve bhūtapubbasāmike tasmiṃ pubbapatheneva
atk-s0514a3:2314_1: anugatena. Ehi gacchāmāti bhikkhave, so yakkhasenāpati evaṃ vatvā “imaṃ assapiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2314_2: āropetvā nessāmī”ti pabbatamatthakā otaritvā tassā gahaṇatthaṃ hatthaṃ pasāresi.
atk-s0514a3:2314_3: Sā attano hatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ adatvā tena pasāritahatthaṃ sayaṃ gahetvā “sāmi, nāhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2314_4: anāthā, mayhaṃ pitā varuṇo nāma nāgarājā, mātā vimalā nāma devī, ehi mama pitu santikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2314_5: gacchāma, eso eva te yathā amhākaṃ maṅgalakiriyāya bhavitabbaṃ, evaṃ etamatthaṃ pavakkhatī”ti avacāsi.
atk-s0514a3:2315: Evaṃ vatvā sā yakkhaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2319: Tattha pitusantikupāgamīti attano pituno nāgarañño santikaṃ upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2320: Puṇṇakopi yakkho paṭiharitvā nāgarājassa santikaṃ gantvā irandhatiṃ yācanto āha –
atk-s0514a3:2322: “Nāgavara vaco suṇohi me, patirūpaṃ paṭipajja suṅkiyaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2323: Patthemi ahaṃ irandhatiṃ, tāya samaṅgiṃ karohi maṃ tuvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2328_0: Tattha suṅkiyanti attano kulapadesānurūpaṃ dhitu suṅkaṃ dhanaṃ paṭipajja gaṇha. Samaṅgiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2328_1: karohīti maṃ tāya saddhiṃ samaṅgibhūtaṃ karohi. Valabhiyoti bhaṇḍasakaṭiyo. Nānāratnassa
atk-s0514a3:2332: Anāmanta kataṃ kammaṃ, taṃ pacchā anutappatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2333_0: Tattha yāva āmantaye ñātīti bho yakkhasenāpati, ahaṃ tuyhaṃ dhītaraṃ demi, no na
atk-s0514a3:2333_1: demi, thokaṃ pana āgamehi, yāva ñātakepi jānāpemi. Taṃ pacchā anutappatīti itthiyo
atk-s0514a3:2333_2: hi gatagataṭṭhāne abhiramantipi anabhiramantipi, anabhiratikāle ñātakādayo amhehi
atk-s0514a3:2333_3: saddhiṃ anāmantetvā kataṃ kammaṃ nāma evarūpaṃ hotīti ussukkaṃ na karonti, evaṃ taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2334: Evaṃ vatvā so bhariyāya vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tāya saddhiṃ sallapi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2339: “‘Ayaṃ so puṇṇako yakkho, yācatī maṃ irandhatiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2340: Bahunā vittalābhena, tassa dema piyaṃ mama”’nti.
atk-s0514a3:2341_0: Tattha pavisitvāti varuṇo puṇṇakaṃ tattheva ṭhapetvā sayaṃ uṭṭhāya yatthassa bhariyā
atk-s0514a3:2341_1: nipannā, taṃ nivesanaṃ pavisitvā. Piyaṃ mamanti mama piyaṃ dhītaraṃ tassa bahunā
atk-s0514a3:2344: “Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2345: Sace ca kho hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māhareyya;
atk-s0514a3:2346: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2347: Tattha amhaṃ irandhatīti amhākaṃ dhītā irandhatī. Etena vittenāti etena tuṭṭhikāraṇena.
atk-s0514a3:2348: So tāya saddhiṃ mantetvā punadeva puṇṇakena saddhiṃ mantesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2353: “‘Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
atk-s0514a3:2354: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitasa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:2355: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāmā”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2359: “Yaṃ paṇḍitotyeke vadanti loke, tameva bāloti punāhu aññe;
atk-s0514a3:2360: Akkhāhi me vippavadanti ettha, kaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nāga tuvaṃ vadesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2361_0: Tattha yaṃ paṇḍitotyeketi so kira “hadayaṃ paṇḍitassā”ti sutvā cintesi “yaṃ eke paṇḍitoti
atk-s0514a3:2361_1: vadanti, tameva aññe bāloti kathenti. Kiñcāpi me irandhatiyā vidhuroti akkhātaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2361_2: tathāpi tathato jānituṃ pucchissāmi na”nti. Tasmā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:2364: “Korabyarājassa dhanañcayassa, yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;
atk-s0514a3:2365: Ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarā te hotū”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2366: Tattha dhammaladdhāti dhammena labhitvā. Padacarāti pādaparicārikā.
atk-s0514a3:2367: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako somanassappatto sindhavaṃ nayanatthāya upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2369: “Idañca sutvā varuṇassa vākyaṃ, uṭṭhāya yakkho paramappatīto;
atk-s0514a3:2370: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yutta”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2371: Tattha purisaṃ asaṃsīti attano upaṭṭhākaṃ āṇāpesi. Ājaññanti kāraṇākāraṇajānanakasindhavaṃ. Yuttanti kappitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2375_0: Tattha jātarūpamayā kaṇṇāti tameva sindhavaṃ vaṇṇento āha. Tassa hi manomayassa sindhavassa
atk-s0514a3:2375_1: jātarūpamayā kaṇṇā, kācamhicamayā khurā, tassa khurā rattamaṇimayāti attho. Jambonadassa
atk-s0514a3:2376_0: So puriso tāvadeva taṃ sindhavaṃ ānesi. Puṇṇako taṃ abhiruyha ākāsena vessavaṇassa
atk-s0514a3:2376_1: santikaṃ gantvā nāgabhavanaṃ vaṇṇetvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi. Tassatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:2381: “So puṇṇako kāmarāgena giddho, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ jigīsaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2382: Gantvāna taṃ bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, iccabravī vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2385: Nagare nimmite kañcanamaye, maṇḍalassa uragassa niṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2394: Ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2406: Taṃ tesaṃ demi issara, tena te denti irandhatiṃ mama”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2407_0: Tattha devavāhavahaṃ yānanti vahitabboti vāho, devasaṅkhātaṃ vāhaṃ vahatīti devavāhavahaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2407_1: Yanti etenāti yānaṃ. Kappitakesamassūti maṇḍanavasena susaṃvihitakesamassu. Devānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2407_2: pana kesamassukaraṇakammaṃ nāma natthi, vicittakathikena pana kathitaṃ. Jigīsanti
atk-s0514a3:2407_3: patthayanto. Vessavaṇanti visāṇāya rājadhāniyā issararājānaṃ. Kuveranti evaṃnāmakaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2407_4: Bhogavatī nāmāti sampannabhogatāya evaṃladdhanāmaṃ. Mandireti mandiraṃ, bhavananti
atk-s0514a3:2407_5: attho. Vāsā hiraññavatīti nāgarājassa vasanaṭṭhānattā vāsāti ca, kañcanavatiyā suvaṇṇapākārena
atk-s0514a3:2407_6: parikkhittattā hiraññavatīti ca vuccati. Nagare nimmiteti nagaraṃ nimmitaṃ. Kañcanamayeti
atk-s0514a3:2407_7: suvaṇṇamayaṃ. Maṇḍalassāti bhogamaṇḍalena samannāgatassa. Niṭṭhitanti karaṇapariniṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2407_8: Oṭṭhagīviyoti oṭṭhagīvāsaṇṭhānena katā rattamaṇimasāragallamayā aṭṭālakā. Pāsādetthāti
atk-s0514a3:2407_9: ettha nāgabhavane pāsādā. Silāmayāti maṇimayā. Sovaṇṇaratanehīti suvaṇṇasaṅkhātehi
atk-s0514a3:2407_10: ratanehi, suvaṇṇiṭṭhakāhi chāditāti attho. Sahāti sahakārā. Uparibhaddakāti uddālakajātikāyeva
atk-s0514a3:2407_11: rukkhā. Campeyyakā nāgamallikāti campakā ca nāgā ca mallikā ca. Bhaginīmālā atha
atk-s0514a3:2407_12: mettha koliyāti bhaginīmālā ceva atha ettha nāgabhavane koliyā nāma rukkhā ca. Ete
atk-s0514a3:2407_13: dumā pariṇāmitāti ete pupphūpagaphalūpagarukkhā aññamaññaṃ saṅghaṭṭasākhatāya pariṇāmitā
atk-s0514a3:2407_14: ākulasamākulā. Khajjuretthāti khajjurirukkhā ettha. Silāmayāti indanīlamaṇimayā.
atk-s0514a3:2407_15: Sovaṇṇadhuvapupphitāti te pana suvaṇṇapupphehi niccapupphitā. Yattha vasatopapātikoti
atk-s0514a3:2407_16: yattha nāgabhavane opapātiko nāgarājā vasati. Kañcanavelliviggahāti suvaṇṇarāsisassirikasarīrā.
atk-s0514a3:2407_17: Kālā taruṇāva uggatāti vilāsayuttatāya mandavāteritā kālavallipallavā viya uggatā.
atk-s0514a3:2407_19: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tidivokacarāti tidasabhavanacarā. Vijjuvabbhaghanāti abbhaghanavalāhakantarato
atk-s0514a3:2407_20: nissaṭā vijjulatā viya. Taṃ tesaṃ demīti taṃ tassa hadayaṃ ahaṃ tesaṃ demi, evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2408_0: Iti so vessavaṇena ananuññāto gantuṃ avisahitvā taṃ anujānāpetuṃ etā ettakā gāthā
atk-s0514a3:2408_1: kathesi. Vessavaṇo pana tassa kathaṃ na suṇāti. Kiṃkāraṇā? Dvinnaṃ devaputtānaṃ vimānaaḍḍaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2408_2: paricchindatīti. Puṇṇako attano vacanassa assutabhāvaṃ ñatvā jinakadevaputtassa santike
atk-s0514a3:2408_3: aṭṭhāsi. Vessavaṇo aḍḍaṃ vinicchinitvā parājitaṃ anuṭṭhāpetvā itaraṃ “gaccha tvaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2408_4: tava vimāne vasāhī”ti āha. Puṇṇako “gaccha tva”nti vuttakkhaṇeyeva “mayhaṃ mātulena
atk-s0514a3:2408_5: mama pesitabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti katipayadevaputte sakkhiṃ katvā heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva
atk-s0514a3:2408_6: sindhavaṃ āharāpetvā abhiruyha pakkāmi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2410: “So puṇṇako bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, āmantaya vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2411: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2419_0: So ākāsena gacchantoyeva cintesi “vidhurapaṇḍito mahāparivāro, na sakkā taṃ gaṇhituṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2419_1: dhanañcayakorabyo pana jūtavittako, taṃ jūtena jinitvā vidhuraṃ gaṇhissāmi, ghare
atk-s0514a3:2419_2: panassa bahūni ratanāni, appagghena lakkhena jūtaṃ na kīḷissati, mahaggharatanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2419_3: harituṃ vaṭṭati, aññaṃ ratanaṃ rājā na gaṇhissati, rājagahassa sāmantā vepullapabbatabbhantare
atk-s0514a3:2419_4: cakkavattirañño paribhogamaṇiratanaṃ atthi mahānubhāvaṃ, taṃ gahetvā tena rājānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2419_5: palobhetvā jinissāmī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2421: “So aggamā rājagahaṃ surammaṃ, aṅgassa rañño nagaraṃ durāyutaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2429_0: Tattha aṅgassa raññoti tadā aṅgassa raññova magadharajjaṃ ahosi. Tena vuttaṃ – “aṅgassa
atk-s0514a3:2429_1: rañño nagara”nti. Durāyutanti paccatthikehi durāyuttaṃ. Masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassāti
atk-s0514a3:2429_3: vāsavassa bhavanaṃ viya. Dijābhighuṭṭhanti aññehi ca pakkhīhi abhisaṅghuṭṭhaṃ ninnāditaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2429_4: Nānāsakuntābhirudanti madhurassarena gāyantehi viya nānāvidhehi sakuṇehi abhirudaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2429_5: abhigītanti attho. Suvaṅgaṇanti sundaraaṅgaṇaṃ manuññatalaṃ. Himavaṃva pabbatanti
atk-s0514a3:2429_6: himavantapabbataṃ viya. Vepulamābhirūhīti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako evarūpaṃ vepullapabbataṃ
atk-s0514a3:2429_7: abhiruhi. Pabbatakūṭamajjheti pabbatakūṭaantare taṃ maṇiṃ addasa.
atk-s0514a3:2431: “Disvā maṇiṃ pabhassaraṃ jātimantaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2436_0: Tattha manoharanti manasābhipatthitassa dhanassa āharaṇasamatthaṃ. Daddallamānanti
atk-s0514a3:2436_1: ujjalamānaṃ. Yasasāti parivāramaṇigaṇena. Obhāsatīti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ ākāse vijjuriva
atk-s0514a3:2436_2: obhāsati. Tamaggahīti taṃ maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. Taṃ pana maṇiratanaṃ kumbhiro nāma
atk-s0514a3:2436_3: yakkho kumbhaṇḍasahassaparivāro rakkhati. So pana tena kujjhitvā olokitamatteneva
atk-s0514a3:2436_4: bhītatasito palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ patvā kampamāno olokento aṭṭhāsi. Iti taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2436_5: palāpetvā puṇṇako maṇiratanaṃ aggahesi. Manoharaṃ nāmāti manasā cintitaṃ dhanaṃ āharituṃ
atk-s0514a3:2437: Iti so taṃ gahetvā ākāsena gacchanto taṃ nagaraṃ patto. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2440: Samāgate ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno.
atk-s0514a3:2443: Kamanuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma, ko vāpi no jeti varaddhanenā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2444_0: Tattha oruyhupāgacchi sabhaṃ kurūnanti bhikkhave, so puṇṇako assapiṭṭhito oruyha
atk-s0514a3:2444_1: assaṃ adissamānarūpaṃ ṭhapetvā māṇavakavaṇṇena kurūnaṃ sabhaṃ upagato. Ekasatanti
atk-s0514a3:2444_2: ekasatarājāno achambhīto hutvā “ko nīdhā”tiādīni vadanto jūtena avhettha. Ko nīdhāti
atk-s0514a3:2444_3: ko nu imasmiṃ rājasamāgame. Raññanti rājūnaṃ antare. Varamābhijetīti amhākaṃ santakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2444_4: seṭṭharatanaṃ abhijeti, “ahaṃ jināmī”ti vattuṃ ussahati. Kamābhijeyyāmāti kaṃ vā
atk-s0514a3:2444_5: mayaṃ jineyyāma. Varaddhanenāti uttamadhanena. Kamanuttaranti jinanto ca kataraṃ
atk-s0514a3:2444_6: rājānaṃ anuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma. Ko vāpi no jetīti atha vā ko nāma rājā amhe
atk-s0514a3:2444_7: varadhanena jeti. Iti so catūhi padehi korabyameva ghaṭṭeti.
atk-s0514a3:2445: Atha rājā “mayā ito pubbe evaṃ sūro hutvā kathento nāma na diṭṭhapubbo, ko nu kho eso”ti cintetvā pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2447: “Kuhiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, na korabyasseva vaco tavedaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2448: Abhītosi no vaṇṇanibhāya sabbe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave cā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2449: Tattha na korabyassevāti kururaṭṭhavāsikasseva tava vacanaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2450_0: Taṃ sutvā itaro “ayaṃ rājā mama nāmaṃ pucchati, puṇṇako ca nāma dāso hoti. Sacāhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2450_1: ‘puṇṇakosmī’ti vakkhāmi, ‘esa dāso, tasmā maṃ pagabbhatāya evaṃ vadetī’ti avamaññissati,
atk-s0514a3:2450_2: anantarātīte attabhāve nāmamassa kathessāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2453: Aṅgesu me ñātayo bandhavā ca, akkhena devasmi idhānupatto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2454_0: Tattha anūnanāmoti na ūnanāmo. Iminā attano puṇṇakanāmameva paṭicchannaṃ katvā katheti.
atk-s0514a3:2454_1: Iti mavhayantīti iti maṃ avhayanti pakkosanti. Aṅgesūti aṅgaraṭṭhe kālacampānagare
atk-s0514a3:2454_2: vasanti. Akkhena devasmīti deva, jūtakīḷanatthena idha anuppattosmi.
atk-s0514a3:2455: Atha rājā “māṇava, tvaṃ jūtena jito kiṃ dassasi, kiṃ te atthī”ti pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2457: “Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto;
atk-s0514a3:2458: Bahūni rañño ratanāni atthi, te tvaṃ daliddo kathamavhayesī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2459_0: Tassattho – kittakāni bhoto māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto akkhadhutto
atk-s0514a3:2459_1: “āharā”ti vatvā hareyya. Rañño pana nivesane bahūni ratanāni atthi, te rājāno evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2459_2: bahudhane tvaṃ daliddo samāno kathaṃ jūtena avhayasīti.
atk-s0514a3:2462: “Manoharo nāma maṇī mamāyaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2463: Imañca ājaññamamittatāpanaṃ, etaṃ me jinitvā hare akkhadhutto”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2464: Pāḷipotthakesu pana “maṇi mama vijjati lohitaṅko”ti likhitaṃ. So pana maṇi veḷuriyo, tasmā idameva sameti.
atk-s0514a3:2465: Tattha ājaññanti imaṃ ājānīyassañca maṇiñcāti etaṃ me ubhayaṃ hareyya akkhadhuttoti assaṃ dassetvā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:2468: “Eko maṇī māṇava kiṃ karissati, ājāniyeko pana kiṃ karissati;
atk-s0514a3:2469: Bahūni rañño maṇiratanāni atthi, ājāniyā vātajavā anappakā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2472_0: So rañño kathaṃ sutvā “mahārāja, kiṃ nāma etaṃ vadetha, eko asso assasahassaṃ lakkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2472_1: hoti, eko maṇi maṇisahassaṃ lakkhaṃ hoti. Na hi sabbe assā ekasadisā, imassa tāva
atk-s0514a3:2472_2: javaṃ passathā”ti vatvā assaṃ abhiruhitvā pākāramatthakena pesesi. Sattayojanikaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2472_3: nagaraṃ assehi gīvāya gīvaṃ paharantehi parikkhittaṃ viya ahosi. Athānukkamena assopi
atk-s0514a3:2472_4: na paññāyi, yakkhopi na paññāyi, udare baddharattapaṭova paññāyi. So assato oruyha
atk-s0514a3:2472_5: “diṭṭho, mahārāja, assassa vego”ti vatvā “āma, diṭṭho”ti vutte “idāni puna passa,
atk-s0514a3:2472_6: mahārājā”ti vatvā assaṃ antonagare uyyāne pokkharaṇiyā udakapiṭṭhe pesesi, khuraggāni
atk-s0514a3:2472_7: atementova pakkhandi. Atha naṃ padumapattesu vicarāpetvā pāṇiṃ paharitvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2472_8: pasāresi, asso āgantvā pāṇitale patiṭṭhāsi. Tato “vaṭṭate evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ narindā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2472_9: vatvā “vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “mahārāja, assaratanaṃ tāva tiṭṭhatu, maṇiratanassa mahānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2478: Nāgarājā supaṇṇā ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2479_0: Tattha itthīnanti etasmiñhi maṇiratane alaṅkatapaṭiyattā anekā itthiviggahā purisaviggahā
atk-s0514a3:2479_1: nānappakārā migapakkhisaṅghā senaṅgādīni ca paññāyanti, tāni dassento evamāha. Nimmitanti
atk-s0514a3:2479_2: idaṃ evarūpaṃ accherakaṃ maṇimhi nimmitaṃ passa.
atk-s0514a3:2487: Tattha balaggānīti balāneva. Viyūḷhānīti byūhavasena ṭhitāni.
atk-s0514a3:2493: Aṭṭālake ca dvāre ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2494_0: Tattha puranti nagaraṃ. Uddhāpasampannanti pākāravatthunā sampannaṃ. Bahupākāratoraṇanti
atk-s0514a3:2494_2: nagarūpacāre vicittā ramaṇīyabhūmiyo. Esikāti nagaradvāresu uṭṭhāpite esikatthambhe.
atk-s0514a3:2494_3: Palikhanti palighaṃ, ayameva vā pāṭho. Aggaḷānīti nagaradvārakavāṭāni. Dvāre cāti gopurāni ca.
atk-s0514a3:2497: Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā.
atk-s0514a3:2501: Tattha toraṇamaggesūti etasmiṃ nagare toraṇaggesu. Kuṇālakāti kāḷakokilā. Citrāti citrapattakokilā.
atk-s0514a3:2508_0: Tattha supākāranti kañcanapākāraparikkhittaṃ. Paṇṇasālāyoti nānābhaṇḍapuṇṇe āpaṇe.
atk-s0514a3:2508_1: Nivesane nivese cāti gehāni ceva gehavatthūni ca. Sandhibyūheti gharasandhiyo ca
atk-s0514a3:2510: “Pānāgāre ca soṇḍe ca, sūnā odaniyā gharā;
atk-s0514a3:2511: Vesī ca gaṇikāyo ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2518_0: Tattha soṇḍe cāti attano anurūpehi kaṇṭhakaṇṇapilandhanehi samannāgate āpānabhūmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2518_1: sajjetvā nisinne surāsoṇḍe ca. Āḷāriketi pūvapāke. Sūdeti bhattakārake. Pāṇissareti
atk-s0514a3:2527: Vetālike ca jalle ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2528_1: nānātūriyānaṃ tāḷitehi saṅghuṭṭhaṃ. Muṭṭhikāti muṭṭhikamallā. Sobhiyāti nagarasobhanā
atk-s0514a3:2528_2: itthī ca sampannarūpā purisā ca. Vetāliketi vetālauṭṭhāpake. Jalleti massūni karonte nhāpite.
atk-s0514a3:2532: Tattha mañcātimañceti mañcānaṃ upari baddhamañce. Bhūmiyoti ramaṇīyā samajjabhūmiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2535: Nihate nihatamāne ca, maṇimhi passa nimmita”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2536: Tattha samajjasminti mallaraṅge. Nihateti nihanitvā jinitvā ṭhite. Nihatamāneti parājite.
atk-s0514a3:2542: Eṇeyyā ca varāhā ca, gaṇino nīkasūkarā.
atk-s0514a3:2546_0: Tattha palāsādāti khaggamigā. “Palatā”tipi pāṭho. Gavajāti gavayā. Varāhāti ekā migajātikā.
atk-s0514a3:2546_1: Tathā gaṇino ceva nīkasūkarā ca. Bahū citrāti nānappakārā citrā migā. Biḷārāti araññabiḷārā.
atk-s0514a3:2553: Tattha najjāyoti nadiyo. Soṇṇavālukasanthatāti suvaṇṇavālukāya santhatatalā. Kumbhīlāti ime evarūpā jalacarā antonadiyaṃ vicaranti, tepi maṇimhi passāhīti.
atk-s0514a3:2557: Tattha veḷuriyakarodāyoti veḷuriyapāsāṇe paharitvā saddaṃ karontiyo evarūpā najjāyoti.
atk-s0514a3:2564: Tattha puthulomanisevitāti mahāmacchehi nisevitā. Vanarājehīti vanarājīhi, ayameva vā pāṭho.
atk-s0514a3:2573: Cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2589_0: Tattha videheti pubbavidehadīpaṃ. Goyāniyeti aparagoyānadīpaṃ. Kuruyoti uttarakuru
atk-s0514a3:2589_1: ca dakkhiṇato jambudīpañca. Anupariyanteti ete candimasūriye sineruṃ anupariyāyante.
atk-s0514a3:2592: Pajjalante ca vaṇṇena, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2594: “Tāvatiṃse ca yāme ca, tusite cāpi nimmite;
atk-s0514a3:2602: Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā ca catuddasa.
atk-s0514a3:2612_0: Tattha dasettha rājiyo setāti etasmiṃ maṇikkhandhe dasa setarājiyo. Cha piṅgalā pannarasāti
atk-s0514a3:2612_1: cha ca pannarasa cāti ekavīsati piṅgalarājiyo. Haliddāti haliddavaṇṇā catuddasa.
atk-s0514a3:2612_2: Tiṃsatīti indagopakavaṇṇābhā tiṃsa rājiyo. Dasa chaccāti dasa ca cha ca soḷasa kāḷarājiyo.
atk-s0514a3:2612_3: Pannavīsatīti pañcavīsati mañjeṭṭhavaṇṇā pabhassarā. Missā bandhukapupphehīti kāḷamañjeṭṭhavaṇṇarājiyo
atk-s0514a3:2612_4: etehi missā vicittikā passa. Ettha hi kāḷarājiyo bandhujīvakapupphehi missā, mañjeṭṭharājiyo
atk-s0514a3:2612_5: nīluppalehi vicittikā. Odhisuṅkanti suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassimaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2612_6: suṅkakoṭṭhāsaṃ passāti vadati. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “hotu suṅkaṃ, mahārājā”tipi pāṭho.
atk-s0514a3:2612_7: Tassattho – dvipaduttama passa tvaṃ imaṃ evarūpaṃ maṇikkhandhaṃ, idameva, mahārāja,
atk-s0514a3:2612_8: suṅkaṃ hotu. Yo maṃ jūte jinissati, tassidaṃ bhavissatīti.
atk-s0514a3:2615_0: Evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako “mahārāja, ahaṃ tāva jūte parājito imaṃ maṇiratanaṃ dassāmi, tvaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2615_1: pana kiṃ dassasī”ti āha. “Tāta, mama sarīrañca deviñca setacchattañca ṭhapetvā sesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2615_2: mama santakaṃ suṅkaṃ hotū”ti. “Tena hi, deva, mā cirāyi, ahaṃ dūrāgato, khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2615_3: sajjāpehī”ti. Rājā amacce āṇāpesi. Te khippaṃ jūtamaṇḍalaṃ sajjetvā rañño varapotthakattharaṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2615_4: santharitvā sesarājūnañcāpi āsanāni paññapetvā puṇṇakassapi patirūpaṃ āsanaṃ paññapetvā
atk-s0514a3:2615_5: rañño kālaṃ ārocayiṃsu. Tato puṇṇako rājānaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi –
atk-s0514a3:2617: “Upāgataṃ rāja mupehi lakkhaṃ, netādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tavatthi;
atk-s0514a3:2618: Dhammena jissāma asāhasena, jito ca no khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2619_0: Tassattho – mahārāja, jūtasālāya kammaṃ upāgataṃ niṭṭhitaṃ, etādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2619_1: tava natthi, mā papañcaṃ karohi, upehi lakkhaṃ akkhehi kīḷanaṭṭhānaṃ upagaccha. Kīḷantā
atk-s0514a3:2619_2: ca mayaṃ dhammena jissāma, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayo hotu. Sace pana tvaṃ jito
atk-s0514a3:2619_3: bhavissasi, atha no khippamavākarohi, papañcaṃ akatvāva jito dhanaṃ dadeyyāsīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0514a3:2620_0: Atha naṃ rājā “māṇava, tvaṃ maṃ ‘rājā’ti mā bhāyi, dhammeneva no asāhasena jayaparājayo
atk-s0514a3:2620_1: bhavissatī”ti āha. Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “amhākaṃ dhammeneva jayaparājayabhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti
atk-s0514a3:2622: “Pañcāla paccuggata sūrasena, macchā ca maddā saha kekakebhi;
atk-s0514a3:2623: Passantu note asaṭhena yuddhaṃ, na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñcī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2624_0: Tattha paccuggatāti uggatattā paññātattā pākaṭattā pañcālarājānamevālapati. Macchā
atk-s0514a3:2624_1: cāti tvañca, samma maccharāja. Maddāti maddarāja. Saha kekakebhīti kekakebhināmena
atk-s0514a3:2624_2: janapadena saha vattamānakekakebhirāja, tvañca. Atha vā sahasaddaṃ “kekakebhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2624_3: padassa pacchato ṭhapetvā paccuggatasaddañca sūrasenavisesanaṃ katvā pañcālapaccuggatasūrasena
atk-s0514a3:2624_4: macchā ca maddā ca kekakebhi saha sesarājāno cāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Passantu
atk-s0514a3:2624_5: noteti amhākaṃ dvinnaṃ ete rājāno asaṭhena akkhayuddhaṃ passantu. Na no sabhāyaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2624_6: na karonti kiñcīti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ, sabhāyaṃ kiñci sakkhiṃ na na karonti,
atk-s0514a3:2624_7: khattiyepi brāhmaṇepi karontiyeva, tasmā sace kiñci akāraṇaṃ uppajjati, “na no sutaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2624_8: na no diṭṭha”nti vattuṃ na labhissatha, appamattā hothāti.
atk-s0514a3:2625_0: Evaṃ yakkhasenāpati rājāno sakkhiṃ akāsi. Rājāpi ekasatarājaparivuto puṇṇakaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a3:2625_1: jūtasālaṃ pāvisi. Sabbepi patirūpāsanesu nisīdiṃsu, rajataphalake suvaṇṇapāsake ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:2625_2: Puṇṇako turitaturito āha “mahārāja, pāsakesu āyā nāma mālikaṃ sāvaṭṭaṃ bahulaṃ santibhadrādayo
atk-s0514a3:2625_3: catuvīsati, tesu tumhe attano ruccanakaṃ āyaṃ gaṇhathā”ti. Rājā “sādhū”ti bahulaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2625_4: gaṇhi. Puṇṇako sāvaṭṭaṃ gaṇhi. Atha naṃ rājā āha “tena hi tāva māṇava, pāsake pātehī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2625_5: “Mahārāja, paṭhamaṃ mama vāro na pāpuṇāti, tumhe pātethā”ti vutte rājā “sādhū”ti
atk-s0514a3:2625_6: sampaṭicchi. Tassa pana tatiye attabhāve mātubhūtapubbā ārakkhadevatā, tassā ānubhāvena
atk-s0514a3:2625_7: rājā jūte jināti. Sā tassa avidūre ṭhitā ahosi. Rājā devadhītaraṃ anussaritvā jūtagītaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2628: “Atha passatu maṃ amma, vijayaṃ me padissatu;
atk-s0514a3:2630: “Devate tvajja rakkha devi, passa mā maṃ vibhāveyya;
atk-s0514a3:2631: Anukampakā patiṭṭhā ca, passa bhadrāni rakkhituṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2634: “Devate me jayaṃ dehi, passa maṃ appabhāginaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2639_0: Rājā evaṃ jūtagītaṃ gāyitvā pāsake hatthena parivattetvā ākāse khipi. Puṇṇakassa
atk-s0514a3:2639_1: ānubhāvena pāsakā rañño parājayāya bhassanti. Rājā jūtasippamhi atikusalatāya pāsake
atk-s0514a3:2639_2: attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā ākāseyeva saṅkaḍḍhanto gahetvā puna ākāse khipi.
atk-s0514a3:2639_3: Dutiyampi attano parājayāya bhassante ñatvā tatheva aggahesi. Tato puṇṇako cintesi
atk-s0514a3:2639_4: “ayaṃ rājā mādisena yakkhena saddhiṃ jūtaṃ kīḷanto bhassamāne pāsake saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2639_5: gaṇhāti, kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti. So olokento tassa ārakkhadevatāya ānubhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0514a3:2639_6: akkhīni ummīletvā kuddho viya naṃ olokesi. Sā bhītatasitā palāyitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2639_7: patvā kampamānā oloketvā aṭṭhāsi. Rājā tatiyampi pāsake khipitvā attano parājayāya
atk-s0514a3:2639_8: bhassante ñatvāpi puṇṇakassānubhāvena hatthaṃ pasāretvā gaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi. Te rañño
atk-s0514a3:2639_9: parājayāya patiṃsu. Athassa parājitabhāvaṃ ñatvā puṇṇako apphoṭetvā mahantena saddena
atk-s0514a3:2639_10: “jitaṃ me”ti tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ nadi. So saddo sakalajambudīpaṃ phari. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2641: “Te pāvisuṃ akkhamadena mattā, rājā kurūnaṃ puṇṇako cāpi yakkho;
atk-s0514a3:2642: Rājā kaliṃ viccinamaggahesi, kaṭaṃ aggahī puṇṇako nāma yakkho.
atk-s0514a3:2644: “Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate, raññaṃ sakāse sakhīnañca majjhe;
atk-s0514a3:2645: Ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2646_0: Tattha pāvisunti jūtasālaṃ pavisiṃsu. Viccinanti rājā catuvīsatiyā āyesu vicinanto
atk-s0514a3:2646_1: kaliṃ parājayaggāhaṃ aggahesi. Kaṭaṃ aggahīti puṇṇako nāma yakkho jayaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0514a3:2646_2: Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgateti te tattha jūte samāgatā ubho jūtaṃ kīḷiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2646_3: Raññanti atha tesaṃ ekasatarājūnaṃ sakāse avasesānañca sakhīnaṃ majjhe so yakkho
atk-s0514a3:2646_4: naravīraseṭṭhaṃ rājānaṃ ajesi. Tatthappanādo tumulo babhūvāti tasmiṃ jūtamaṇḍale
atk-s0514a3:2646_5: “rañño parājitabhāvaṃ jānātha, jitaṃ me, jitaṃ me”ti mahanto saddo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:2647: Rājā parājito anattamano ahosi. Atha naṃ samassāsento puṇṇako gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2649: “Jayo mahārāja parājayo ca, āyūhataṃ aññatarassa hoti;
atk-s0514a3:2650: Janinda jīnosi varaddhanena, jito ca me khippamavākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2651_0: Tattha āyūhatanti dvinnaṃ vāyāmamānānaṃ aññatarassa eva hoti, tasmā “parājitomhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2651_1: mā cintayi. Jīnosīti parihīnosi. Varaddhanenāti paramadhanena. Khippamavākarohīti
atk-s0514a3:2652: Atha naṃ rājā “gaṇha, tātā”ti vadanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2654: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi mayhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2655: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2658: “Hatthī gavāssā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi tuyhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
atk-s0514a3:2659: Tesaṃ varo vidhuro nāma kattā, so me jito taṃ me avākarohī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2660: Tattha so me jito taṃ meti mayā hi tava vijite uttamaṃ ratanaṃ jitaṃ, so ca sabbaratanānaṃ varo vidhuro, tasmā, deva, so mayā jito nāma hoti, taṃ me dehīti.
atk-s0514a3:2663: “Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca, dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;
atk-s0514a3:2664: Asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, pāṇena me sādiso esa kattā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2665_0: Tattha attā ca me soti so mayhaṃ attā ca, mayā ca “attānaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ dassāmī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2665_1: vuttaṃ, tasmā taṃ mā gaṇhi. Na kevalañca attāva, atha kho me so saraṇañca gati ca
atk-s0514a3:2665_2: dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca. Asantuleyyo mama so dhanenāti sattavidhena ratanena
atk-s0514a3:2668: “Ciraṃ vivādo mama tuyhañcassa, kāmañca pucchāma tameva gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2669: Esova no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathā ubhinna”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2670: Tattha vivaratu etamatthanti “so tava attā vā na vā”ti etamatthaṃ esova pakāsetu. Hotu kathā ubhinnanti yaṃ so vakkhati, sāyeva no ubhinnaṃ kathā hotu, taṃ pamāṇaṃ hotūti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2673: “Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, na ca māṇava sāhasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2674: Tameva gantvā pucchāma, tena tussāmubho janā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2675: Tattha na ca māṇava sāhasanti mayhaṃ pasayha sāhasikavacanaṃ na ca bhaṇasi.
atk-s0514a3:2676_0: Evaṃ vatvā rājā ekasatarājāno puṇṇakañca gahetvā tuṭṭhamānaso vegena dhammasabhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2676_1: agamāsi. Paṇḍitopi āsanā oruyha rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Atha puṇṇako
atk-s0514a3:2676_2: mahāsattaṃ āmantetvā “paṇḍita, ‘tvaṃ dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇasī’ti
atk-s0514a3:2676_3: kittisaddo te sakalaloke phuṭo, ahaṃ pana te ajja dhamme ṭhitabhāvaṃ jānissāmī”ti vatvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2678: “Saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2679: Dāsosi rañño uda vāsi ñāti, vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2680_0: Tattha saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccanti “kurūnaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2680_1: raṭṭhe vidhuro nāma amacco dhamme ṭhito jīvitahetupi musāvādaṃ na bhaṇatī”ti evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2680_2: devā vidahū vidahanti kathenti pakāsenti, evaṃ vidahamānā te devā saccaṃ nu vidahanti,
atk-s0514a3:2680_3: udāhu abhūtavādāyeveteti. Vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loketi yā esā tava “vidhuro”ti
atk-s0514a3:2680_4: loke saṅkhā paññatti, sā katamā āsi, tvaṃ pakāsehi, kiṃ nu rañño dāso nīcatarajātiko,
atk-s0514a3:2680_5: udāhu samo vā uttaritaro vā ñātīti idaṃ tāva me ācikkha, dāsosi rañño, uda vāsi ñātīti.
atk-s0514a3:2681_0: Atha mahāsatto “ayaṃ maṃ evaṃ pucchati, ahaṃ kho panetaṃ ‘rañño ñātī’tipi ‘rañño
atk-s0514a3:2681_1: uttaritaro’tipi ‘rañño na kiñci homī’tipi saññāpetuṃ sakkomi, evaṃ santepi imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2681_2: loke saccasamo avassayo nāma natthi, saccameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2681_3: nevāhaṃ rañño ñāti, na uttaritaro, catunnaṃ pana dāsānaṃ aññataro”ti dassetuṃ gāthādvayamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2683: “Āmāyadāsāpi bhavanti heke, dhanena kītāpi bhavanti dāsā;
atk-s0514a3:2684: Sayampi heke upayanti dāsā, bhayā paṇunnāpi bhavanti dāsā.
atk-s0514a3:2686: “Ete narānaṃ caturova dāsā, addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto;
atk-s0514a3:2687: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño, dāsāhaṃ devassa parampi gantvā;
atk-s0514a3:2689_0: Tattha āmāyadāsāti dāsiyā kucchimhi jātadāsā. Sayampi heke upayanti dāsāti ye keci
atk-s0514a3:2689_1: upaṭṭhākajātikā, sabbe te sayaṃ dāsabhāvaṃ upagatā dāsā nāma. Bhayā paṇunnāti rājabhayena
atk-s0514a3:2689_2: vā corabhayena vā attano vasanaṭṭhānato paṇunnā karamarā hutvā paravisayaṃ gatāpi
atk-s0514a3:2689_3: dāsāyeva nāma. Addhā hi yonito ahampi jātoti māṇava, ekaṃseneva ahampi catūsu dāsayonīsu
atk-s0514a3:2689_4: ekato sayaṃ dāsayonito nibbattadāso. Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca raññoti rañño vuḍḍhi
atk-s0514a3:2689_5: vā hotu avuḍḍhi vā, na sakkā mayā musā bhāsituṃ. Parampīti dūraṃ gantvāpi ahaṃ devassa
atk-s0514a3:2689_6: dāsoyeva. Dajjāti maṃ rājā jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā tuyhaṃ dento dhammena sabhāvena dadeyyāti.
atk-s0514a3:2690: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako haṭṭhatuṭṭho puna apphoṭetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2692: “Ayaṃ dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivarettha pañhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2693: Adhammarūpo vata rājaseṭṭho, subhāsitaṃ nānujānāsi mayha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2694_0: Tattha rājaseṭṭhoti ayaṃ rājaseṭṭho adhammarūpo vata. Subhāsitanti vidhurapaṇḍitena
atk-s0514a3:2694_1: sukathitaṃ suvinicchitaṃ. Nānujānāsi mayhanti idānetaṃ vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ mayhaṃ kasmā
atk-s0514a3:2695_0: Taṃ sutvā rājā anattamano hutvā “paṇḍito mādisaṃ yasadāyakaṃ anoloketvā idāni diṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2695_1: māṇavakaṃ oloketī”ti mahāsattassa kujjhitvā “māṇava, sace so dāso me bhaveyya, taṃ
atk-s0514a3:2697: “Evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhaṃ, dāsohamasmi na ca khosmi ñāti;
atk-s0514a3:2698: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gacchā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2699_0: Tattha evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhanti sace so amhākaṃ pañhaṃ “dāsohamasmi, na
atk-s0514a3:2699_1: ca khosmi ñātī”ti evaṃ vivari ettha parisamaṇḍale, atha kiṃ acchasi, sakalaloke dhanānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2699_2: varaṃ etaṃ gaṇha, gahetvā ca pana yena icchasi, tena gacchāti.
atk-s0514a3:2702_0: Evañca pana vatvā rājā cintesi “paṇḍitaṃ gahetvā māṇavo yathāruci gamissati, tassa
atk-s0514a3:2702_1: gatakālato paṭṭhāya mayhaṃ madhuradhammakathā dullabhā bhavissati, yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2702_2: attano ṭhāne ṭhapetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdapetvā gharāvāsapañhaṃ puccheyya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2702_3: Atha naṃ rājā evamāha “paṇḍita, tumhākaṃ gatakāle mama madhuradhammakathā dullabhā
atk-s0514a3:2702_4: bhavissati, alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīdāpetvā attano ṭhāne ṭhatvā mayhaṃ gharāvāsapañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2702_5: kathethā”ti. So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā raññā pañhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2705: Khemā vutti kathaṃ assa, kathaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2708: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2709_0: Tattha khemā vutti kathaṃ assāti kathaṃ gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa gahaṭṭhassa khemā nibbhayā
atk-s0514a3:2709_1: vutti bhaveyya. Kathaṃ nu assa saṅgahoti catubbidho saṅgahavatthusaṅkhāto saṅgaho
atk-s0514a3:2709_2: tassa kathaṃ bhaveyya. Abyābajjhanti niddukkhatā. Saccavādī cāti kathaṃ nu māṇavo
atk-s0514a3:2709_3: saccavādī nāma bhaveyya. Peccāti paralokaṃ gantvā.
atk-s0514a3:2710: Taṃ sutvā paṇḍito rañño pañhaṃ kathesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2716: Na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:2728: Khemā vutti siyā evaṃ, evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
atk-s0514a3:2731: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2732_0: Tattha taṃ tatthāti bhikkhave, taṃ rājānaṃ tattha dhammasabhāyaṃ ñāṇagatiyā gatimā,
atk-s0514a3:2732_1: abbocchinnavīriyena dhitimā, bhūrisamāya vipulāya paññāya matimā, saṇhasukhumatthadassinā
atk-s0514a3:2732_2: ñāṇena atthadassimā, paricchinditvā jānanañāṇasaṅkhātāya paññāya sabbadhammānaṃ saṅkhātā,
atk-s0514a3:2732_3: vidhurapaṇḍito etaṃ “na sādhāraṇadārassā”tiādivacanaṃ abravi. Tattha yo paresaṃ dāresu
atk-s0514a3:2732_4: aparajjhati, so sādhāraṇadāro nāma, tādiso na assa bhaveyya. Na bhuñje sādumekakoti
atk-s0514a3:2732_5: sādurasaṃ paṇītabhojanaṃ aññesaṃ adatvā ekakova na bhuñjeyya. Lokāyatikanti anatthanissitaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2732_6: saggamaggānaṃ adāyakaṃ aniyyānikaṃ vitaṇḍasallāpaṃ lokāyatikavādaṃ na seveyya. Netaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2732_7: paññāya vaḍḍhananti na hi etaṃ lokāyatikaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ. Sīlavāti akhaṇḍehi
atk-s0514a3:2732_8: pañcahi sīlehi samannāgato. Vattasampannoti gharāvāsavattena vā rājavattena vā samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2732_9: Appamattoti kusaladhammesu appamatto. Nivātavuttīti atimānaṃ akatvā nīcavutti ovādānusāsanipaṭicchako.
atk-s0514a3:2732_10: Atthaddhoti thaddhamacchariyavirahito. Suratoti soraccena samannāgato. Sakhiloti
atk-s0514a3:2733_0: Saṅgahetā ca mittānanti kalyāṇamittānaṃ saṅgahakaro. Dānādīsu yo yena saṅgahaṃ icchati,
atk-s0514a3:2733_1: tassa teneva saṅgāhako. Saṃvibhāgīti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañceva kapaṇaddhikavaṇibbakayācakādīnañca
atk-s0514a3:2733_2: saṃvibhāgakaro. Vidhānavāti “imasmiṃ kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2733_3: evaṃ sabbakiccesu vidhānasampanno. Tappeyyāti gahitagahitabhājanāni pūretvā dadamāno
atk-s0514a3:2733_4: tappeyya. Dhammakāmoti paveṇidhammampi sucaritadhammampi kāmayamāno patthayamāno.
atk-s0514a3:2733_5: Sutādhāroti sutassa ādhārabhūto. Paripucchakoti dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇe upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0514a3:2733_6: “kiṃ, bhante, kusala”ntiādivacanehi paripucchanasīlo. Sakkaccanti gāravena. Evaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2733_7: nu assa saṅgahoti saṅgahopissa evaṃ kato nāma bhaveyya. Saccavādīti evaṃ paṭipannoyeva
atk-s0514a3:2734: Evaṃ mahāsatto rañño gharāvāsapañhaṃ kathetvā pallaṅkā oruyha rājānaṃ vandi. Rājāpissa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekasatarājūhi parivuto attano nivesanameva gato.
atk-s0514a3:2737: Mahāsatto pana paṭinivatto. Atha naṃ puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:2739: “Ehi dāni gamissāma, dinno no issarena me;
atk-s0514a3:2741_0: Tattha dinno noti ettha noti nipātamattaṃ, tvaṃ issarena mayhaṃ dinnoti attho. Sanantanoti
atk-s0514a3:2741_1: mama atthaṃ paṭipajjantena hi tayā attano sāmikassa attho paṭipanno hoti. Yañcetaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2741_2: sāmikassa atthakaraṇaṃ nāma, esa dhammo sanantano porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ sabhāvoti.
atk-s0514a3:2745: Tīhañca taṃ vāsayemu agāre, yenaddhunā anusāsemu putte”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2746_0: Tattha tayāhamasmīti tayā laddhohamasmīti jānāmi, labhantena ca na aññathā laddho.
atk-s0514a3:2746_1: Dinnohamasmi tava issarenāti mama issarena raññā ahaṃ tava dinno. Tīhaṃ cāti māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:2746_2: ahaṃ tava bahūpakāro, rājānaṃ anoloketvā saccameva kathesiṃ, tenāhaṃ tayā laddho,
atk-s0514a3:2746_3: tvaṃ me mahantaguṇabhāvaṃ jānāhi, mayaṃ tīṇipi divasāni attano agāre vāsemu, tasmā
atk-s0514a3:2746_4: yenaddhunā yattakena kālena mayaṃ puttādāre anusāsemu, taṃ kālaṃ adhivāsehīti.
atk-s0514a3:2747: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “saccaṃ paṇḍito āha, bahūpakāro esa mama, ‘sattāhampi aḍḍhamāsampi nisīdāhī’ti vutte adhivāsetabbamevā”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2749: “Taṃ me tathā hotu vasemu tīhaṃ, kurutaṃ bhavajja gharesu kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2750: Anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca sukhī bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2751_0: Tattha taṃ meti yaṃ tvaṃ vadesi, sabbaṃ taṃ mama tathā hotu. Bhavajjāti bhavaṃ ajja
atk-s0514a3:2751_1: paṭṭhāya tīhaṃ anusāsatu. Tayī peccāti yathā tayi gate pacchā tava puttadāro sukhī
atk-s0514a3:2752: Evaṃ vatvā puṇṇako mahāsattena saddhiṃyeva tassa nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2754: “Sādhūti vatvāna pahūtakāmo, pakkāmi yakkho vidhurena saddhiṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2756_0: Tattha pahūtakāmoti mahābhogo. Kuñjarājaññahayānuciṇṇanti kuñjarehi ca ājaññahayehi
atk-s0514a3:2756_1: ca anuciṇṇaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. Ariyaseṭṭhoti ācāraariyesu uttamo puṇṇako yakkho paṇḍitassa antepuraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0514a3:2757: Mahāsattassa pana tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ atthāya tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ. Tesu eko koñco nāma, eko mayūro nāma, eko piyaketo nāma. Te sandhāya ayaṃ gāthā vuttā –
atk-s0514a3:2759: “Koñcaṃ mayūrañca piyañca ketaṃ, upāgamī tattha surammarūpaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2761: Tattha tatthāti tesu tīsu pāsādesu yattha tasmiṃ samaye attanā vasati, taṃ surammarūpaṃ pāsādaṃ puṇṇakaṃ ādāya upāgami.
atk-s0514a3:2762_0: So upagantvā ca pana alaṅkatapāsādassa sattamāya bhūmiyā sayanagabbhañceva mahātalañca
atk-s0514a3:2762_1: sajjāpetvā sirisayanaṃ paññāpetvā sabbaṃ annapānādividhiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā devakaññāyo
atk-s0514a3:2762_2: viya pañcasatā itthiyo “imā te pādaparicārikā hontu, anukkaṇṭhanto idha vasāhī”ti
atk-s0514a3:2762_3: tassa niyyādetvā attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Tassa gatakāle tā itthiyo nānātūriyāni
atk-s0514a3:2762_4: gahetvā puṇṇakassa paricariyāya naccādīni paṭṭhapesuṃ. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2766: Tattha avhayanti varāvaranti varato varaṃ naccañca gītañca karontiyo pakkosanti.
atk-s0514a3:2768: “Samaṅgikatvā pamadāhi yakkhaṃ, annena pānena ca dhammapālo;
atk-s0514a3:2770: Tattha pamadāhīti pamadāhi ceva annapānehi ca samaṅgikatvā. Dhammapāloti dhammassa pālako gopako. Atthatthamevāti atthabhūtameva atthaṃ. Bhariyāyāti sabbajeṭṭhikāya bhariyāya.
atk-s0514a3:2773: Bhariyaṃvacā ‘ehi suṇohi bhoti, puttāni āmantaya tambanette”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:2774: Tattha bhariyaṃvacāti jeṭṭhabhariyaṃ avaca. Āmantayāti pakkosa.
atk-s0514a3:2776: “Sutvāna vākyaṃ patino anujjā, suṇisaṃ vaca tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2778_0: Tattha anujjāti evaṃnāmikā. Suṇisaṃvaca tambanakhiṃ sunettanti sā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā
atk-s0514a3:2778_1: assumukhī rodamānā “sayaṃ gantvā putte pakkosituṃ ayuttaṃ, suṇisaṃ pesessāmī”ti tassā
atk-s0514a3:2778_2: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ suṇisaṃ avaca. Vammadharānīti vammadhare
atk-s0514a3:2778_3: sūre, samattheti attho, ābharaṇabhaṇḍameva vā idha “vamma”nti adhippetaṃ, tasmā ābharaṇadharetipi
atk-s0514a3:2778_4: attho. Ceteti taṃ nāmenālapati, puttānīti mama putte ca dhītaro ca. Indīvarapupphasāmeti taṃ ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2779_0: Sā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā pāsādā oruyha anuvicaritvā “pitā vo ovādaṃ dātukāmo pakkosati,
atk-s0514a3:2779_1: idaṃ kira vo tassa pacchimadassana”nti sabbamevassa suhadajanañca puttadhītaro ca
atk-s0514a3:2779_2: sannipātesi. Dhammapālakumāro pana taṃ vacanaṃ sutvāva rodanto kaniṭṭhabhātikagaṇaparivuto
atk-s0514a3:2779_3: pitu santikaṃ agamāsi. Paṇḍito te disvāva sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto assupuṇṇehi
atk-s0514a3:2779_4: nettehi āliṅgitvā sīse cumbitvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ muhuttaṃ hadaye nipajjāpetvā hadayā
atk-s0514a3:2779_5: otāretvā sirigabbhato nikkhamma mahātale pallaṅkamajjhe nisīditvā puttasahassassa
atk-s0514a3:2779_6: ovādaṃ adāsi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2781: “Te āgate muddhani dhammapālo, cumbitvā putte avikampamāno;
atk-s0514a3:2782: Āmantayitvāna avoca vākyaṃ, dinnāhaṃ raññā idha māṇavassa.
atk-s0514a3:2784: “Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyo, ādāya yenicchati tena gacchati;
atk-s0514a3:2785: Ahañca vo sāsitumāgatosmi, kathaṃ ahaṃ aparittāya gacche.
atk-s0514a3:2787: “Sace vo rājā kururaṭṭhavāsī, janasandho puccheyya pahūtakāmo;
atk-s0514a3:2788: Kimābhijānātha pure purāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo pitā puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:2790: “Samāsanā hotha mayāva sabbe, konīdha rañño abbhatiko manusso;
atk-s0514a3:2791: Tamañjaliṃ kariya vadetha evaṃ, mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;
atk-s0514a3:2792: Viyaggharājassa nihīnajacco, samāsano deva kathaṃ bhaveyyā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2793_0: Tattha dhammapāloti mahāsatto. Dinnāhanti ahaṃ jayadhanena khaṇḍetvā raññā dinno.
atk-s0514a3:2793_1: Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyoti ajja paṭṭhāya tīhamattaṃ ahaṃ iminā attano sukhena
atk-s0514a3:2793_2: attasukhī, tato paraṃ pana tassa māṇavassāhaṃ vidheyyo homi. So hi ito catutthe divase
atk-s0514a3:2793_3: ekaṃsena maṃ ādāya yatthicchati, tattha gacchati. Aparittāyāti tumhākaṃ parittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2793_4: akatvā kathaṃ gaccheyyanti anusāsituṃ āgatosmi. Janasandhoti mittabandhanena mittajanassa
atk-s0514a3:2793_5: sandhānakaro. Pure purāṇanti ito pubbe tumhe kiṃ purāṇakāraṇaṃ abhijānātha. Anusāseti
atk-s0514a3:2793_6: anusāsi. Evaṃ tumhe raññā puṭṭhā “amhākaṃ pitā imañcimañca ovādaṃ adāsī”ti katheyyātha.
atk-s0514a3:2793_7: Samāsanā hothāti sace vo rājā mayā dinnassa ovādassa kathitakāle “etha tumhe, ajja
atk-s0514a3:2793_8: mayā saddhiṃ samāsanā hotha, idha rājakule tumhehi añño ko nu rañño abbhatiko manusso”ti
atk-s0514a3:2793_9: attano āsane nisīdāpeyya, atha tumhe añjaliṃ katvā taṃ rājānaṃ evaṃ vadeyyātha “deva,
atk-s0514a3:2793_10: evaṃ mā avaca. Na hi amhākaṃ esapaveṇidhammo. Viyaggharājassa kesarasīhassa nihīnajacco
atk-s0514a3:2793_11: jarasiṅgālo, deva, kathaṃ samāsano bhaveyya. Yathā siṅgālo sīhassa samāsano na hoti,
atk-s0514a3:2794: Imaṃ panassa kathaṃ sutvā puttadhītaro ca ñātisuhajjādayo ca dāsakammakaraporisā ca te sabbe sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā mahāviravaṃ viraviṃsu. Tesaṃ mahāsatto saññāpesi.
atk-s0514a3:2797_0: Atha ne paṇḍito puttadhītaro ca ñātayo ca upasaṅkamitvā tuṇhībhūte disvā “tātā, mā
atk-s0514a3:2797_1: cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno, apica tumhākaṃ rājavasatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2797_2: nāma yasapaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ kathessāmi, taṃ ekaggacittā suṇāthā”ti buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:2797_3: nāma paṭṭhapesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2799: “So ca putte amacce ca, ñātayo suhadajjane;
atk-s0514a3:2803: Yathā rājakulaṃ patto, yasaṃ poso nigacchatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2804_0: Tattha suhadajjaneti suhadayajane. Ethayyoti etha, ayyo. Piyasamudācārena putte ālapati.
atk-s0514a3:2804_1: Rājavasatinti mayā vuccamānaṃ rājapāricariyaṃ suṇātha. Yathāti yena kāraṇena rājakulaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2804_2: patto upasaṅkamanto rañño santike caranto poso yasaṃ nigacchati labhati, taṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇāthāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2806: “Na hi rājakulaṃ patto, aññāto labhate yasaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2810: Atha vissasate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhatī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2811_0: Tattha aññātoti apākaṭaguṇo aviditakammāvadāno. Nāsūroti na asūro bhīrukajātiko.
atk-s0514a3:2811_1: Yadāssa sīlanti yadā assa sevakassa rājā sīlañca paññañca soceyyañca adhigacchati,
atk-s0514a3:2811_2: ācārasampattiñca ñāṇabalañca sucibhāvañca jānāti. Atha vissasate tyamhīti atha rājā
atk-s0514a3:2811_3: tamhi vissasate vissāsaṃ karoti, attano guyhañcassa na rakkhati na gūhati.
atk-s0514a3:2814: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2818_0: Tattha tulā yathāti yathā esā vuttappakārā tulā na onamati na unnamati, evameva rājasevako
atk-s0514a3:2818_1: kismiñcideva kamme raññā “idaṃ nāma karohī”ti ajjhiṭṭho āṇatto chandādiagativasena
atk-s0514a3:2818_2: na vikampeyya, sabbakiccesu paggahitatulā viya samo bhaveyya. Sa rājavasatinti so
atk-s0514a3:2818_3: evarūpo sevako rājakule vāsaṃ vaseyya, rājānaṃ paricareyya, evaṃ paricaranto pana
atk-s0514a3:2818_4: yasaṃ labheyyāti attho. Sabbāni abhisambhontoti sabbāni rājakiccāni karonto.
atk-s0514a3:2820: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2821: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2823: “Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
atk-s0514a3:2827: Na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2828_0: Tattha na vikampeyyāti avikampamāno tāni kiccāni kareyya. Yo cassāti yo ca rañño
atk-s0514a3:2828_1: gamanamaggo sukato assa suppaṭiyādito sumaṇḍito, “iminā maggena gacchā”ti vuttopi tena na gaccheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2831: Sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2833: “Na rañño sadisaṃ vatthaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2834: Ākappaṃ sarakuttiṃ vā, na rañño sadisamācare;
atk-s0514a3:2835: Aññaṃ kareyya ākappaṃ, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2836_0: Tattha na raññoti rañño kāmabhogena samaṃ kāmabhogaṃ na bhuñjeyya. Tādisassa hi rājā
atk-s0514a3:2836_1: kujjhati. Sabbatthāti sabbesu rūpādīsu kāmaguṇesu rañño pacchatova gaccheyya, hīnatarameva
atk-s0514a3:2836_2: seveyyāti attho. Aññaṃ kareyyāti rañño ākappato sarakuttito ca aññameva ākappaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2843_0: Tattha bhāvanti vissāsavasena adhippāyaṃ. Acapaloti amaṇḍanasīlo. Nipakoti paripakkañāṇo.
atk-s0514a3:2843_1: Saṃvutindriyoti pihitachaḷindriyo rañño vā aṅgapaccaṅgāni orodhe vāssa na olokeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2843_2: Manopaṇidhisampannoti acapalena suṭṭhu ṭhapitena cittena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2846: Nāssa kosā dhanaṃ gaṇhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2848: “Na niddaṃ bahu maññeyya, na madāya suraṃ pive;
atk-s0514a3:2849: Nāssa dāye mige haññe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2851: “Nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃ rathaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2857: “Na ve rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno;
atk-s0514a3:2862_0: Tattha na manteyyāti tassa rañño bhariyāhi saddhiṃ neva kīḷeyya, na raho manteyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_1: Kosā dhananti rañño kosā dhanaṃ thenetvā na gaṇheyya. Na madāyāti tātā, rājasevako
atk-s0514a3:2862_2: nāma madatthāya suraṃ na piveyya. Nāssa dāye migeti assa rañño dinnābhaye mige na
atk-s0514a3:2862_3: haññeyya. Kocchanti bhaddapīṭhaṃ. Sammatomhīti ahaṃ sammato hutvā evaṃ karomīti na
atk-s0514a3:2862_4: āruheyya. Sammukhañcassa tiṭṭheyyāti assa rañño purato khuddakamahantakathāsavanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2862_5: tiṭṭheyya. Sandissanto sabhattunoti yo rājasevako tassa bhattuno dassanaṭṭhāne tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0514a3:2862_6: Sūkenāti akkhimhi patitena vīhisūkādinā ghaṭṭitaṃ akkhi pakatisabhāvaṃ jahantaṃ yathā
atk-s0514a3:2862_7: kujjhati nāma, evaṃ kujjhanti, na tesu vissāso kātabbo. Pūjito maññamānoti ahaṃ rājapūjitomhīti
atk-s0514a3:2862_8: maññamāno. Pharusaṃ patimanteyyāti yena so kujjhati, tathārūpaṃ na manteyya.
atk-s0514a3:2865: Aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2867: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sampaggaṇhāti khattiyo;
atk-s0514a3:2868: Gāmehi nigamehi vā, raṭṭhehi janapadehi vā;
atk-s0514a3:2870_0: Tattha laddhadvāro labhe dvāranti ahaṃ nippaṭihāro laddhadvāroti appaṭihāretvā na
atk-s0514a3:2870_1: paviseyya, punapi dvāraṃ labheyya, paṭihāretvāva paviseyyāti attho. Saṃyatoti appamatto
atk-s0514a3:2870_2: hutvā. Bhātaraṃ vā santi sakaṃ bhātaraṃ vā. Sampaggaṇhātīti “asukagāmaṃ vā asukanigamaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2870_3: vā assa demā”ti yadā sevakehi saddhiṃ katheti. Na bhaṇe chekapāpakanti tadā guṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2874: Na tesaṃ antarā gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2877: Paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2880: Appāsī nipako sūro, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2881_0: Tattha na tesaṃ antarā gaccheti tesaṃ lābhassa antarā na gacche, antarāyaṃ na kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2881_1: Vaṃsovāpīti yathā vaṃsagumbato uggatavaṃso vātena pahaṭakāle pakampati, evaṃ raññā
atk-s0514a3:2881_2: kathitakāle pakampeyya. Cāpovūnudaroti yathā cāpo mahodaro na hoti, evaṃ mahodaro
atk-s0514a3:2881_3: na siyā. Ajivhavāti yathā maccho ajivhatāya na katheti, tathā sevako mandakathatāya
atk-s0514a3:2884: Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ bālyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
atk-s0514a3:2887: Avikiṇṇaṃ mitaṃ vācaṃ, patte kāle udīraye.
atk-s0514a3:2890: Samphaṃ giraṃ na bhāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2894_0: Tattha na bāḷhanti punappunaṃ kilesavasena na gaccheyya. Tejasaṅkhayanti evaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0514a3:2894_1: hi puriso tejasaṅkhayaṃ gacchati pāpuṇāti, taṃ sampassanto bāḷhaṃ na gaccheyya. Daranti
atk-s0514a3:2894_2: kāyadarathaṃ. Bālyanti dubbalabhāvaṃ. Khīṇamedhoti punappunaṃ kilesarativasena khīṇapañño
atk-s0514a3:2894_3: puriso ete kāsādayo nigacchati. Nātivelanti tātā rājūnaṃ santike pamāṇātikkantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2894_4: na bhāseyya. Patte kāleti attano vacanakāle sampatte. Asaṅghaṭṭoti paraṃ asaṅghaṭṭento.
atk-s0514a3:2897: Appamatto suci dakkho, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2904_0: Tattha vinītoti ācārasampanno. Sippavāti attano kule sikkhitabbasippena samannāgato.
atk-s0514a3:2904_1: Dantoti chasu dvāresu nibbisevano. Katattoti sampāditatto. Niyatoti yasādīni nissāya
atk-s0514a3:2904_2: acalasabhāvo. Mudūti anatimānī. Appamattoti kattabbakiccesu pamādarahito. Dakkhoti
atk-s0514a3:2904_3: upaṭṭhāne cheko. Nivātavuttīti nīcavutti. Sukhasaṃvāsoti garusaṃvāsasīlo. Sahituṃ
atk-s0514a3:2904_4: patitanti pararājūhi sakarañño santikaṃ guyharakkhaṇavasena vā paṭicchannapākaṭakaraṇavasenavā
atk-s0514a3:2904_5: pesitaṃ. Tathārūpena hi saddhiṃ kathentopi rañño sammukhāva katheyya. Bhattāraññevudikkheyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2904_6: attano sāmikameva olokeyya. Na ca aññassa rājinoti aññassa rañño santako na bhaveyya.
atk-s0514a3:2917_0: Tattha sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyyāti gāravena punappunaṃ upasaṅkameyya. Anuvāseyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2917_1: uposathavāsaṃ vasanto anuvatteyya. Tappeyyāti yāvadatthaṃ dānena tappeyya. Āsajjāti
atk-s0514a3:2917_2: upasaṅkamitvā. Paññeti paṇḍite, āsajjapaññe vā, asajjamānapaññeti attho.
atk-s0514a3:2920: Na ca kiñci nivāreyya, dānakāle vaṇibbake.
atk-s0514a3:2923: Kālaññū samayaññū ca, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2927_0: Tattha dinnapubbanti pakatipaṭiyattaṃ dānavattaṃ. Samaṇabrāhmaṇeti samaṇe vā brāhmaṇe
atk-s0514a3:2927_1: vā. Vaṇibbaketi dānakāle vaṇibbake āgate disvā kiñci na nivāreyya. Paññavāti vicāraṇapaññāya
atk-s0514a3:2927_3: dāsakammakaraporisādīnaṃ saṃvidahanakoṭṭhāsesu cheko. Kālaññūti “ayaṃ dānaṃ dātuṃ,
atk-s0514a3:2927_4: ayaṃ sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ, ayaṃ uposathakammaṃ kātuṃ kālo”ti jāneyya. Samayaññūti “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2927_5: kasanasamayo, ayaṃ vapanasamayo, ayaṃ vohārasamayo, ayaṃ upaṭṭhānasamayo”ti jāneyya.
atk-s0514a3:2929: “Khalaṃ sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2930: Mitaṃ dhaññaṃ nidhāpeyya, mitaṃva pācaye ghare.
atk-s0514a3:2932: “Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sīlesu asamāhitaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2933: Anaṅgavā hi te bālā, yathā petā tatheva te;
atk-s0514a3:2938_0: Tattha pasuṃ khettanti gokulañceva sassaṭṭhānañca. Gantāti gamanasīlo. Mitanti minitvā
atk-s0514a3:2938_1: ettakanti ñatvā koṭṭhesu nidhāpeyya. Ghareti gharepi parijanaṃ gaṇetvā mitameva pacāpeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2938_2: Sīlesu asamāhitanti evarūpaṃ dussīlaṃ anācāraṃ kismiñci ādhipaccaṭṭhāne na ṭhapeyyāti
atk-s0514a3:2938_3: attho. Anaṅgavā hi te bālāti “aṅgametaṃ manussānaṃ, bhātā loke pavuccatī”ti kiñcāpi
atk-s0514a3:2938_4: jeṭṭhakaniṭṭhabhātaro aṅgasamānatāya “aṅga”nti vuttā, ime pana dussīlā, tasmā aṅgasamānā
atk-s0514a3:2938_5: na honti. Yathā pana susāne chaḍḍitā petā matā, tatheva te. Tasmā tādisā ādhipaccaṭṭhāne
atk-s0514a3:2938_6: na ṭhapetabbā. Kuṭumbañhi te vināsenti, vinaṭṭhakuṭumbassa ca daliddassa rājavasati
atk-s0514a3:2938_7: nāma na sampajjati. Āsīnānanti āgantvā nisinnānaṃ puttabhātānaṃ matasattānaṃ matakabhattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2938_8: viya dento ghāsacchādanamattameva padāpeyya. Uṭṭhānasampanneti uṭṭhānavīriyena samannāgate.
atk-s0514a3:2940: “Sīlavā ca alolo ca, anurakkho ca rājino;
atk-s0514a3:2941: Āvī raho hito tassa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
atk-s0514a3:2947: Āhatopi na kuppeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2948_0: Tattha aloloti aluddho. Cittaṭṭhoti citte ṭhito, rājacittavasikoti attho. Asaṅkusakavuttissāti
atk-s0514a3:2948_1: appaṭilomavutti assa. Adhosiranti pāde dhovantopi adhosiraṃ katvā heṭṭhāmukhova dhoveyya,
atk-s0514a3:2953: “Yo deti sayanaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ āvasathaṃ gharaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2958_0: Tattha kumbhampañjaliṃ kariyā, cāṭañcāpi padakkhiṇanti vuddhiṃ paccāsīsanto puriso
atk-s0514a3:2958_1: udakapūritaṃ kumbhaṃ disvā tassa añjaliṃ kareyya, cāṭañca sakuṇaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ kareyya.
atk-s0514a3:2958_2: Añjaliṃ vā padakkhiṇaṃ vā karontassa te kiñci dātuṃ na sakkonti. Kimevāti yo pana
atk-s0514a3:2958_3: sabbakāmānaṃ dātā dhīro ca, taṃ rājānaṃ kiṃkāraṇā na namasseyya. Rājāyeva hi namassitabbo
atk-s0514a3:2958_4: ca ārādhetabbo ca. Pajjunnorivāti megho viya. Esayyo rājavasatīti ayyo yā ayaṃ mayā
atk-s0514a3:2958_5: kathitā, esā rājavasati nāma rājasevakānaṃ anusāsanī. Yathāti yāya rājavasatiyā vattamāno
atk-s0514a3:2958_6: naro rājānaṃ ārādheti, rājūnañca santikā pūjaṃ labhati, sā esāti.
atk-s0514a3:2959: Evaṃ asamadhuro vidhurapaṇḍito buddhalīlāya rājavasatiṃ kathesi;
atk-s0514a3:2962_0: Evaṃ puttadārañātimittasuhajjādayo anusāsantasseva tassa tayo divasā jātā. So divasassa
atk-s0514a3:2962_1: pāripūriṃ ñatvā pātova nhatvā nānaggarasabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā “rājānaṃ apaloketvā māṇavena
atk-s0514a3:2962_2: saddhiṃ gamissāmī”ti ñātigaṇaparivuto rājanivesanaṃ gantvā rājānaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2962_3: ṭhito vattabbayuttakaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2967: “Vanditvā sirasā pāde, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2973: “Putte ca me udikkhesi, yañca maññaṃ ghare dhanaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2974: Yathā pecca na hāyetha, ñātisaṅgho mayī gate.
atk-s0514a3:2977: Evetaṃ khalitaṃ mayhaṃ, etaṃ passāmi accaya”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2978_0: Tattha suhadehīti suhadayehi ñātimittādīhi. Yañca maññanti yañca me aññaṃ tayā ceva
atk-s0514a3:2978_1: aññehi ca rājūhi dinnaṃ ghare aparimāṇaṃ dhanaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvameva olokeyyāsi. Peccāti
atk-s0514a3:2978_2: pacchākāle. Khalatīti pakkhalati. Evetanti evaṃ etaṃ. Ahañhi bhūmiyaṃ khalitvā tattheva
atk-s0514a3:2978_3: patiṭṭhitapuriso viya tumhesu khalitvā tumhesuyeva patiṭṭhahāmi. Etaṃ passāmīti yo
atk-s0514a3:2978_4: esa “kiṃ te rājā hotī”ti māṇavena puṭṭhassa mama tumhe anoloketvā saccaṃ apekkhitvā
atk-s0514a3:2978_5: “dāsohamasmī”ti vadantassa accayo, etaṃ accayaṃ passāmi, añño pana me doso natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2978_6: taṃ me accayaṃ tumhe khamatha, etaṃ hadaye katvā pacchā mama puttadāresu mā aparajjhitthāti.
atk-s0514a3:2979: Taṃ sutvā rājā “paṇḍita, tava gamanaṃ mayhaṃ na ruccati, māṇavaṃ upāyena pakkosāpetvā ghātetvā kilañjena paṭicchādetuṃ mayhaṃ ruccatī”ti dīpento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:2981: “Sakkā na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā vadhitvā idha kātiyānaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:2982: Idheva hohī iti mayha ruccati, mā tvaṃ agā uttamabhūripaññā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:2983: Tattha chetvāti idheva rājagehe taṃ pothetvā māretvā paṭicchādessāmīti.
atk-s0514a3:2984: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “deva, tumhākaṃ ajjhāsayo evarūpo hoti, so tumhesu ayutto”ti vatvā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2986: “Mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;
atk-s0514a3:2987: Dhiratthu kammaṃ akusalaṃ anariyaṃ, yaṃ katvā pacchā nirayaṃ vajeyya.
atk-s0514a3:2989: “Nevesa dhammo na puneta kiccaṃ, ayiro hi dāsassa janinda issaro;
atk-s0514a3:2990: Ghātetuṃ jhāpetuṃ athopi hantuṃ, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:2991_0: Tattha mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahīti adhammesu anatthesu ayuttesu tava cittaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2991_1: mā heva paṇidahīti attho. Pacchāti yaṃ kammaṃ katvāpi ajarāmaro na hoti, atha kho
atk-s0514a3:2991_2: pacchā nirayameva upapajjeyya. Dhiratthu kammanti taṃ kammaṃ garahitaṃ atthu assa
atk-s0514a3:2991_3: bhaveyya. Nevesāti neva esa. Ayiroti sāmiko. Ghātetunti etāni ghātādīni kātuṃ ayiro
atk-s0514a3:2991_4: dāsassa issaro, sabbānetāni kātuṃ labhati, mayhaṃ māṇave appamattakopi kodho natthi,
atk-s0514a3:2991_5: dinnakālato paṭṭhāya tava cittaṃ sandhāretuṃ vaṭṭati, vajāmi ahaṃ narindāti āha –
atk-s0514a3:2992_0: Evaṃ vatvā mahāsatto rājānaṃ vanditvā rañño orodhe ca puttadāre ca rājaparisañca
atk-s0514a3:2992_1: ovaditvā tesu sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkuṇitvā mahāviravaṃ viravantesuyeva rājanivesanā
atk-s0514a3:2992_2: nikkhami. Sakalanagaravāsinopi “paṇḍito kira māṇavena saddhiṃ gamissati, etha, passissāma
atk-s0514a3:2992_3: na”nti mantayitvā rājaṅgaṇeyeva naṃ passiṃsu. Atha ne mahāsatto assāsetvā “tumhe
atk-s0514a3:2992_4: mā cintayittha, sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā, sarīraṃ addhuvaṃ, yaso nāma vipattipariyosāno,
atk-s0514a3:2992_5: apica tumhe dānādīsu puññesu appamattā hothā”ti tesaṃ ovādaṃ datvā nivattāpetvā attano
atk-s0514a3:2992_6: gehābhimukho pāyāsi. Tasmiṃ khaṇe dhammapālakumāro bhātikagaṇaparivuto “pitu paccuggamanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2992_7: karissāmī”ti nikkhanto nivesanadvāreyeva pitu sammukho ahosi. Mahāsatto taṃ disvā
atk-s0514a3:2992_8: sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ asakkonto upaguyha ure nipajjāpetvā nivesanaṃ pāvisi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2996_0: Ghare panassa sahassaputtā, sahassadhītaro, sahassabhariyāyo, ca sattavaṇṇadāsisatāni
atk-s0514a3:2996_1: ca santi, tehi ceva avasesadāsidāsakammakarañātimittasuhajjādīhi ca sakalanivesanaṃ
atk-s0514a3:2996_2: yugantavātābhighātapatitehi sālehi sālavanaṃ viya nirantaraṃ ahosi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:2999: Senti puttā ca dārā ca, vidhurassa nivesane.
atk-s0514a3:3004: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3014: Bāhā paggayha pakkantuṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3016: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3017: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3020: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasi.
atk-s0514a3:3023: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, kasmā no vijahissasī”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3024_0: Tattha sentīti mahātale chinnapādā viya patitā āvattantā parivattantā sayanti. Itthisahassaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3024_1: bhariyānanti bhariyānameva itthīnaṃ sahassaṃ. Kasmā no vijahissasīti kena kāraṇena
atk-s0514a3:3025_0: Mahāsatto sabbaṃ taṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetvā ghare avasesakiccāni katvā antojanañca bahijanañca
atk-s0514a3:3025_1: ovaditvā ācikkhitabbayuttakaṃ sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā puṇṇakassa santikaṃ gantvā attano
atk-s0514a3:3025_2: niṭṭhitakiccataṃ ārocesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3028: Mittāmacce ca bhacce ca, puttadāre ca bandhave.
atk-s0514a3:3033: “Avasī tuvaṃ mayha tīhaṃ agāre, katāni kiccāni gharesu mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3034: Anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna yathāmatiṃ te”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3035_0: Tattha kammantaṃ saṃvidhetvānāti “evañca kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti ghare kattabbayuttakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3035_1: kammaṃ saṃvidahitvā. Nidhinti nidahitvā ṭhapitadhanaṃ. Iṇadānanti iṇavasena saṃyojitadhanaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3035_2: Yathāmatiṃ teti idāni tava ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ karomāti vadati.
atk-s0514a3:3038: “Sace hi katte anusāsitā te, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
atk-s0514a3:3039: Handehi dānī taramānarūpo, dīgho hi addhāpi ayaṃ puratthā.
atk-s0514a3:3043: Tattha katteti somanassappatto yakkho mahāsattaṃ ālapati. Dīgho hi addhāpīti gantabbamaggopi dīgho. “Achambhitovā”ti idaṃ so heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ anotaritvā tatova gantukāmo hutvā avaca.
atk-s0514a3:3046: “Sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissaṃ, yassa me natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3047: Kāyena vācā manasā, yena gaccheyya duggati”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3048: Tattha sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissanti idaṃ mahāsatto “achambhitova gaṇhāhī”ti vuttattā evamāha.
atk-s0514a3:3049_0: Evaṃ mahāsatto sīhanādaṃ naditvā achambhito kesarasīho viya nibbhayo hutvā “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3049_1: sāṭako mama aruciyā mā muccatū”ti adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ purecārikaṃ katvā daḷhaṃ nivāsetvā
atk-s0514a3:3049_2: assassa vāladhiṃ viyūhitvā ubhohi hatthehi daḷhaṃ vāladhiṃ gahetvā dvīhi pādehi assassa
atk-s0514a3:3049_3: ūrūsu paliveṭhetvā “māṇava, gahito me vāladhi, yathāruci yāhī”ti āha. Tasmiṃ khaṇe
atk-s0514a3:3049_4: puṇṇako manomayasindhavassa saññaṃ adāsi. So paṇḍitaṃ ādāya ākāse pakkhandi. Tamatthaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3053_0: Tattha sākhāsu selesu asajjamānoti puṇṇako kira cintesi “dūraṃ agantvāva imaṃ himavantappadese
atk-s0514a3:3053_1: rukkhesu pabbatesu ca pothetvā māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ ādāya kaḷevaraṃ pabbatantare
atk-s0514a3:3053_2: chaḍḍetvā nāgabhavanameva gamissāmī”ti. So rukkhe ca pabbate ca apariharitvā tesaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3053_3: majjheneva assaṃ pesesi. Mahāsattassānubhāvena rukkhāpi pabbatāpi sarīrato ubhosu
atk-s0514a3:3053_4: passesu ratanamattaṃ paṭikkamanti. So “mato vā, no vā”ti parivattitvā mahāsattassa
atk-s0514a3:3053_5: mukhaṃ olokento kañcanādāsamiva vippasannaṃ disvā “ayaṃ evaṃ na maratī”ti punapi
atk-s0514a3:3053_6: sakalahimavantappadese rukkhe ca pabbate ca tikkhattuṃ pothento pesesi. Evaṃ pothentopi
atk-s0514a3:3053_7: tatheva rukkhapabbatā dūrameva paṭikkamantiyeva. Mahāsatto pana kilantakāyo ahosi.
atk-s0514a3:3053_8: Atha puṇṇako “ayaṃ neva marati, idāni vātakkhandhe cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti kodhābhibhūto
atk-s0514a3:3053_9: sattamaṃ vātakkhandhaṃ pakkhandi. Bodhisattassānubhāvena vātakkhandho dvidhā hutvā
atk-s0514a3:3053_10: bodhisattassa okāsaṃ akāsi. Tato verambhavātehi paharāpesi, verambhavātāpi satasahassaasanisaddo
atk-s0514a3:3053_11: viya hutvā bodhisattassa okāsaṃ adaṃsu. So puṇṇako tassa antarāyābhāvaṃ passanto
atk-s0514a3:3053_12: taṃ ādāya kāḷapabbataṃ agamāsi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3056: Tattha asajjamānoti alaggamāno appaṭihaññamāno vidhurapaṇḍitaṃ vahanto kāḷapabbatamatthakaṃ upāgato.
atk-s0514a3:3057_0: Evaṃ puṇṇakassa mahāsattaṃ gahetvā gatakāle paṇḍitassa puttadārādayo puṇṇakassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3057_1: gantvā tattha mahāsattaṃ adisvā chinnapādā viya patitvā aparāparaṃ parivattamānā
atk-s0514a3:3057_2: mahāsaddena parideviṃsu. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3062: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3074: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3075: “Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
atk-s0514a3:3076: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3078: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato’.
atk-s0514a3:3081: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, ‘paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato”’ti.
atk-s0514a3:3082_0: Evaṃ pakkanditvā ca pana te sabbepi sakalanagaravāsīhi saddhiṃ roditvā rājadvāraṃ
atk-s0514a3:3082_1: agamaṃsu. Rājā mahantaṃ paridevasaddaṃ sutvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā “tumhe kasmā
atk-s0514a3:3082_2: paridevathā”ti pucchi. Athassa te “deva, so kira māṇavo na brāhmaṇo, yakkho pana
atk-s0514a3:3082_3: brāhmaṇavaṇṇena āgantvā paṇḍitaṃ ādāya gato, tena vinā amhākaṃ jīvitaṃ natthi. Sace
atk-s0514a3:3082_4: so ito sattame divase nāgamissati, sakaṭasatehi sakaṭasahassehi ca dārūni saṅkaḍḍhitvā
atk-s0514a3:3082_5: sabbe mayaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletvā pavisissāmā”ti imamatthaṃ ārocentā imaṃ gāthamāhaṃsu –
atk-s0514a3:3085: Sabbe aggiṃ pavekkhāma, natthattho jīvitena no”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3086_0: Sammāsambuddhassa parinibbutakālepi “mayaṃ aggiṃ pavisitvā marissāmā”ti vattāro nāma
atk-s0514a3:3086_1: nāhesuṃ. Aho subhāsitaṃ mahāsatte nāgarehīti. Rājā tesaṃ kathaṃ sutvā “tumhe mā cintayittha,
atk-s0514a3:3086_2: mā socittha, mā paridevittha, madhurakatho paṇḍito māṇavaṃ dhammakathāya palobhetvā
atk-s0514a3:3086_3: attano pādesu pātetvā sakalanagaravāsīnaṃ assumukhaṃ hāsayanto na cirasseva āgamissatī”ti
atk-s0514a3:3088: “Paṇḍito ca viyatto ca, vibhāvī ca vicakkhaṇo;
atk-s0514a3:3090_0: Tattha viyattoti veyyattiyā vicāraṇapaññāya samannāgato. Vibhāvīti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3090_1: vibhāvetvā dassetvā kathetuṃ samattho. Vicakkhaṇoti taṅkhaṇeyeva ṭhānuppattikāya
atk-s0514a3:3090_2: kāraṇacintanapaññāya yutto. Mā bhāyitthāti mā bhāyatha, attānaṃ mocetvā khippaṃ āgamissatīti assāseti.
atk-s0514a3:3091: Nāgarāpi “paṇḍito kira rañño kathetvā gato bhavissatī”ti assāsaṃ paṭilabhitvā attano gehāni pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0514a3:3094_0: Puṇṇakopi mahāsattaṃ kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhapetvā “imasmiṃ jīvamāne mayhaṃ vuḍḍhi nāma
atk-s0514a3:3094_1: natthi, imaṃ māretvā hadayamaṃsaṃ gahetvā nāgabhavanaṃ gantvā vimalāya datvā irandhatiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3094_2: gahetvā devalokaṃ gamissāmī”ti cintesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3096: “So tattha gantvāna vicintayanto, uccāvacā cetanakā bhavanti;
atk-s0514a3:3097: Nayimassa jīvena mamatthi kiñci, hantvānimaṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3098_0: Tattha soti so puṇṇako. Tattha gantvānāti gantvā tattha kāḷāgirimatthake ṭhito. Uccāvacā
atk-s0514a3:3098_1: cetanakā bhavantīti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānā cetanā uccāpi avacāpi uppajjanti. Ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3098_2: kho panetaṃ vijjati, yaṃ mametassa jīvitadānacetanāpi uppajjeyyāti. Imassa pana jīvitena
atk-s0514a3:3098_3: tahiṃ nāgabhavane mama appamattakampi kiñci kiccaṃ natthi, idhevimaṃ māretvā assa
atk-s0514a3:3099_0: Tato puna cintesi “yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ sahatthena amāretvā bheravarūpadassanena jīvitakkhayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3099_1: pāpeyya”nti. So bheravayakkharūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāsattaṃ tajjento āgantvā taṃ pātetvā
atk-s0514a3:3099_2: dāṭhānaṃ antare katvā khāditukāmo viya ahosi, mahāsattassa lomahaṃsanamattampi nāhosi.
atk-s0514a3:3099_3: Tato sīharūpena mattamahāhatthirūpena ca āgantvā dāṭhāhi ceva dantehi ca vijjhitukāmo
atk-s0514a3:3099_4: viya ahosi. Tathāpi abhāyantassa ekadoṇikanāvappamāṇaṃ mahantaṃ sappavaṇṇaṃ nimminitvā
atk-s0514a3:3099_5: assasanto passasanto “susū”ti saddaṃ karonto āgantvā mahāsattassa sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā
atk-s0514a3:3099_6: matthake phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi, tassa sārajjamattampi nāhosi. Atha “naṃ pabbatamatthake
atk-s0514a3:3099_7: ṭhapetvā pātetvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ karissāmī”ti mahāvātaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi. So tassa kesaggamattampi
atk-s0514a3:3099_8: cāletuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ tattheva pabbatamatthake ṭhapetvā hatthī viya khajjūrirukkhaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3099_9: pabbataṃ aparāparaṃ cālesi, tathāpi naṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato kesaggamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0514a3:3100_0: Tato “saddasantāsenassa hadayaphālanaṃ katvā māressāmī”ti antopabbataṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0514a3:3100_1: pathaviñca nabhañca ekaninnādaṃ karonto mahānādaṃ nadi, evampissa sārajjamattampi
atk-s0514a3:3100_2: nāhosi. Jānāti hi mahāsatto “yakkhasīhahatthināgarājavesehi āgatopi mahāvātavuṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3100_3: samuṭṭhāpakopi pabbatacalanaṃ karontopi antopabbataṃ pavisitvā nādaṃ vissajjentopi
atk-s0514a3:3100_4: māṇavoyeva, na añño”ti. Tato puṇṇako cintesi “nāhaṃ imaṃ bāhirupakkamena māretuṃ
atk-s0514a3:3100_5: sakkomi, sahattheneva naṃ māressāmī”ti. Tato yakkho mahāsattaṃ pabbatamuddhani ṭhapetvā
atk-s0514a3:3100_6: pabbatapādaṃ gantvā maṇikkhandhe paṇḍusuttaṃ pavesento viya pabbataṃ pavisitvā tāsento
atk-s0514a3:3100_7: vagganto antopabbatena uggantvā mahāsattaṃ pāde daḷhaṃ gahetvā parivattetvā adhosiraṃ
atk-s0514a3:3100_8: katvā anālambe ākāse vissajjesi. Tena vuttaṃ –
atk-s0514a3:3102: “So tattha gantvā pabbatantarasmiṃ, anto pavisitvāna paduṭṭhacitto;
atk-s0514a3:3104_0: Tattha so tattha gantvāti so puṇṇako pabbatamatthakā pabbatapādaṃ gantvā tattha pabbatantare
atk-s0514a3:3104_1: ṭhatvā tassa anto pavisitvā pabbatamatthake ṭhitassa heṭṭhā paññāyamāno asaṃvute
atk-s0514a3:3104_2: bhūmipadese dhāresīti. Na āditova dhāresi, tattha pana taṃ khipitvā pannarasayojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3104_3: bhaṭṭhakāle pabbatamuddhani ṭhitova hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā adhosiraṃ bhassantaṃ pādesu
atk-s0514a3:3104_4: gahetvā adhosirameva ukkhipitvā mukhaṃ olokento “na maratī”ti ñatvā dutiyampi khipitvā
atk-s0514a3:3104_5: tiṃsayojanamattaṃ bhaṭṭhakāle tatheva ukkhipitvā puna tassa mukhaṃ olokento jīvantameva
atk-s0514a3:3104_6: disvā cintesi “sace idāni saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ bhassitvā na marissati, pādesu naṃ gahetvā
atk-s0514a3:3104_7: pabbatamuddhani pothetvā māressāmī”ti atha naṃ tatiyampi khipitvā saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3104_8: bhaṭṭhakāle hatthaṃ vaḍḍhetvā pādesu gahetvā ukkhipi. Tato mahāsatto cintesi “ayaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3104_9: maṃ paṭhamaṃ pannarasayojanaṭṭhānaṃ khipi, dutiyampi tiṃsayojanaṃ, tatiyampi saṭṭhiyojanaṃ,
atk-s0514a3:3104_10: idāni puna maṃ na khipissati, ukkhipantoyeva pabbatamuddhani paharitvā māressati,
atk-s0514a3:3104_11: yāva maṃ ukkhipitvā pabbatamuddhani na potheti, tāva naṃ adhosiro hutvā olambantova
atk-s0514a3:3104_12: māraṇakāraṇaṃ pucchissāmī”ti. Evaṃ cintetvā ca pana so achambhito asantasanto tathā
atk-s0514a3:3104_13: akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “dhārayi kātiyāno”ti, tikkhattuṃ khipitvā dhārayīti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3106: “So lambamāno narake papāte, mahabbhaye lomahaṃse vidugge;
atk-s0514a3:3107: Asantasanto kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho, iccabravi puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3110: Accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi ludraṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.
atk-s0514a3:3112: “Yaṃ maṃ papātasmiṃ papātumicchasi, ko nu tavattho maraṇena mayhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3113: Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatāti.
atk-s0514a3:3114_0: Tattha so lambamānoti so kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho tatiyavāre lambamāno. Ariyāvakāsoti
atk-s0514a3:3114_1: rūpena ariyasadiso devavaṇṇo hutvā carasi. Asaññatoti kāyādīhi asaññato dussīlo.
atk-s0514a3:3114_2: Accāhitanti hitātikkantaṃ, atiahitaṃ vā. Bhāve ca teti tava citte appamattakampi
atk-s0514a3:3114_3: kusalaṃ natthi. Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇoti ajja tava idaṃ kāraṇaṃ amānusasseva.
atk-s0514a3:3114_4: Katamāsi devatāti yakkhānaṃ antare katarayakkho nāma tvaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3117: “Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbo;
atk-s0514a3:3118: Bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno.
atk-s0514a3:3120: “Tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāmi, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā;
atk-s0514a3:3121: Tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayiṃ tuyha vadhāya dhīrā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3122_0: Tattha sajibboti sajīvo amacco. Brahāti ārohapariṇāhasampanno uṭṭhāpitakañcanarūpasadiso.
atk-s0514a3:3122_1: Vaṇṇabalūpapannoti sarīravaṇṇena ca kāyabalena ca upagato. Tassānujanti tassa anujātaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3122_2: dhītaraṃ. Patārayinti cittaṃ pavattesiṃ, sanniṭṭhānamakāsinti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3123: Taṃ sutvā mahāsatto “ayaṃ loko duggahitena nassati, nāgamāṇavikaṃ patthentassa mama maraṇena kiṃ payojanaṃ, tathato kāraṇaṃ jānissāmī”ti cintetvā gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3125: “Mā heva tvaṃ yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena loke;
atk-s0514a3:3126: Kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomi sabba”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3127: Taṃ sutvā tassa ācikkhanto puṇṇako āha –
atk-s0514a3:3130: Taṃ yācamānaṃ sasuro avoca, yathā mamaññiṃsu sukāmanītaṃ.
atk-s0514a3:3132: “Dajjemu kho te sutanuṃ sunettaṃ, sucimhitaṃ candanalittagattaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3133: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
atk-s0514a3:3134: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, naññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma.
atk-s0514a3:3136: “Evaṃ na mūḷhosmi suṇohi katte, na cāpi me duggahitatthi kiñci;
atk-s0514a3:3137: Hadayena te dhammaladdhena nāgā, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ dadanti.
atk-s0514a3:3139: “Tasmā ahaṃ tuyhaṃ vadhāya yutto, evaṃ mamattho maraṇena tuyhaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3140: Idheva taṃ narake pātayitvā, hantvāna taṃ hadayamānayissa”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3141_0: Tattha dhītukāmoti dhītaraṃ kāmemi patthemi, dhītu atthāya vicarāmi. Ñātibhatohamasmīti
atk-s0514a3:3141_1: tasmā tassa ñātibhatako nāma ahaṃ amhi. Tanti taṃ nāgakaññaṃ. Yācamānanti yācantaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3141_2: maṃ. Yathā manti yasmā maṃ. Aññiṃsūti jāniṃsu. Sukāmanītanti suṭṭhu esa kāmena nītoti
atk-s0514a3:3141_3: sukāmanīto, taṃ sukāmanītaṃ. Tasmā sasuro ‘dajjemu kho te”tiādimavoca. Tattha dajjemūti
atk-s0514a3:3141_4: dadeyyāma. Sutanunti sundarasarīraṃ. Idha māharesīti idha nāgabhavane dhammena laddhā āhareyyāsīti.
atk-s0514a3:3142_0: Tassa taṃ kathaṃ sutvā mahāsatto cintesi “vimalāya mama hadayena kiccaṃ natthi, varuṇanāgarājena
atk-s0514a3:3142_1: mama dhammakathaṃ sutvā maṇinā maṃ pūjetvā tattha gatena mama dhammakathikabhāvo
atk-s0514a3:3142_2: vaṇṇito bhavissati, tato vimalāya mama dhammakathāya dohaḷo uppanno bhavissati, varuṇena
atk-s0514a3:3142_3: duggahitaṃ gahetvā puṇṇako āṇatto bhavissati, svāyaṃ attanā duggahitena maṃ māretuṃ
atk-s0514a3:3142_4: evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpesi, mama paṇḍitabhāvo ṭhānuppattikāraṇacintanasamatthatā imasmiṃ
atk-s0514a3:3142_5: maṃ mārente kiṃ karissati, handāhaṃ saññāpessāmi na”nti. Cintetvā ca pana “māṇava,
atk-s0514a3:3142_6: sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma jānāmi, yāvāhaṃ na marāmi, tāva maṃ pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3142_7: sādhunaradhammaṃ nāma suṇohi, pacchā yaṃ icchasi, taṃ kareyyāsī”ti vatvā sādhunaradhammaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3142_8: vaṇṇetvā attano jīvitaṃ āharāpento so adhosiro olambantova gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3144: “Khippaṃ mamaṃ uddhara kātiyāna, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3145: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3146_0: Taṃ sutvā puṇṇako “ayaṃ paṇḍitena devamanussānaṃ akathitapubbo dhammo bhavissati,
atk-s0514a3:3146_1: khippameva naṃ uddharitvā sādhunaradhammaṃ suṇissāmī”ti cintetvā mahāsattaṃ ukkhipitvā
atk-s0514a3:3146_2: pabbatamuddhani nisīdāpesi. Tamatthaṃ pakāsento satthā āha –
atk-s0514a3:3148: “So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nagamuddhani khippaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā;
atk-s0514a3:3151: “Samuddhaṭo mesi tuvaṃ papātā, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3152: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva me pātukarohi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3153: Tattha assatthamāsīnanti laddhassāsaṃ hutvā nisinnaṃ. Samekkhiyānāti disvā. Sādhunarassa dhammāti narassa sādhudhammā, sundaradhammāti attho.
atk-s0514a3:3156: “Samuddhaṭo tyasmi ahaṃ papātā, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
atk-s0514a3:3157: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajjā”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3159_0: Atha naṃ mahāsatto “kiliṭṭhagattomhi, nhāyāmi tāvā”ti āha. Yakkhopi “sādhū”ti nhānodakaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3159_1: āharitvā nhātakāle mahāsattassa dibbadussagandhamālādīni datvā alaṅkatappaṭiyattakāle
atk-s0514a3:3159_2: dibbabhojanaṃ adāsi. Atha mahāsatto bhuttabhojano kāḷāgirimatthakaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā
atk-s0514a3:3159_3: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā alaṅkatadhammāsane nisīditvā buddhalīlāya sādhunaradhammaṃ desento gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3161: “Yātānuyāyī ca bhavāhi māṇava, allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassu;
atk-s0514a3:3162: Mā cassu mittesu kadāci dubbhī, mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche”ti.
atk-s0514a3:3163: Tattha allañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassūti allaṃ tintaṃ pāṇiṃ mā dahi mā jhāpehi.
atk-s0514a3:3164: Yakkho saṃkhittena bhāsite cattāro sādhunaradhamme bujjhituṃ asakkonto vitthārena pucchanto gāthamāha –
atk-s0514a3:3166: “Kathaṃ nu yātaṃ anuyāyi hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate kathaṃ so;
atk-s0514a3:3167: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho, akkhāhi me pucchito etamattha”nti.
atk-s0514a3:3170: “Asanthutaṃ nopi ca diṭṭhapubbaṃ, yo āsanenāpi nimantayeyya;
atk-s0514a3:3171: Tasseva atthaṃ puriso kareyya, yātānuyāyīti tamāhu paṇḍitā.
atk-s0514a3:3174: Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhapāṇiṃ dahate mittadubbho.
atk-s0514a3:3177: Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0514a3:3179: “Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
atk-s0514a3:3180: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
atk-s0514a3:3184: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho,
atk-s0514a3:3186_0: Tattha asanthutanti ekāhadvīhampi ekato avutthapubbaṃ. Yo āsanenāpīti yo evarūpaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3186_1: puggalaṃ āsanamattenapi nimantayeyya, pageva annapānādīhi. Tassevāti tassa pubbakārissa
atk-s0514a3:3186_2: atthaṃ puriso karoteva. Yātānuyāyīti pubbakāritāya yātassa puggalassa anuyāyī. Paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0514a3:3186_3: karonto hi yāyī nāma, pacchā karonto anuyāyī nāmāti evaṃ paṇḍitā kathenti. Ayaṃ devarāja,
atk-s0514a3:3186_4: paṭhamo sādhunaradhammo. Adubbhapāṇinti adubbhakaṃ attano bhuñjanahatthameva dahanto
atk-s0514a3:3186_5: hi mittadubbhī nāma hoti. Iti allahatthassa ajjhāpanaṃ nāma ayaṃ dutiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3186_6: Na tassāti tassa sākhaṃ vā pattaṃ vā na bhañjeyya. Kiṃkāraṇā? Mittadubbho hi pāpako.
atk-s0514a3:3186_7: Iti paribhuttacchāyassa acetanassa rukkhassapi pāpaṃ karonto mittadubbhī nāma hoti,
atk-s0514a3:3186_8: kimaṅgaṃ pana manussabhūtassāti. Evaṃ mittesu adubbhanaṃ nāma ayaṃ tatiyo sādhunaradhammo.
atk-s0514a3:3186_9: Dajjitthiyāti dadeyya itthiyā. Sammatāyāti “ahameva tassā piyo, na añño, maññeva
atk-s0514a3:3186_10: sā icchatī”ti evaṃ suṭṭhu matāya. Laddhā khaṇanti aticārassa okāsaṃ labhitvā. Asatīnanti
atk-s0514a3:3186_11: asaddhammasamannāgatānaṃ itthīnaṃ. Iti mātugāmaṃ nissāya pāpassa akaraṇaṃ nāma ayaṃ
